org.tc: 員榮醫療社團法人員榮醫院
德威生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
德威國際口腔醫療體系是一個完整的垂直及平水整合的口腔醫療體系，其中包含牙醫醫院、牙科診群、牙體技術所、牙材事業、醫務管理、數位醫學影像整合及教育中心。

自西元1989年德威第一家院所在台北成立，至今院所群遍布北(大台北、桃園、新竹) 中 (台中) 、南 (嘉義、台南、高雄、屏東) 、花東(花蓮、台東) 、離島(金門) 、偏鄉地區(南投信義鄉)及海外地區有中國、日本、馬來西亞及美國等近40家院所。以” 一家看診，海內外服務”的精神，提供優質、專業的口腔醫療服務。


2021年成立全台灣第一家牙醫口腔醫院，具有全台最完整的牙醫專科團業，擁有最先進的牙醫設備及對病患最好的醫療照顧。醫院裡有五大中心: 植牙中心、矯正中心、顎顏面中心、精準呼吸中止治療中心及美容牙醫中心。整合牙醫10個專科(家庭牙醫、兒童牙科、牙體復形、贋復補綴、牙髓病、牙周病、齒顎矯正、口腔顎面外科、口腔病理及特殊需求者口腔醫學) 提供個人化精準醫療服務，並以成為口腔醫療照護的領導者為使命。
info.en:
Dentway international dental group is a complete vertical and horizontal oral medical system, including dental hospital, dental clinics, dental laboratory, dental business, medical management, digital medical imaging integration and education center.
First Dentway Dental clinic was established in 1989. There are nearly 40 clinics in Taiwan (the northern, central, southern, eastern, remote islands ), and overseas areas including China, Japan, Malaysia, and the United States and. Provide high-quality and professional dental services in the spirit of "service at home and abroad".
In 2021, the first dental hospital in Taiwan is established. It has the most complete dental specialty group in Taiwan, with the most advanced dental equipment and the best dental care for patients. There are five centers in the hospital: Dental Implant Center, Orthodontics Center, Maxillofacial Center, Precision Breath Abort Treatment Center, and Beauty Dentistry Center. Integrate 10 specialties of dentistry (Family Dentistry, Pediatric dentistry, Dental Reconstruction, Prosthetics, Endodontics, Periodontology, Orthodontics, Oral and Maxillofacial Surgery, Oral Pathology, and Oral Medicine for Special Needs) to provide personalization precision dental services, and its mission is to become a leader in dental care.

org.tc: 彰化基督教醫院

info.tc:
彰化基督教醫院擁有128年歷史，是一所信靠上帝的愛所建造的醫院，從早期醫療宣教士、蘭醫師父子蓽路藍縷的開創，引進西方醫學，經歷屆院長與全體同工的努力，彰基成為彰化、南投、雲林唯一的醫學中心，長期守護著中部地區民眾的健康。彰基擁有九家體系醫院，員工超過8500位，總床數超過4000千床，提供60餘種以上之專科服務。彰基並建構全台第一家全院智慧綠能的員林基督教醫院，目前正在興建的「癌症質子治療中心」，未來將提供中部地區的癌症患者便利且精準的治療與照護。
隨著資訊科技進步與人工智慧演進，彰基致力成為一家「卓越創新實踐」的智能醫院，並已通過HMISS Level-7的認證。透過大數據、人工智慧和物聯網等先進科技，導入智慧醫療和臨床決策輔助系統及個人化精準治療策略，提供患者安全且高品質之醫療服務。彰基以「未來醫院」之願景，結合智慧、綠能與乾淨醫院的理念，打造醫療機構ESG運營新策略，致力推動醫療環保、醫院治理及企業社會責任，為全球永續發展目標共同努力。
info.en:
Changhua Christian Hospital (CCH) was founded in 1896; for over a century, CCH has been inspired by the love and saving grace of Jesus Christ. CCH is central Taiwan's most historical medical center, with over 4,000 ward beds and 8,500 employees in 9 healthcare systems. CCH built the first intelligent and green hospital in Taiwan to uplift workflow efficiency and an integrated healthcare system to deliver advanced but safe health services. CCH is constructing the 「Proton Therapy Center」 and anticipates providing the best service for cancer patients in the center of Taiwan.  

In the face of sweeping changes in medical information technology and artificial intelligence (AI) evolution, CCH is committed to being a smart and green hospital with "excellent, innovative, and practice."CCH has been validated by HMISS Level-7, through advanced technologies, such as big data, AI, and IoT, to introduce the clinical decision support system (CDSS) and personalized precision medicine to provide safe and high-quality services for patients. With the vision of "Future Hospital,"CCH integrated intelligent, green, and clean into the hospital operation to facilitate the ESG management strategy and promote environmental protection, hospital governance, and corporate social responsibility to achieve the sustainable development goals (SDGs) of global medical societies.

org.tc: 長庚醫療財團法人

info.tc:
長庚醫療財團法人創辦於1976年，先後在台北、林口、基隆、高雄、嘉義、桃園與雲林設立了7所長庚醫院，並受政府委託經營鳳山與土城醫院，每日診治病患32,800人次以上，擁有病床數10,000床，落實「人本濟世，病人優先」是本院的經營理念。長庚具急重難症病患照護能力，長久以來持續進行醫療品質優化改善，多次榮獲SNQ國家生技醫療品質金獎的醫院，持續創新提升品質達國際醫療水準，以維護及促進病人健康是長庚非常重視及在乎的事。
本次展覽長庚醫療財團法人以「特色醫療、智慧醫院、創新研發、公益榮耀」四大主軸呈現，含括癌症診斷、精準定位與治療、照護品質、醫療創新的成果與運用等，參展主題豐富，充份展現醫療照護的軟實力，現場並提供主題互動及體驗，歡迎民眾共同參與以了解科技治療的魅力！
長庚醫療財團法人本次參展主題包括：
一、特色醫療
1.  細胞治療
2. 尖端質子治療
3. 運動醫學
4. 微創手術
二、智慧醫院
1. 物聯網
2. 遠距醫療
3. 智能照護輔助
三、創新研發
精選創新且具臨床應用性之專利成果
四、公益榮耀
醫者仁心，全方位社會關懷＊獲獎榮耀肯定
info.en:
The Chang Gung Medical Foundation was established in 1976 by the founder of the Formosa Plastics Group (FPG).The Foundation has since established seven Chang Gung Memorial Hospitals in Taipei, Linkou, Keelung, Kaohsiung, Chiayi, Taoyuan. and Yunlin. The Foundation has also been entrusted by the government to operate Feng-Shan Hospital and Tucheng Hospital, as well as to assist in the operation of Dali Jen-Ai Hospital in Taichung. With more than 32,800 patients treated daily and 10,000 beds, the hospital's management philosophy is "Benefit mankind with sincerity and diligence.".
Chang Gung Hospital has the ability to care for patients with acute and critical illnesses and has a long history of quality improvement. As a multiple-time SNQ National Gold Award winner, Chang Gung Hospital is committed to maintaining and promoting the health of patients by continuing to innovate and improve quality to meet international standards.
The exhibition will be presented under the four main axes of "Specialty Medical Treatments, Smart Hospital, Innovative R&D, and Public Welfare Glory", including cancer diagnosis, precise targeting treatment, quality of care, and the achievements and applications of medical innovation. The exhibition will showcase the soft power of medical care with a variety of themes and will provide interactive and hands-on experience for the public to learn about the charm of technological treatment.
Chang Gung Medical Foundation's exhibit topics include:
Specialty Medical Treatments
1. Cell therapy
2. Cutting-edge- Proton Therapy
3. Sports Medicine
4. Minimally invasive surgery
5. IoT
6. Telemedicine
7. Intelligent healthcare assistance
Selected thirteen innovative, clinically applicable patent achievements and Automated dispensing cabinets.
Public Welfare Glory
Award-winning recognition of comprehensive medical and social care.

org.tc: 群邁通訊股份有限公司

info.tc:
1. 室內環境淨化系統：結合環境感知器、環境淨化器及AI雲平台，有效在室內環境持續去除有害病菌、異味、甲醛、TVOC，降低密閉空間感染風險，讓機構管理者即時掌握環境品質及淨化狀態。
2. 定位求救系統: 以藍牙按鈕讓醫護人員隨身佩帶或放在口袋中，當醫護人員發現可能遭受暴力攻擊時，立刻按下隨身按鈕求救，同時把自己的位置資訊傳送到警衛室。
3. 醫療器材追蹤: 可為醫療儀器、急診設備、輪椅等醫療器材提供即時定位訊息，掌握設備及器材的位置與使用狀態，以利於人員進行調配及使用，並減輕醫護人員交班盤點負擔。
4. 嬰兒防盜: 在新生兒身上佩掛藍牙發報器，當嬰兒被異常帶離嬰兒室時系統即刻發出告警。護理系統顯示嬰兒位置，護理師及警衛可即時處理，防止嬰兒被外人擄盜
5. 安全圍籬: 病患隨身佩掛藍牙定位按鈕，當有身體不適或緊急狀況即刻按鈕求救。系統能即時顯示求救位置，讓照顧者快速趕往事發地點進行救助。並可設定安全區域，若病患離開安全區域發出告警，防止走失。
info.en:
1. Indoor Purification System – integrate Indoor Air Sensor, Indoor Air Purifier, and AI Cloud Platform to monitor indoor air quality and destroy indoor pollutants such as odors, viruses, bacteria, molds, and volatile organic compounds 24/7.
2. Indoor Positioning - When the medical staff feels threatened, he/she can press the tag to transmit an emergency alarm with in-door positioning information. The emergency message will be delivered to the security station to alert safety guards.
3. Medical Equipment Tracking - track, find, and access important medical equipment much easier with indoor positioning technology. The system updates the real-time locations of hospital assets, so the valuable equipment can be clearly located and visualized.
4. Smart baby Care - Attach a Tag to the newborn, and the system will send an alarm when the baby is abnormally taken out of the baby room. The nursing system shows the location of the baby to prevent the baby from being kidnapped by outsiders.
5. Patient Tracking - Locate patients and send alerts when they leave safe areas or press the button to call for help. The system alerts caregivers and shows the location on a map in real time, allowing the caregiver to quickly rush to the location of the accident for assistance.

org.tc: 向榮生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
向榮生技專精於幹細胞治療的研發與應用已十餘年。本公司幹細胞新藥『ELIXCYTE®』正進行第III期膝骨關節炎收案與第I/II期慢性腎臟病的臨床試驗解盲，希望為全球人口老化所伴隨之疾病，提供一個嶄新的治療契機。

在新藥研發過程中，本公司依循國際醫藥法規協和會（ICH）規範建立異體脂肪幹細胞庫，於2022年取得美國FDA主檔案(Master File, MF)備案，可作為良好的幹細胞新藥開發原料。

此外，向榮生技更擴大幹細胞科技應用，成功開發兩項專利產品：1. 幹細胞分泌物，以專利製程生產高品質、高產量及高有效成分之幹細胞分泌物，亦獲得美國FDA主檔案備案，已應用於退化性眼部疾病及其他再生醫學的應用開發，更可提供作為外泌體研究開發原料。2.細胞超低溫儲存容器『優易保® UnicoVial®』，取得衛福部第二等級醫療器材核可，獲得美國FDA主檔案備案，不僅適用於細胞產品也適用於其他生物製劑，提升製劑品質規格並彌補細胞製劑產業的缺口。

向榮生技期待以幹細胞新藥開發及幹細胞技術應用，促進幹細胞技術在全球高齡社會之再生醫學以及退化性疾病的運用，追求生命更好的生活品質。
info.en: For a decade, UnicoCell pioneered stem cell therapy R&D. UnicoCell's Gold Award-winning new stem cell product, ELIXCYTE®, has advanced to the case enrollment phase of Phase III clinical trials for knee osteoarthritis and has reached the unblinding process of Phase II clinical trials for chronic kidney disease, promising innovative treatments for aging-related diseases. The company follows ICH guidelines, holds a 2022 US FDA Master File (MF) for an adipose-derived stem cell bank, a vital raw material for stem cell drug development. UnicoCell has innovated two patented products: 1. Stem Cell Secretome, which is FDA MF-recognized, and is applied for degenerative eye diseases, regenerative medicine, and exosome research. 2. UnicoVial® ultra-low temperature storage, obtained TFDA Class II medical device approval and FDA MF-recognized, applied for cell therapy and biological product storage. UnicoCell aspires to globalize stem cell technology, promote regenerative medicine for aging-related conditions, and ultimately enhance the quality of human life.

org.tc: 國軍花蓮總醫院

info.tc:
本院參展主題有4項
1.智慧調劑台應用：藥品更換時，無須重新換標籤，只需透過電腦更新藥檔資料即可同步更新標籤訊息，亦可依需求隨時於藥盒呈現藥品相關資訊。調劑時刷領藥清單QR CODE，可於欲調劑藥品儲位閃燈提示，避免調劑錯誤。可提升藥師的調劑效率和準確性，保障患者的用藥安全。
2.AI藥品圖像辨識系統：藥局調劑階段與給藥階段中，藉由比對AI辨識所拍攝之藥袋內藥品與讀取藥袋處方條碼資訊之機制，輔助藥事人員核對藥袋內藥品名稱、劑量、數量等是否與藥袋處方一致。可有效降低人工檢查的錯誤率，提高調劑核對效率，改善醫院給藥過程於末端環節可能造成危及病患健康之風險。
3.院部決策AI動態即時戰情：即時呈現本院各項醫療指標及收入，使院部主官可即時掌握業績成長及指標達成率等，使其可即時管制及分配資源。
4.護理資源決策系統：即時呈現本院護理各項護理資源分配，使護理部可即時掌握護理資源及指標達成率等，使其可即時管制及分配資源。
info.en: There are 4 exhibiting themes in our hospital to participate in the exhibition, the first item: the application of smart dispensing table, the second item: AI drug image recognition system, the third item: AI dynamic real-time battle situation for hospital decision-making, and the fourth item: nursing resource decision-making system。

org.tc: 國軍高雄總醫院岡山分院
org.en: Kaohsiung Armed Forces General Hospital Gangshan Branch

info.tc:
1.國軍空勤人員須定期於本院航空生理訓練中心接受低壓艙航訓練，以瞭解高空缺氧對生理、心智與動作技能之影響。因訓練流程實際暴露低壓環境，存在氣壓傷害之風險，且為避免誘發減壓症之可能，須限制訓後24小時的飛行任務。
2.本院與國家中山科學研究院共同開發「新式缺氧訓練模組」，結合飛行模擬與缺氧裝置，於海平面的正常壓力環境中，提供模擬動態飛行的缺氧事件，並透過認知功能測試，強化飛行員對缺氧警覺之風險意識，同時降低人員暴露減壓環境之風險，有效提升訓練安全。
info.en:
Aircrew members are required to attend hypoxia awareness training regularly to strengthen their memory of their personal hypoxia symptoms by undergoing training inside a hypobaric chamber. But there is a risk of decompression sickness in trainees during hypobaric hypoxia training. The flight missions are forbidden in 24 hours after the training.
National Chung-Shan Institute of Science and Technology (NCSIST) and our hospital jointly developed a new hypoxia training module. It combines the flight simulator, the cognitive functions test, and can be used for hypoxia training under normal pressure. The new hypoxia training module can enhance the training safety by strengthening pilots' risk awareness of hypoxia and reducing the risk of personnel exposure to the high-altitude, low-pressure environments.

org.tc: 國軍桃園總醫院新竹分院
org.en: Taoyuan Armed Forces General Hospital Hsinchu Branch

info.tc: ECG心電圖是臨床檢查病患心臟疾病常用的工具之一。目前台灣大多數醫院都使用DICOM-ECG儲存在PACS系統供醫師判讀。而QRS檢測一般通常採用的XQRS-WFDB演算法，需要較高的電腦計算成本，並且我們發現市面一些心電圖分析軟體對於心搏過速心電圖的辨識效果不會很高，故與學者共同研究改進方法。
info.en: The ECG (Electrocardiogram) is a commonly used tool in clinical examinations for diagnosing cardiovascular diseases in patients. Currently, the majority of hospitals in Taiwan store DICOM-ECG data in PACS systems for physician interpretation. The QRS detection is typically performed using the XQRS-WFDB algorithm, which demands higher computational costs. Additionally, we have observed that some ECG analysis software available in the market do not perform well in recognizing ECGs with rapid heartbeats. Therefore, we are collaborating with scholars to research and develop improved methods.

org.tc: 國防醫學院衛勤訓練中心
org.en: Health Service Training Center of National Defense Medical Center

info.tc:
1.為使戰場傷患救護訓練多元化，國防醫學院衛勤訓練中心於107年至112年止，委託中科院研發營造戰場視覺模擬訓練系統，藉複合投影(VR)產生敵攻擊模擬效果，營造訓練者於戰場上(城鎮、灘岸及限制空間)與敵駁火之模擬訓練景況，訓練方式主要是透過結合高階擬真假人多變化擬真傷情及生命徵象訊息回饋，藉以模擬戰場傷患負傷情況，後續並將其救護訓練評核系統導入AI模型架構，藉由機器學習產出，完成人員分析及精進建議以有效降低人為訓練誤差，並能強化救護模擬訓練效能。
2. 智能救助模擬系統部分，則是運用智能眼鏡實施救護遠端醫囑賦予，精確提升衛勤與緊急救護之救護能力，縮短傷患到院前之救護期程並可完整調度醫療量能，有效提升官兵傷患之救治率。
info.en:
1.To diversify the training of battlefield casualty evacuation, the Health Service Training Center of the National Defense Medical Center commissioned the NCSIST to develop a battlefield visual simulation training system from the year 2018 to 2023. This system utilizes virtual reality (VR) technology to generate simulated enemy attack effects, creating training scenarios for trainees to simulate engagements with enemies in battlefield settings such as urban areas, beaches, and confined spaces. The training approach primarily involves the incorporation of highly realistic synthetic human models with varying injuries and vital sign feedback, simulating battlefield casualty situations. Subsequently, an AI-based evaluation system is integrated into the framework, utilizing machine learning to provide personnel analysis and improvement suggestions, effectively reducing human training errors, and enhancing the effectiveness of medical simulation training.

2.Regarding the intelligent rescue simulation system, intelligent eyewear is employed to implement remote medical instructions, enhancing the accuracy of medical care and emergency rescue capabilities. This approach shortens the time of casualty care before arrival at a medical facility, allowing for efficient allocation of medical resources and significantly improving the treatment rate of injured personnel.

org.tc: 國防醫學院三軍總醫院澎湖分院
org.en: N.D.M.C. Tri-Service General Hospital Penghu Branch

info.tc: 醫學中心等級之3D列印技術，引進三軍總醫院澎湖分院，特別應用於術前規劃及治療複雜性骨折手術，尤其是骨盆、髖臼或是粉碎性骨折，讓以往只能往台灣後送的病人，能留在島上接受同等的治療。在本院放射科同仁的協助下，能以最快速的方式獲得細切的電腦斷層影像檔案，並透過內湖總院雲端軟體3D影像建模。我們再用3D列印機將術前需要的模型印出，進行手術說明及臨床規畫。此醫學中心等級的流程以成功治癒了數十位受傷的澎湖鄉親，效果著見。
info.en: The 3D printing technology of the medical center level has been introduced to the Penghu Branch of the Tri-Service General Hospital, which is specially applied to preoperative planning and treatment of complex fracture surgery, especially for pelvic, acetabular or comminuted fractures. This allows patients who previously had to be sent to Taiwan to stay on the island for the same treatment. With the assistance of the colleagues in the radiology department, we can quickly obtain finely sliced computer tomography image files and create 3D images through the cloud software of the TSGH. We then use a 3D printer to print out the necessary models for preoperative surgery instructions and clinical planning. This medical center level process has successfully healed dozens of injured Penghu residents with visible effects.

org.tc: 聯新國際醫院

info.tc:
參展定位主題:以智慧醫療為基礎的無圍牆照護
運用雲平台為基礎，提供各神醫的醫療照護服務。
【止鼾神醫】：利用居家鼾聲錄製，以AI分類睡眠問題，進而做睡眠暨慢病照護管理。
【精準腸神醫】：利用標籤平台創造30%點擊率, 精準地讓民眾得到篩檢訊息，並利用大腸鏡AI影像辨識進行篩檢。
【AI腦神醫】：利用LINE@智慧轉診，串連各醫院緊急連繫，提升流程時效性，減少病人等待時間；並利用MRI AI自動判讀軟體快速、精準判斷梗塞區，搶救病人黃金治療時間。
【照護脊神醫】：利用LINE@智慧照護平台，提供脊椎微創手術的術前諮詢與術後追蹤完整服務，使其達到全期護理服務。
【解痛運神醫】：「如何讓企業3週有感，員工病假少7成」提供專業運動測檢分析，安排團隊課程及運動管理，透由APP輔助員工達成健促目標。
【風險神算醫】：結合智慧病房服務，整合住院病人相關數據，臨床警示系統(CAS)，早期警訊系統(EWS)，並提供病危與入ICU未來六小時預測風險, 提高醫護照護品質。
info.en:
Exhibition Theme: “Hospital Without Out Boundaries”-Establish Smart Healthcare-Based Integrated Care
1.Use home snoring recordings to classify sleep problems with AI, and then provide sleep and chronic disease care and management.
2.Use the label platform to create 30% click-through rate, accurately let the public get screening information, and use colonoscopy AI image recognition for screening.
3.Use LINE@ smart referral to connect emergency contacts of various hospitals, improve the timeliness of the process, and reduce patient waiting time; and use MRI AI automatic interpretation software to quickly and accurately determine the infarction area.
4.Using the LINE@ smart care platform, we provide complete pre-operative consultation and post-operative follow-up services for minimally invasive spine surgeries
5.Provides professional exercise testing and analysis, arranges team courses and exercise management, and uses the APP to assist employees in achieving their health promotion goals.
6.Combined with smart ward services, it integrates inpatient-related data, clinical alert system (CAS), and early warning system (EWS), and provides risk predictions for critical illness and ICU admission in the next six hours to improve the quality of medical care.

org.tc: 財團法人醫院評鑑暨醫療品質策進會

info.tc:
財團法人醫院評鑑暨醫療品質策進會為促進醫療及科技的跨領域整合與醫產鏈結，帶動醫療創新服務，創造醫療科技產業價值，於2019年成立「Health Smart Taiwan (HST) 台灣智慧醫療創新整合平台」。此平台彙集了超過170件台灣優質且實用的智慧醫療解決方案，供機構間標竿學習，並透過成功案例彙編、專業論壇、專案支持等資源協助科技產業理解醫療實務的樣貌，促成雙方的交流。

HST今年度以「創新科技於醫事人員訓練之應用成果」作為主軸，邀集運用七家醫療機構進行聯合策展。展出結合虛擬實境的沉浸式訓練、遊戲式學習、擬真訓練等，提供互動式體驗，並推廣台灣品牌的智慧化臨床訓練解決方案。展現台灣醫事人員培訓之知名度及創新形象。
info.en:
Joint Commission of Taiwan (JCT) is an independent, non-profit exclusive external accreditation body accredited by the International Society for Quality in Health Care (ISQua). JCT provides a resource-sharing platform for healthcare partners through accreditation, quality improvement activities, and medical education.

JCT established the Health Smart Taiwan (HST), a one-stop portal designed catalyze the existing digital solutions scalable through offering a wide range of consultations, workshops, campaign, acceleration services and piloting projects in hospitals. It provides integrated services for healthcare institutions to achieve digital transformation, shaping a quality, safe, and efficient healthcare environment.

In this exhibition, HST will show the special theme-"Innovative Technology in Medical Professional Training". You will learn more immersive training combined with virtual reality, and interactive training such as game-based learning, simulation training, etc.

org.tc: 臺北醫學大學

info.tc:
臺北醫學大學創立於1960年，歷經60餘年努力耕耘，在不斷的擴展、蛻變創新下，發展至今共有11學院、1通識教育中心，在校學生人數逾6,000名，已培育超過47,000名畢業校友，分佈海內外各醫療機構、學術單位及產業界。本校擁有臺北醫學大學附設醫院、市立萬芳醫院、部立雙和醫院及新國民醫院，2013年整合三院癌症醫療系統成立「臺北癌症中心」；2017年成立「臺北神經醫學中心」以臨床為主軸，發展整合性神經醫學，共有六所優質附屬醫院。
本校秉持「人文關懷、誠信正直、創新卓越、團隊合作、社會服務」之核心價值，近年來致力於教學卓越、研究拔尖、產學績優、接軌國際與服務社會等發展面向，奠定本校以「醫學教育為本，生醫臨床為用，具社會影響力之創新型大學」為定位，以創新轉譯醫學為主軸，致力於厚實基礎研究、整合六附屬醫院臨床資源及推動生技醫療產業為目標。
info.en:
Established in 1960, over the past century, Taipei Medical University underwent the process of continuous expansion, transformation and innovation. Today, TMU has expanded into a world-class university with 11 Colleges and 1 General Education Center, 6000 students per year, 47,000 alumni around Medical Academic Institute, Medical Industry and six affiliated hospitals which are TMU hospital, Wan Fang Hospital, Shuang Ho Hospital, Hsin Kuo Min Hospital, Tapei Cancer Center and Taipei Neuroscience Institute.
Based on the core value of humanistic empathy, honesty and integrity, innovation, teamwork and social service, TMU is dedicated to excellent teaching, outstanding research, industry-academia collaboration, international participation and social service, in order to integrate clinical resource of affiliated hospitals and meet the visions of translation medicine innovation, biomedical industry development, research advancement and positive social influence. 3 main strategies of future development are below.

org.tc: 臺北醫學大學附設醫院

info.tc:
臺北醫學大學附設醫院創立於 1976 年，為臺北醫學大學第一間附屬醫院，奠定北醫體系臨床服務與教學研究雙向交流的基礎。為提供優質的醫療服務，北醫附設醫院持續提升醫療品質、強化軟硬體設備，2018 年起陸續完成三棟醫療大樓的整建，導入智慧醫療，蛻變新貌。目前全院病床增至近 800 床，同仁人數逾 2000 人，躍升國內外中型醫院的標竿。

邁向個人化精準醫療時代，北醫附設醫院積極發展癌症尖端醫療，2022年啟用蔡萬才癌症大樓及北醫質子中心，躋身世界百大質子中心，兩項重要建設將帶領北醫體系的癌症醫學晉升世界級場域，邁向全新里程碑。 

2023台灣醫療科技展展出項目如下
1. 多模人工智慧個人化4D高齡健康失智預測模組
2. 應用擴增實境於神經復健
3. 衛星X光檢查中心
4. 微創遠端橈骨骨折復位鉗 3D 列印輔助器材
info.en:
Taipei Medical University Hospital (TMUH), the first affiliated hospital of Taipei Medical University (TMU), was founded in 1976 and has built up the basis between clinical service and medical research education. TMUH continues enhancing medical care quality and reinforcing the hardware and software equipment to provide high-grade medical services. Since 2018, three medical buildings have been renovated; moreover, TMUH introduced an intelligent medical system that gives the hospital a whole new look. The number of hospital beds has increased to nearly 800 beds so far, and the number of faculty and staff has exceeded 2,000 people, making TMUH the benchmark of domestic and international medium-sized hospital.

Exhibited items
1. DeepBrain-Cognito
2. Satellite X-ray inspection center strengthens disease prevention and disease diagnosis capabilities
3. "G-Maple"Orthopedic Manual Surgical Instrument  (Non-Sterile)

org.tc: 臺北市立萬芳醫院

info.tc:
萬芳醫院具有急重症病患醫療能力與品質，自開院以來通過多項品質認證，包括五次高分通過JCI 國際醫院評鑑認證、癌症診療品質認證、國家級重度急救責任醫院，且不斷積極延攬醫療精英，強化醫療陣容，設立結核病中心、癌症中心、癌熱療中心、中風中心、中西整合疼痛、燒傷及困難傷口全人照護中心、雷射美容中心…等發展多元具有特色的醫療發展中心，提供的不只是專業的醫療服務，更是以病人為中心的全人照護，享譽國際的醫療水準只是附加價值，協助病人恢復健康、進而維護健康、促進健康才是萬芳醫院最重視的事。
萬芳醫院始終以”人”為出發點，透過萬芳生技創新中心”來培育醫療創新人才、組建醫療創新團隊，迎接未來醫療之新篇章。
info.en:
Wanfang Hospital Continue to actively recruit medical elites, strengthen the medical level, establish tuberculosis centers, cancer centers, cancer hyperthermia centers, stroke centers, integrated Chinese and Western integrated care centers for pain, burns and difficult wounds, laser cosmetology centers, ... and other developments with unique characteristics.
Wanfang Hospital provides not only professional medical services, but also patient-centered holistic care. Helping patient to recover their health、maintain their health, and promote their health is the most important thing to you.

org.tc: 衛生福利部雙和醫院
org.en: TAIPEI MEDICAL UNIVERSITY SHUANG-HO HOSPITAL, MINISTRY OF HEALTH AND WELFARE

info.tc:
雙和醫院於2008年7月1日開幕，由衛生福利部委託臺北醫學大學興建經營，為全國首家BOT醫院，總床數近 1,600 床的準醫學中心。除急性治療外，更深入長期慢性照護服務，引進先進儀器設備，提供全方位醫療服務，為新北市具規模的醫院，與臺北醫學大學附設醫院、萬芳醫院形成大台北的醫療金三角。
雙和醫院致力於整合跨科別醫療團隊，建置完整的急重症醫療系統，為新北高級救護技術員實習訓練醫院、北區緊急醫療災難應變指揮中心 (EOC) 網絡醫院，是北部地區不可或缺的急重症醫療據點。
雙和醫院為民眾的健康與幸福努力不懈，在服務、教學、研究等各方面不斷突破，並與世界各國之醫療機構合作，拓展台灣醫療專業之深度及廣度。2023年6月1日啟用臺北醫學大學教學研究及生醫科技大樓，建立生技研究園區，提供更完備的教學、研究環境，持續精進，成為高品質、高績效的國際一流大學醫院。

2023台灣醫療科技展展出項目如下：
1.全方位腎力精準數位醫療系統
2.腦血管醫學影像人工智慧平台
3.軟式消化道內視鏡機器輔具
4.好好翻身墊
5.鎂基金屬玻璃複合物縫合錨釘
6.肺癌藥篩與肝臟晶片:癌症藥毐測試
info.en:
Shuang-Ho Hospital was opened on July 1, 2008, and it was commissioned by the Ministry of Health and Welfare and was the first Build-Operate-Transfer (BOT) hospital in Taiwan, with a total of nearly 1,600 beds. In addition to acute care, the hospital also provides long-term chronic care services and has introduced advanced equipment to provide a full range of medical services, not only making it the largest hospital but also forming a network of best medical care with Taipei Medical University Hospital and Taipei Municipal Wanfang Hospital in New Taipei City.
This medical institution is committed to combine all the best teams from different disciplines to provide the public with the most complete medical system for acute and critical conditions. It is also a training hospital for senior ambulance technicians in New Taipei City and the city’s Emergency Operations Center (EOC) to coordinate a network of hospitals as response in time of medical disaster.
Shuang-Ho Hospital strives for the health and well-being of the public and continues to make breakthroughs in service, teaching, and research, and cooperates with medical institutions around the world to expand the depth and breadth of the medical profession in Taiwan. On June 1, 2023, we opened the Biomedical Technology Building of Taipei Medical University for teaching and research, for which this serves as a biotechnology research park to provide a comprehensive environment for teaching and research, as we continue to refine and set a high-quality, high-performing standard of international university hospital.

Exhibited items
1. ACE: A digital solution for taking care of patients with AKI, CKD and ESKD 
2. An Artificial Intelligence Platform for Medical Imaging of Cerebrovascular Disease
3. Robotic-Assisted Flexible Digestive Endoscopy
4. low-tension rollover sheet.
5. Magnesium-based metallic glass composite absorbable suture anchor 
6. Lung Tumor and Liver Lab Chip: Cancer Drug Toxicology Tests

org.tc: 新國民醫院

info.tc: 內視鏡脊椎融合術保留了內視鏡最小軟組織破壞的優點，相對於傳統或脊椎微創融合，藉由內視鏡自由活動及放大的視角，可以直接確認椎間盤切除以及上下終板的刮除是否有達到最適脊椎融合的程度。在1.8公分直徑大小的傷口下，可以置入如同傳統手術大小的椎籠及椎弓釘。脊椎內視鏡融合在保留了內視鏡的優勢下，擴大了脊椎內視鏡的臨床應用。
info.en: Advantages of endoscopic fusion surgery over traditional forms of surgery, or even minimal invasive fusion surgery, include the ability of the endoscope to visualize different angles under higher levels of magnification, ensuring the complete removal of the intervertebral disc and endplate preparation for the subsequent fusion procedure. Through a surgical wound of only 18 mm, endoscopic fusion surgery is able to implant the same cage and pedicle screws that are implanted in traditional spine surgery. With the use of endoscope in spine surgery, the application of endoscope has broadened to include fusion surgery for further clinical benefits.

info.tc: 原發性顫抖與巴金森氏症會導致手部不自主顫抖，若無法靠藥物緩解便會大大影響生活，但現在透過神波刀，不用開顱、不用全身麻醉，使用高強度的聚焦超音波搭配磁振造影就能精準治療，有效緩解顫抖，重拾生活品質！
info.en: Exablate Neuro, the Magnetic Resonance-guided Focused Ultrasound (MRgFUS) is a Focused Ultrasound platform for treating Essential Tremor and Tremor-dominant Parkinson’s disease. It can deliver up to 1,024 ultrasound waves across the skull to precisely ablate a target deep in the brain. The result for many patients is immediate improvement of tremor with no overnight hospital stay.

org.tc: 台灣光麗實業股份有限公司

info.tc:
「G CLINIC」醫療品牌起源於日本，日本是全世界細胞治療臨床運用領先的國家，也帶動台灣的相關再生醫療執行及法規制定。
G-clinic承襲日本細胞治療實證，結合台灣醫療團隊的豐富臨床經驗，串連東亞醫療連線，搭配最新的醫療智慧科技與全人照護配套，提供客人最完善的醫療品質與健康照護，提供個性化、專注的醫療服務和健康管理，打造精準的客戶醫療體驗，並強調高品質、個人隱私和健康領航的價值。
G CLINIC 打造世界級的個人醫療旅程-5G Advanced Medical Process  
1.營養保健處方簽GOODWILL JOURNEY（客製化營養建議）
2.智慧細胞療程GLOBAL JOURNEY（細胞因子補充、抗發炎調理）
3.專項儀器 輔助療程GENIUS JOURNEY（新興儀器治療）
4.運動處方簽GLAMOUR JOURNEY（運動專業教練訓練方案）
5.東方醫養學配方GENEROUS JOURNEY（東方醫養概論）

org.tc: 中國醫藥大學附設醫院

info.tc:
中國醫藥大學，為教學與研究並重之頂尖大學，並積極與世界一流大學、醫學中心及研究機構合作與交流，更榮獲英國泰晤士「2019亞洲大學排名」台灣第3名、私校第1。
中國醫藥大學暨醫療體系，目前有中國醫藥大學附設醫院、兒童醫院、北港附設醫院、台南市市立安南醫院、新竹附設醫院等，從醫學中心到診所共16家體系院所。
為提供更高品質的醫療服務，我們積極發展尖端醫學如幹細胞療法、免疫細胞療法、基因療法，並且積極建構人工智慧醫院，發展人工智慧、精準醫學、3D列印醫療、醫材輔具等，並設立「新竹健康產學園區」及「中國醫藥大學水湳校區」。
我們以「急、重、難症為基礎」、「以企業社會責任為使命」，將以此精神服務全體國民，提供最好的「教學、研究、服務」品質，並且發展卓越的生醫產業，以實現成為「卓越優秀的世界一流的中、西醫學中心」及「全球聞名的高科技生醫園區」之願景。
info.en:
China Medical University Hospital works in close collaboration with the world’s top universities, medical centers, and research institutes. The remarkable accomplishments of China Medical University have been well recognized by the world: ranks 60th in Asia University Rankings 2019, the first among private universities in Taiwan.
  CMU Healthcare System strives for excellence in healthcare. We invest our efforts in developing top-notch medical technologies, such as stem cell therapy, gene therapy, and AI Hospital. Meanwhile, our projects on “Hsinchu International Health Science Park” and the “Shuinan International Health Science Campus” together create an environment for developing cutting edge biomedical research, industry-academia collaboration platforms and startups.
  As frontline in central Taiwan, CMUH continues to build on a strong basis for acute and critical disease healthcare. The faculty are committed to permanent objectives of instruction, research, and medical services. Above all, we also put great emphasis on social responsibility. Moreover, we envision to be an “excellent world-class medical center with the best integration of western and Chinese medical” and “world-renowned high-tech biomedical park.”

org.tc: 長聖國際生技股份有限公司
org.en: Ever Supreme Bio Technology Co., Ltd.

info.tc: 臍帶間質幹細胞研發培養特定分子表現族群之間質幹細胞進行相對應治療，發揮並維持間質幹細胞本身抗發炎緩解組織惡化及促進組織再生修復特色，依據其細胞具備功能特色，目前的細胞治療幾乎都是自體治療。然而自體細胞治療價格昂貴，無法大量生產，長聖開發中的新藥UMSC01（異體臍帶間質幹細胞），其臍帶間質幹細胞是很好的異體細胞治療來源，可事先製造保存並於需要時取用(Off-the-Shelf)，因此可實現「大規模生產並放在貨架上銷售的細胞產品」，大幅度降低細胞培養成本，除此之外並不會影響原本間質幹細胞本身抗發炎緩解組織惡化及促進組織再生修復特色，具備市場潛力與產品開發價值。
info.en: The development of umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells, cultured to express specific molecular profiles, provides a promising avenue for targeted therapy. These cells harness and maintain their inherent anti-inflammatory properties, mitigating tissue deterioration and promoting tissue regeneration and repair. Due to the high cost and logistical challenges associated with autologous cell therapy production, our company is developing a novel drug, UMSC01 (allogeneic umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells), which serves as an excellent source for allogeneic cell therapy. These umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells can be pre-manufactured and stored for off-the-shelf use, allowing us to realize the concept of 'mass production and shelf-ready sale of cell products.' This significantly reduces cell culture costs while preserving the inherent anti-inflammatory properties and tissue regeneration capabilities of mesenchymal stem cells. This approach holds great market potential and product development value.

org.tc: 聖安生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
1.	SOA101奈米三特異性雙免疫檢查點抗體
•	亞洲領先，唯一靶向癌症細胞上雙免疫檢查點之三特異性抗體。
•	具專一度高之癌症靶點HLA-G及PD-L1/HLA-G雙免疫檢查點抗體，克服癌細胞免疫逃脫，減少抗藥性及提升治療有效性。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。
2.	SOA201 EphA10三特異性T細胞銜接抗體 
•	三特異性抗體靶向雙免疫細胞。
•	EphA10腫瘤抗原在三陰性乳癌高度表現(正常細胞幾乎不表現)，安全性高，解決三陰性乳癌無標靶藥物治療之困境。
•	可活化且增生T cells and NK cells，增加抗癌療效。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。
3.	SOB101工程化外泌體搭載藥物 
•	亞洲領先，唯一具有HLA-G靶點之外泌體抗癌藥。
•	基因工程改質其具備anti-HLAG功能之外泌體，專一結合於腫瘤細胞，有效降低化療藥物用量。
•	可搭載多種藥物。
•	為治療多種實體癌之廣效性新藥。
4.	SOB102新穎抗癌外泌體核酸藥物
•	具備HLA-G靶點，有效及安全的將搭載的核酸藥物及化療藥物送到腫瘤處。
•	可穿過腦血屏障，解決多形性膠質母細胞瘤(GBM)具抗藥性之臨床治療困境。
info.en:
SOA101 Nano Tri-specific Dual Immune Checkpoint Antibody
•	The only triple-specific antibody targeting dual immune checkpoints on cancer cells in Asia.
•	Highly specific cancer-targeting PD-L1 & HLA-G dual immune checkpoint antibodies can overcome the tumor heterogeneity, reduce drug resistance, and improve therapeutic effectiveness.
•	The “Next generation” drug for various solid tumors therapy.
SOA201 EphA10 Tri-specific T cell Engager
•	Tri-specific antibody targets dual immune cells.
•	The EphA10 tumor antigen is highly expressed in TNBC (almost negligible expression in normal cells), providing high safety and provides the solution for unmet medical need of TNBC about lacking targeted drug therapy.
•	Enhancing anti-cancer efficacy by T cells and NK cells activation.
•	The “Next generation” drug for various solid tumors therapy.
SOB101 Drug Payloads Engineered Exosomes
•	The only anti-cancer exosome drug targeting HLA-G in Asia.
•	Engineering exosomes with anti-HLA-G bind to tumor cells specifically, effectively reducing the dosage of chemotherapy drugs. 
•	Multiple drug payloads for cancer therapy.
•	The “Next generation” drug for various solid tumors therapy.
SOB102 Novel Anti-Cancer Exosomal Nucleic Acid Drug 
•	Targeting HLA-G, deliver the carried nucleic acid and chemotherapy drugs to the tumor  effectively and safely.
•	Blood-brain barrier (BBB) crossable and solve the clinical treatment dilemma of drug-resistant glioblastoma multiforme (GBM).

info.tc:
Ezcaring P1 是非穿戴式、高隱私的 AI 智能照護系統，結合 AI 影像辨識技術以及 PPS (privacy protection system) 隱私保護感測技術，給予長輩更高品質的生活，提供居家照護、長照機構、安養中心及醫療院所等敏感場域，最安全、經濟、有效與便利的照護方案。
1. 行為分析：AI 分析統計起床、離床、站立、行走及無動作等行為，提出建議以改善生活習慣。
2. 睡眠分析：偵測平躺、側躺、趴睡等姿勢及睡眠時間統計，分析改善睡眠品質。
3. 跌倒示警：AI識別跌倒行為，即時訊息或通話照護者並警示救護人員。
4. 環境監控：偵測室內溫度與自動感應夜燈，避免夜晚起床時跌倒。
5. 意外通知：長輩長時間無動作、跌倒及闖空門等狀況時緊急示警。

是關心，不是監視。
PPS 技術僅偵測物體移動時所產生之光影變化， 裝設於臥室甚至浴廁，皆無須擔心侵犯長輩隱私的問題，是全球首創連浴室都可以安裝的照護系統。
info.en:
Combining AI image recognition and PPS (privacy protection system) technology, Ezcaring P1 provides the elderly with a high-quality life. It offers the safest, and effective care plan for sensitive areas such as home care, long-term care institutions, and medical institutions.
It has 5 main functions: Behavior analysis/ Sleep analysis/ Fall prevention/ Residence monitoring/ Emergency notification.
Caring for the Elderly with Dignity and Privacy.
PPS technology only detects changes in light and shadow generated by the movement of objects. It can be installed in the bedroom or bathroom without concern for invasion of privacy.

info.tc:
慈濟慈善足跡遍布全球122個國家地區，花蓮慈濟醫院已為國際化醫學中心，37年來在醫療領域中累積的豐碩成果，受到醫界、產官學界以及眾多媒體關注，多年來結合慈善、教育、人文志業，持續為台灣醫療體系帶來創新與希望。
2023年本院攜手各合作機構共同參展主題包含遠距醫療、智慧醫療、細胞治療、特色醫療、創新研發、國際醫療等主題，現場亦提供名醫講座、體驗活動等，敬邀醫療及生技醫藥產業之專業人士、創業投資者、病友及家屬、媒體先進蒞臨。
info.en: Tzu Chi Charity Foundation had set foot around the world in over 122 countries. Therefore, Hualien Tzu Chi Hospital already became an internationalized medical center, which has accumulated many fruitful accomplishments over 37 years in medical aspects. For many years, it collaborated with charity, education, culture main missions and continued to provide innovation and hope within the Taiwan medical systems. Hence, our hospital participates in this exhibition with co-development firms. Our central theme this year is ”Stem cell innovative therapy” followed with other hot issues, including cell therapy, cancer immune treatment, development of new drugs and innovative medical appliances, smart healthcare, preventive medicine, international healthcare, and New Southbound Projects. We hope to share our accomplishments with society. Through this exhibition, our hospital wishes to enhance international links and achieve the initial intention of innovative development with people-oriented thoughts in the end.

info.tc: 國璽幹細胞應用技術股份有限公司於2011年進駐新竹生醫園區，投入幹細胞應用技術開發及幹細胞製劑，克服目前尚未獲得滿足的醫療需求。透過整合醫藥級幹細胞製劑生產技術平台與諸多核心技術，我們已開發多項專有製程技術，並且已將四支幹細胞新藥推動進入臨床試驗。為擴大幹細胞製劑量產規模及提升品質穩定度，國璽除了從製造開始就採用模組製程的思維外，於園區內打造【PIC/S GMP幹細胞製劑藥廠】，穩健地走向規模化量產，同時持續拓展細胞治療領域的開發，與強化細胞治療產業鏈上、中、下游的佈局。
info.en: Gwo Xi Stem Cell Company has established the R&D center for cell therapy development since 2011. We are committed to developing stem cell medicines that have the potential to help patients with unmet medical needs. Our production platform fully comply with medical regulations (Good Tissue Practice, GTP) in Taiwan. We have three clinical trials are ongoing in Taiwan, and one clinical trial is ongoing in Vietnam by now. In the future, we will have established the PIC/S GMP grade stem cell preparation factory (15,225 m2 built-out space) in Hsinchu Biomedical Science Park in Taiwan to put stem cell-based medicinal products into practice.

info.tc:
雲端智慧醫療系統DP4800是啟德電子的主推重點，可以將不同醫療儀器的量測結果同步串接起來，只要掃瞄病歷號碼，就可串接身高體重計、坐秤、扶手秤、嬰兒秤、身高尺等等設備，統一將量測資訊匯入病歷資料內。

org.tc: 台灣檢驗科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
SGS是世界領先的測試、檢驗和驗證公司，是全球公認品質和誠信的標竿。我們擁有超過98,000名員工遍佈於全球2,650多個營運分公司及實驗室，致力創造一個更美好、更安全、更互聯互通的世界。

SGS 在複雜的醫療器材市場上為整個供應鏈的客戶提供專業化服務，以幫助客戶將產品成功投入市場並快速、準確的送到用戶面前。我們為製造商和其供應商提供訓練、檢測和驗證解決方案。
因此 SGS 在台灣已建立相關醫療器材實驗室，包含電性安規測試、電磁相容性測試、機械功能測試、生物相容性測試等，提供更方便的 ONE STOP SHOPPING 測試服務。
除此之外，SGS 台灣更擁有一支優秀的驗證及審核團隊，可為客戶提供一次性整合審核和評估服務以滿足多個標準的要求，例如：同時作 ISO 13485、CE、CMDCAS驗證，並針對醫療器材產品、零組件配合 ISO、EN、ASTM、JIS 等國際規範標準，提供您完整、專業與迅速的檢測服務。
info.en:
We are SGS – the world’s leading testing, inspection and certification company. We are recognized as the global benchmark for sustainability, quality and integrity. Our 98,000 employees operate a network of 2,650 offices and laboratories, working together to enable a better, safer and more interconnected world.

SGS provides professional services to customers throughout the supply chain in the complex medical equipment market to help customers successfully put their products on the market and deliver them to users quickly and accurately. We provide training, testing and verification solutions for manufacturers and their suppliers.

Therefore, SGS has established a related medical equipment laboratory in Taiwan, including electrical equipment safety tests, electromagnetic compatibility tests, mechanical function tests, biocompatibility evaluation, etc., to provide more convenient ONE STOP SHOPPING tests services.

In addition, SGS Taiwan has an excellent verification and audit team, which can provide customers with one-time integrated audit and evaluation services to meet the requirements of multiple standards, such as: ISO 13485, CE, CMDCAS certification at the same time, and We provide you with complete, professional and rapid tests services for medical equipment products and components in accordance with ISO, EN, ASTM, JIS and other international standards.

org.tc: 恩錸富國際有限公司

info.tc:
AmLife恩錸富國際有限公司是橫跨6國的睡眠養生專家，不斷與國際醫學權威單位合作推廣睡眠活動，於日本設廠研發專業醫療器材，將日本電位療法與寢具結合，致力於幫助每個人都能享受高品質的睡眠，從睡眠中創造健康，改善失眠及三高等慢性病，提升生活品質。

本次於台灣醫療科技展上由專業醫療團隊進駐，帶來價值NT$4,500的最新心血管動脈硬化檢測、微循環檢測及專業醫生諮詢服務，免費為民眾的心血管健康及睡眠把關，90秒讓您了解自己的心血管健康狀況。

現場由專業睡眠關懷師及電位治療師服務，提供DeepZleep智能睡眠養生器讓民眾體驗，立即看見心血管狀況的改善。
info.en:
AmLife International Co., Ltd. is a sleep health expert spanning 6 countries. It continuously cooperates with international sleep medicine authorities to promote sleep activities. It has set up factories in Japan to develop professional medical equipment, combines Japanese potential therapy with bedding, and is committed to helping everyone Everyone can enjoy high-quality sleep, create health from sleep, improve insomnia and other chronic diseases, and improve the quality of life.

This time, a professional medical team was stationed at the Taiwan Medical Technology Exhibition, bringing the latest cardiovascular arteriosclerosis testing, microcirculation testing and professional doctor consultation services worth NT$4,500, free of charge to check people's cardiovascular health and sleep, and 90 seconds You know your cardiovascular health.

Professional sleep caregivers and potential therapists are on site to serve, and DeepZleep smart sleep regiments are provided for the public to experience and immediately see improvements in their cardiovascular conditions.

org.tc: 勝得棻國際股份有限公司

info.tc:
自然睡眠、原生科技、共同創造生命品質
睡眠，佔每個人生命時間的三分之一，透過充分的休息能使身體修復與自癒。聽起來很自然的睡眠行為，卻成為現代人夢寐以求的精神奢侈品，入睡或睡好變得不容易。2015年8月睡眠撲滿正式上市，全台灣首創〝獨家SFT頻率晶片＋舒曼波原生頻率〞結合，以高科技、零接觸、零干擾的方式，協助改善人們的睡眠困擾，運用物理方式活化自身修復機制，透過導引頻率共振的機轉，導正身體原本偏差的狀態，協助人們於睡眠時延長深睡期，提升睡眠品質，進而恢復內外在的平衡。
睡眠撲滿專為現代人所設計，當人們越仰賴科技所帶來的方便，無形中3C、WiFi也深深影響使睡眠下降。睡眠撲滿是用科技的方式來處理科技所帶來的問題，讓人們在紛亂的大環境當中，也能得到自然放鬆、安穩睡眠。
info.en:
SleepBank is an exclusive sleeping chip designed for in-depth sleep, SFT(Sleep  Frequency Technology) assisting the prolongation of natural in-depth sleep and allowing the body to initiate the self-curing and repairing mechanisms. 

The current sleep products are mostly measuring sleep environment, turn over, breathing, etc., cannot solve the sleep problem. SleepBank is an innovation solution, after product launched in Taiwan, many media attention and reports.

The SleepBank does not use chemical adjustment of immediate effect. Through SFT, the body and environment are slightly adjusted with harmonic physical resonance. This will increase the in-depth sleeping time, and enhance the sleep quality, allowing you to re-experience the original environment of the Earth. Your body will lie in such cozy environment, achieving natural repair, a self-curing bridge that re-connects the land and the body.

org.tc: 麗媚生化科技有限公司

info.tc:
麗媚生技結合健康技術和生活美學，展示了最新的舒曼波系列智慧傢俱，專為心腦牽引而設計。產品包括單人家庭休閒沙發和冥想墊等，外觀上看起來與普通傢俱無異，使用由工業技術研究院開發的專利腦波拽引裝置，產生"地球的心跳"-舒曼共振。這項技術可以快速誘導深度放鬆狀態。透過使用舒曼波系列智慧傢俱，啟動類似於人體生物鐘節律的過程，使用者可以短時間內補充能量，以促進身心健康，是居家自我照護的新興健康科技產品。

同時運用安全、便利、有效的光子能量科技，台灣設計、國際獎項肯定、新竹科學園區GMP醫療器材廠商製造的Dr. Tai 光能帽。
由中西醫雙主修的戴承杰醫師研發設計，以八爪造型的低能量紅光(LLLT)照射頭部，達到舒眠輔助、養生、頭皮養護之用途，配戴舒適又安全，戴著睡覺也沒問題。這是個人護理在安全性和舒適性方面的重大創新。

麗媚生技不斷的創新以達成共創健康的生活，關懷員工和社會大眾，建立現代人不可缺少的健康產業，追求永續經營和發展。
info.en:
Reibi Bio-technology combines health technology and life aesthetics to display the latest Schumann series of smart furniture, products include single-person family leisure sofas and meditation cushions, etc., using the patented brain wave pulling device developed by ITRI to generate "the heartbeat of the earth"- Schumann resonance can quickly induce a state of deep relaxation, start a process similar to the rhythm of the biological clock of the human body, and promote physical and mental health. It is an emerging health technology product for home self-care.

Using safe, convenient, and effective photon energy technology, Dr. Tai's light energy cap is designed in Taiwan, recognized by international awards, and manufactured by a GMP medical equipment manufacturer in Hsinchu Science Park.

Developed and designed by Dr. Dai Chengjie, who majored in both Chinese and Western medicine, it irradiates the head with low-energy red light (LLLT) in the shape of eight claws to achieve sleep aid, health preservation, and scalp maintenance. It is comfortable and safe to wear. This is a major innovation in personal care safety and comfort.

org.tc: 鴻辰通訊股份有限公司

info.tc:
ible Technology 成立於2015年，首條產品線為穿戴式負離子空氣清淨器（Airvida系列），其產品的誕生，便是希望能隨時隨地帶給人們清淨的空氣，以減少吸入危害身體的PM2.5或容易引起過敏不適的花粉與過敏原。希望科技不僅帶給人們樂趣，也帶給人們健康舒適的環境。

ible Tech. 全新推出 Airvida E1，為全球首創結合穿戴式負離子空氣清淨機及藍牙耳機的創新產品，讓使用者在享受音樂的同時，也能有效提升空氣品質。Airvida E1 在材料、外觀和功能等各方面的設計，榮獲日本 Good Design 產品設計大獎，評審給予高度肯定，同時榮獲2022年國家生技醫療獎防疫類產品第一名。
info.en:
ible Technology is an IOT & wearable device company aiming to protect everyone from harmful airborne substances and create better life with innovative wearable air purifiers.

Airvida E1 is the first wearable ionic air purifier with noise-cancelling earphones in the world. It generates up to 30 million negative ions every 0.6 second to effectively reduce PM2.5, allergens, and viruses breathed in. Its location-based app also provides instant air pollution info wherever we are. The amount of negative ions can be elevated based on the air condition to ensure clean air in wearers' facial area.

大謙採用頂級專業的過濾材料，以材料本身特性做防護運用，不做額外化學添加。讓一切回歸到最簡單、最安心，是願意放心給自己和家人使用的科技防護產品。我們的團隊由濾材、大氣、材料、醫生、設計各領域專業組成，產品除了高階防護功能外，更在意舒適度與注入了產品美學的概念，大謙的產品同時擁有功能性與時尚性，保護自己的同時，也能一起體驗美感。

org.tc: 惠家智醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
惠家智醫致力於研發、設計、製造醫療器材，並透過AIOT及雲端技術，完整分析數據，達到資源共享、個案管理、精準健康促進的目標。
EECP體外反搏治療系統，通過患者心電信號的R波觸發控制氣囊充、排氣的動作。充氣是按照從患者的小腿、大腿到臀部、上臂進行三級序貫加壓，使上、下肢血液在心臟舒張期間灌注上半身，並通過靜脈返回心臟，促進心、腦、肺、腎等器官的血液循環，以改善缺血組織的血液供應。
增肌減脂鑽石儀：以高強度的電磁場，刺激運動神經元，使肌肉進行2萬次以上的收縮，達到強化肌肉的目的。非入式的體雕療程，不需要麻醉或穿刺，快速達成體態美化。
info.en:
HJ DigiHealth is committed to development, design, and manufacturing of medical equipment, and uses AIOT and cloud technology to completely analyze data to achieve the goals of resource sharing, case management, and precise health promotion. Our medical products include: 
1. HJ EECP device is All-in-One. It collects the patient ECG signal, conducts instant R-wave detection, and uses the R-wave trigger to control the inflation and deflation of the air bag. Inflation is a three-level sequential pressurization from the calves, thighs to buttocks and upper arms, so that the blood of the upper and lower limbs can be driven back to the upper body during diastole and returned to the heart through the veins, thus promoting the function of the heart, brain and other organs. blood circulation to improve blood supply to ischemic tissues. 
2. HIFEM device: uses high-intensity electromagnetic fields to stimulate motor neurons and cause muscles to contract more than 20,000 times to achieve the purpose of strengthening muscles. This non-invasive body sculpting treatment and can quickly achieve body beautification.

org.tc: 建菱科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
SmartMotion近紅外深層光療設備PHA901，是利用直接提取太陽紅外線可見光(VIS)和水過濾紅外A(wIRA)的獨家Hydro-light技術，取『近紅外線』600nm~1400nm波段，去除會傷害皮膚及眼睛之紫外光，將皮膚滲透性最好的光波照射到人體體內，提高人體核心體溫(38°C-40°C)之「全波長」全身型光熱療設備，有別於一般僅有單波長之LED設備。

PHA901具有良好的皮膚滲透性，可以將大量紅外線能量注入人體，而無需擔心皮膚灼熱感和灼傷，艙內溫度僅保持約在32°C左右，相當溫和。近紅外線的功效在國際文獻已做很多闡述，可做到抗癌活性、深層排毒、消炎、提高免疫能力、促進代謝、增加膠原蛋白及減少應激蛋白的生成等。
info.en:
JianLing’s new “Near Infrared Deep Photothermal Therapy Equipment PHA901,” which uses solar visible light and infrared A to increase the user’s deep-layer body temperature to 38°C-40°C. With exclusive “Water Filter Infrared A” (wIRA) technology, which can restrict the light wavelength around 600nm to 1400nm, remove ultraviolet light harmful to skin and the eyes, and allow beneficial light power penetrates into the mitochondria of the cell.

PHA901 is capable of injecting elevated levels of near infrared waves into the body, without fear of producing heat on the skin or cause burns. Inside the capsule, the temperature is maintained at around 32°C. The many benefits of using near infrared waves is widely documented in international research, such as counteracting cancer activity, deep detox, anti-inflammatory features, improving the immune system, metabolic activity, and reducing the production of stress proteins.

org.tc: 路迦生醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
免疫細胞療法 (Immunotherapy)是當今治療癌症的新趨勢，癌症免疫療法是幫助免疫系統識別癌細胞，並強化免疫反應，達到摧毀腫瘤的目的。

其中T細胞免疫療法就是強化及活化我們體內的T細胞，而記憶型T細胞具有專一及記憶的特性，作用型T細胞在攻擊完癌細胞後會消耗殆盡功成身退，而記憶型T細胞則會留在身體內，記住腫瘤特徵，等到腫瘤再次出現時即能快速殲滅。

實際的做法是抽取病人血液，經由GTP實驗室將血液中的免疫T細胞大量培養、活化、擴增數量，再回輸病人體內，讓免疫T細胞去對抗癌細胞。
info.en:
Immunotherapy is an emerging trend in current cancer treatment. It enhances our immune system’s ability to recognize cancer cells and strengthen immune response to kill tumor. 

T cell immunotherapy is an approach which enhances and activate T cells inside our body. Memory T cells are highly specific to tumors and have long life-span thus they can provide our body with long term tumor surveillance and eliminate cancer cells efficiently. In comparison, effector T cell acts on local tumor sites only and therefore has short lifespan. 

In actually clinical settings, blood is collected from the patient during the initial step. Isolation, activation and expansion of T cells is conducted in the laboratory. And finally, the T cells which are now being expanded are then infused back into the patient to fight against cancer cells.

info.tc: 訊聯生技集團創立於1999年，以「再生醫學/細胞治療」、「精準健康/基因醫學」、「分子數位科技/智慧研發」三大核心能力，成為亞洲最具國際代表性的生技品牌。旗下「訊聯生技」(2007年-台灣第一家專攻細胞治療上市櫃公司)，通過衛福部核准特管法細胞治療，包括脂肪間質幹細胞與免疫細胞，並持續拓展再生醫學及細胞治療應用範圍、精進醫美/毛髮生長、Exosome等細胞衍生物及細胞製程的品質與技術。2022年成立「訊聯細胞智藥股份有限公司」，加速開發細胞製劑、Exosome的診斷與治療，並結合智慧研發、基因和細胞療法開發技術、數位模擬創新能力，提供更廣大服務。
info.en: BIONET is the first publicly listed company in Taiwan specializing in cell therapy that possesses the core technology and preparation capabilities of medical-grade cell therapy products. The company not only applies cells to more than 60 types of diseases but also provides exosome services. In addition, The Mesenchymal Stem Cell bank was established in 2005. Under the special regulations for cell therapy by the Ministry of Health and Welfare, approved treatments include the use of adipose-derived stem cells for osteoarthritis and chronic wounds, and immune cells (CIK) for the treatment of various cancers such as colorectal cancer, lung cancer, breast cancer, and liver cancer.

info.tc:
對於全球目前所面臨的人口老化及照護能量不足的問題，澄風科技推出一套智慧遠端照護系統「SmartCaring T60」。將T60無線生理訊號感測器安裝於病床上方，感測器會以非接觸式方式偵測靜臥於床上病患的生理參數(心率、呼吸率、體溫)及離床偵測，將這些數據以無線方式傳送並儲存於雲端或後端伺服器，且即時顯示於護理站的電子白板，讓醫照護人員可即時掌握病患生理狀況並於緊急事件發生時，可在第一時間做好醫照護處理。
SmartCaring T60為台灣第一件且市場唯一通過TFDA第二等級醫療器材認證的非接觸式生理訊號監測產品，具備非接觸式、保護隱私、偵測持續不中斷等特色，可提升機構住院安全性，醫照護效率及品質，降低機構人員支出成本。目前已臨床應用於三總血液透析室，術後病房及台中康福護理之家。目前正持續且積極的將產品推廣至各醫療機構及長照中心。
info.en:
StreamTeck has developed the "SmartCaring T60,"a remote caregiving system to address the global challenges of aging populations and a shortage of caregiving resources. The T60 device is positioned above the patient's bed, enabling non-invasive monitoring of essential parameters like heart rate, respiratory rate, body temperature, and bed vacancy detection. This data is wirelessly transmitted and stored in the cloud or backend servers, with real-time display on the nursing station's electronic whiteboard. This system empowers healthcare providers to promptly monitor patients' vital sign status and respond swiftly to emergencies.
The SmartCaring T60 is the first and only non-contact physiological signal monitoring product in Taiwan to obtain TFDA Class II medical device certification. It offers non-contact, privacy-preserving, and continuous monitoring features, enhancing inpatient safety, healthcare efficiency, and quality while reducing institutional personnel costs. It is currently in clinical use across various healthcare settings and is actively being introduced to healthcare institutions and long-term care facilities.

org.tc: 台灣邦妮有限公司

info.tc:
加拿大柏克醫療復健系列
手術後保護、運動傷害保護、肌肉傷害保護輔助、慢性傷害保護
身心舒適的自在生活，就是一種幸福…
源自於對截肢後不適的舒緩…
1969年德裔加拿大籍弗瑞德.侃培(Frieder Kempe)先生致力於柏克研發，其原始動機乃是試圖以物理非侵入性方式給予截肢父親舒適的保護。
第一個原型成品於1978年問世，可方便應用在任何需要保護的部位。不僅嘉惠截肢患者，其他如：運動傷害保護、肌肉傷害保護輔助、手術後保護、慢性症保護等，都建議柏克來改善。多年來已贏得多項國際學會與保健團體的肯定。
柏克系列涵蓋全身：護膝、護腰、包巾、護頸、護帽、護臂、保護背心、護腿、護肘、護腕、護手套、護鼻及截肢護套等。
info.en:
Canada Farabloc Rehabilitation Series
Protection for post-operative care, sports injuries, muscle injuries, and chronic injuries.
A comfortable body and mind in life is a kind of happiness...
Are you concerned that your dear family and friends are in a state of discomfort? They frown and suffer in silence from the torment of constant discomfort. Maybe you want to take on some of the burden, help them get rid of their discomfort, but you feel powerless. With Farabloc's help, the affected limbs can be properly protected, the discomfort alleviated, and mood improved. Farabloc uses love and care in every moment that requires protection.
Originating from providing relief from the discomfort experienced after amputation...
In 1969, Frieder Kempe, a German-Canadian devoted himself to Farabloc's research and development. His original motivation was to try to provide comfort in a non-invasive way for his amputee father.
The first prototype, introduced in 1978, can be easily applied to any limb that needs protection. Benefiting not only amputatee patients, but in cases such as sports injuries, muscle injuries, post-operative care and chronic injuries; they all see improvement with Farabloc use. Over the years, it has won the recognition of many international societies and health care organizations.
The Farabloc series covers the whole body: knee covers, waist belts, blankets, neck wraps, hats, arm guards, vests, leg guard, elbow guard, wrist-palm guards, gloves, nose covers and amputation protectors etc.

info.tc:
歐立達股份有限公司創立於1997年，自2004年開始，和德國運動科學家共同研發及台灣國立陽明大學醫工所楊世偉師生團隊，經歷 10 年改進臨床驗證成功完成富足康科技足墊，順利轉型為足部生物力學為主的產品。
富足康科技足墊獲得國內外各類獎項，包括國家發明創作獎、金質獎、連續三年經濟部標檢局市售友善輔具評選四項優勝等，並獲得全球20年發明專利，以及十餘年國內各大院校產學合作驗證與實例，包括：醫護、農業等久站久走族群、從事各類運動人員、銀髮族、退化性關節炎患者、糖尿病患者等，富足康科技足墊對於消費者的足部健康有極大的幫助。
2022年開始歐立達跨領域研發分散壓力之專業坐墊，與國內知名醫學院合作產學驗證，推出舒壓坐墊頗受消費者好評，持續創新動能。

info.tc:
NANPAO-BIO南寶國際生技是專為您和全家人所設計的全方位營養均衡品牌。採用天然植萃原料優質藍藻(螺旋藻)精製而成，最接近食物原型，完整的補充營養素加乘配方，「天然、純淨、有效」是NANPAO-BIO賜百齡®藍藻的健康三大核心，挑選最好的品質成分做為生產基礎，讓你吃得每一錠營養、吃的安心。

NANPAO-BIO南寶國際生技重視大自然豐富珍貴天然營養素，優質藍藻(螺旋藻)#純淨-百分百純藍藻配方，藍藻富含藻藍素中的植物性蛋白質，天然的藻藍蛋白和人體必需胺基酸組成。高含量且營養豐富的蛋白質、維生素、礦物質、膳食纖維，有助於促進吞噬細胞活性，增加血清IgM抗體生成，具調節身體免疫功能，維持生長發育，調節生理機能，一次補足每日所需營養能量。從源頭到生產皆經過SGS檢驗合格：無重金屬、無塑化劑、微生物符合標準，榮獲國家雙項認可健康食品小綠人標章、SNQ國家品質標章和MONDE SELECTION世界品質大賞金獎國際殊榮。補充優質蛋白質提升身體免疫力，就選NANPAO-BIO賜百齡®藍藻，全素可食。

info.tc:
煦願軒使用傳承四十年，台灣第一創立的古法入甕製作，嚴選具有產銷履歷驗證的台灣紅羽土公雞，確保雞群在無污染及病害的健康環境長大，從育種、飼料、電宰，飼養場一條龍的嚴格控管直至雞精製程控制在72小時內以達保鮮。紅羽土公雞肉品優良，脂肪含量相較其他雞種低，多為不飽和脂肪酸，適合兩歲以上的小兒、青少年、生產前後來攝取的優質蛋白質。滴雞精薑味所使用的老薑也是具有產銷履歷驗證證書，商品在驗證機構的監控下嚴格審視，保證大眾食用的老薑在生產過程不傷害環境同時安全無毒。
煦願軒同步推出高營養價值的滴牛精，從牛隻的挑選開始把關，唯一指定使用台灣牛，取自農會賣相不佳的農產品或農業廢料，例如蔬菜水果、稻穀、牧草組成天然飼育品來維護好肉質，絕不使用瘦肉精、抗生素、生長激素，讓每一口都是安心安全，煦願軒堅持使用同產源同時間宰殺的溫體牛腿肉來進行陶甕蒸煉，全程不加一滴水，完整封存鮮牛精華
*榮獲農委會評選之2023年銀髮友善食品
*2022年 媽媽寶寶雜誌評選專家評鑑團大賞

info.tc:
加捷生醫-甲魚營養保健食品領導品牌
    加捷生醫股份有限公司成立於1995年，是全台灣最具規模的甲魚營養保健食品領導品牌。28年來深耕台灣在地，提供最適合國人體質的保健食品。加捷生醫相信「這片土地擁有能量，能帶給台灣每一個人，生命的力量」，堅持採用台灣在地天然原料，同時友善環境，珍惜與守護我們熱愛的土地，持續研發最適合台灣人的營養保健品，致力於成為守護與陪伴國人健康的首選品牌。
    加捷生醫秉持「品質第一、永續經營」、「堅持採用台灣在地天然原料」、「深化產學合作、累積研發能量」三大信念，嚴選在南台灣美濃優良的人工養殖環境成長的中華甲魚，百分之百在地天然原料，經第三公正單位檢測確認無抗生素、無毒物，再透過熱濃縮技術轉化提煉，嚴格把關原料生產過程與逐批產品檢驗，除了應用現代生物技術創新研發以甲魚成份為主多樣化商品之外，更致力於尋找台灣特有的保健食品元素，開發出符合市場需求並能守護國人健康的營養保健食品。

org.en: National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Sciences

info.tc:
(一)學校發展特色
本校以「培育優質健康照護與管理專業人才」為教育目標。長年深耕護理及健康照護專業，護理考照率與就業率位居全國領先地位，優秀校友遍佈全台醫療院所擔任重要主管幹部。本校訓練學生之專業技術及課程規劃品質與歐美國家齊平，在台灣已為典範，並輸出國際協助友好國家進行醫療照護人才培育。
(二)產學合作專利成果
本校透過外部專利資源的引進，鼓勵教師從事以產業需求為導向之創新性研發，並促進研發成果申請專利，此外，亦透過跨校跨域的專業合作，由教師帶領學生持續研發護理及健康照護領域之產品發想、創新創意或產學研發成果，以落實教學創新，提升師生智財產能。
(三)創新育成發展
本校育成中心以打造全台第一健康照護產業創業服務平台為目標，以健康照護、銀髮樂活、生技醫療為發展特色。提供優質培育環境與友善的創新育成服務，強化行銷策略並輔導廠商取得營運資源，提供之各項服務：顧問輔導與諮詢服務、育成辦公室與公共空間等。
info.en:
National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Sciences (NTUNHS) is Taiwan's first institute of higher learning for nursing and health related studies. Our university is not only a pioneer in the domain of nursing and health care but also the sole institution offering a doctoral nursing program among the vocational education system in Taiwan.

NTUNHS was founded in 1954 as the Taiwan Provincial Junior College of Nursing. In August 2010, the Ministry of Education approved the school's new name, the "National Taipei University of Nursing and Health Sciences,"in recognition of the school's outstanding and continuing pedagogical achievements. NTUNHS has three colleges: the College of Nursing, the College of Health Technology, and the College of Human Development and Health. NTUNHS focuses on providing comprehensive health care education, enhancing healthcare quality, and taking care of every stage of human life cycle.

Since 2010, NTUNHS has been awarded and sponsored by Ministry of Education’s “Teaching Excellence Project” as recognition to NTUNHS’s dedication to cultivate top-quality health care professionals. Moreover, NTUNHS is awarded MOE’s “Model Technological University Project Grant”. NTUNHS is proudly ranked by Business Weekly Magazine and 104 Job Bank Corporation as Top 1 University with the highest college graduates employment rate in Taiwan.

NTUNHS has become a model for health care education through years of hard work and carefully planned expansion. Our university is a high quality academia institution that aims become a focal point for health care knowledge and a training center for Taiwan's next generation health care talents.

info.tc:
uLife Plus 身心檢測儀是由台灣研發製造之可攜式心率儀，運用精準心電圖量測與心跳率變異度分析，結合專業醫師完整判讀與報告設計，可以清楚得知量測者身心健康狀態，並透過自律神經失調的分類法，提供合適的自律神經健康調適方案，幫助達到完善居家健康管理。
Mood Translator 情緒壓力感測器是一台能夠感測人體的心率活動的裝置，具有量測心率、活力年齡、心情、壓力等多項功能，同時兼具使用方式簡單、尺寸小巧迷你便於隨身攜帶、收納。
info.en: uLife Plus Physical and Mental monitor is a portable heart rate monitor developed and manufactured in Taiwan. It uses accurate electrocardiogram measurement and heart rate variability analysis, combined with complete interpretation and report design by professional doctors, to clearly know the physical and mental health status of the measurer, and via the classification of autonomic disorders, providing appropriate autonomic health adjustment solutions to help achieve perfect in-house health management serves.

org.tc: 無國界醫師

info.tc:
無國界醫生 / Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF)是一個獨立的國際醫療人道救援組織，致力為受武裝衝突、流行病、傳染病和天災影響，以及遭醫療體系排拒者提供緊急醫療援助，並基於人們的需要提供援助，不受種族、宗教、性別或政治因素左右。
目前無國界醫生在全球有超過400個醫療專案正在執行中，包含土敘大地震的醫療救護，烏克蘭的醫療列車、地中海難民的搜救船和羅興亞人的醫療及心理照護等。
期盼大家來攤位，認識世界上正在發生的人道危機，也透過捐款的直接行動，幫助身處困境的脆弱群體，與無國界醫生一同為人道醫療救援努力！
info.en:
Doctors Without Borders/Médecins Sans Frontières (MSF) was founded in 1971 in France by a group of doctors and journalists in the wake of war and famine in Biafra, Nigeria. Their aim was to establish an independent organization that focused on delivering emergency medical humanitarian aid quickly, effectively, and impartially.
Three hundred volunteers made up the organization when it was founded, including doctors, nurses, logistics experts, and other staff, including the 13 founding members. MSF was established on the belief that all people should have access to high quality health care, regardless of gender, race, religion, creed, or political affiliation. From the start, our teams made a commitment not just to care for patients but to bear witness to their experiences and speak out to call attention to the problems driving emergency needs.
Over the past five decades, MSF has grown from a group of a few hundred volunteers to an international movement of more than 63,000 staff providing over 10 million medical consultations in more than 70 countries every year. But the core values of humanitarianism, independence, neutrality, and impartiality that brought those original members together in 1971 continue to drive our work.

info.tc: 近年注重養生及健康的風氣盛行，中草藥、保健食品及植物新藥的研發日益重要，本技術透過連結精準農業與預防醫學的跨域合作，打造「藥食同源魚腥草智慧化生產及精準功效成分分析平台」，成功發現魚腥草發揮老藥新用原理以及搭配在地種植特色，利用AI系統分析發掘潛在之植物素材新穎功效性成分及機轉、透過科學性驗證確認保健功效機轉及適應症之應用，並結合源頭科技栽培管理系統標準化生產，搭配精準施用代謝工程所開發之微生物肥料，調控功效性成分合成之效率，把關植物素材品質，並導入透明且自動化的溯源管理系統把關，確保符合GACP安全栽培標準。本技術解決植物素材生產品質不易掌控、功效成分新機制探究時間長、傳統萃取高溫導致功效性成分降解失活的問題。透過本計畫奠定植物素材種植、萃取、有效成分及配方標準化，將大健康保健產業向上游延伸，加入標準化作物的生產管理，以專業服務的方式切入市場，配合科學數據來達到開發市場之新局面。
info.en: A platform for intelligent agricultural production and precise functional compound analysis of medicinal and edible root crops-Houttuynia cordata is built. Through an AI prediction system, the mechanisms of plant functional compounds will be analyzed to allow screening of existing drugs or products for new uses. Moreover, plants harboring functional compounds that can be integrated into health care products will be mass-cultivated under the guidance of an automated precision agriculture IoT system designed to apply metabolically engineered microbial fertilizers for optimal synthesis of functional compounds. The platform solves the key problems of speed and consistency in development of health care products. Instead of the traditional method of experimentally exploring the mechanism and function of compounds, which is time-consuming and limits progress, the platform implements an AI prediction system to significantly reduce time needed to select potentially useful compounds. In addition, the precision agriculture IoT system enables reliable and optimal synthesis of functional compounds in accordance with GACP safety cultivation standards, thus maintaining quality and traceability of ingredients used to manufacture health care products between batches. Overall, the platform greatly streamlines the development of plant-based health care products by standardizing identification, verification, and mass-production of functional compounds.

info.tc:
純度99.9%紅銅鍋蒸餾器以及呈現產出精油(ESSENTIAL OILS)和純露(HYDROSOLS)
介紹紅銅鍋的特性
紅銅鍋蒸餾器是一種用途廣泛的蒸餾裝置，具有一些獨特的特性和優勢。
以下是紅銅鍋蒸餾器的主要特性：
1.優異的熱導性：紅銅是一種良好的熱導體，這使得紅銅鍋蒸餾器能夠迅速且均勻地傳遞熱量，促進蒸餾過程中的高效能。
2.耐腐蝕性：紅銅具有出色的耐腐蝕性，對於酸性和鹼性物質的抵抗能力較強，這使得它成為蒸餾各種液體，尤其是酒精和香料等食品和飲料的理想選擇。
3.抗菌性：紅銅具有抗菌性能，這有助於在蒸餾過程中保持較高的衛生水平，防止細菌和微生物的滋生，確保產品的純淨度和質量。
4.美觀與傳統風格：紅銅材質質感高雅，通常呈現金屬光澤和溫暖的色調，因此紅銅鍋蒸餾器在廚房中也可作為裝飾品使用。它還與傳統風格相匹配，增添了一份古樸和藝術氛圍。
5.良好的耐用性：紅銅材質堅固耐用，長期使用下不易變形或破損，只要得到適當的保養，紅銅鍋蒸餾器能夠持久地為您服務。
6..熱散熱性：紅銅鍋蒸餾器的熱散熱性能非常好，這有助於迅速冷卻蒸餾液體並轉化為液態狀態，從而增加了蒸餾的效率。
7.紅銅鍋還又另一項特性.它能去除水中的硫化物..讓蒸餾水更加有風味.
info.en:
PURE COPPER DISTILLER WITH ESSENTIAL OILS & HYDROSOL.
The copper distiller still has several distinctive features and advantages. 
Here are the main characteristics of copper distiller:
1.Excellent heat conductivity: Red copper is a great heat conductor, allowing the pot still to quickly and evenly transfer heat, facilitating highly efficient distillation processes.
2.Corrosion resistance: Red copper exhibits outstanding resistance to corrosion, making it an ideal choice for distilling various liquids, especially alcoholic beverages and flavored extracts.
3.Antibacterial properties: Red copper possesses natural antibacterial properties, ensuring a higher level of hygiene during the distillation process, preventing the growth of bacteria and microorganisms, and ensuring product purity and quality.
4.Aesthetics and traditional style: The texture and warm color tones of red copper add an elegant touch, making the red copper pot still a decorative piece in the kitchen. It also complements traditional aesthetics, exuding a rustic and artistic atmosphere.
5.Durability: Red copper is a sturdy and durable material that is resistant to deformation or damage over prolonged use. With proper care and maintenance, the red copper pot still can serve you for a long time.
6.Efficient heat dissipation: The red copper pot still excels in heat dissipation, aiding in the rapid cooling of distilled liquids and their conversion into liquid form, thereby enhancing the efficiency of the distillation process.
7.The red copper pot also has another feature. It can remove the sulfide in the water.. It makes the distilled water more flavorful.

info.tc:
硒在1972年被世界衛生組織(WHO)公布是人體必需的微量元素， 2003年美國FDA規定含硒的食品可標示抗癌功能。目前在NCBI(美國國家生物技術資訊中心)收錄有關硒的國際醫學期刊論文已累計超過44000篇。已證實硒在抗氧化、及癌症、新血管疾病、糖尿病、失智症、阿茲海默症、巴金森氏症及紅斑性狼瘡等重大疾病的機制性表現。硒元素也獲得長壽元素、抗癌之王、心血管的保護神、天然胰島素、生命的火種及天然的解毒劑之美譽。
    市面上的硒絕大部分為用化學硒經酵母或微生物轉化成的酵母硒，轉化率不高，且其毒性仍高及人體吸收利用率低等缺失，所以醫學建議每日不能超過400微克。幸運花富硒777植物硒複方膠囊乃用天然無機硒(非化學硒)經過植物轉化而成的高單位植物硒、蘿蔔硫素、天然維生素C與維生素E螯合而成。已獲得有機硒含量達98.7%之認證。幸運花富硒777可以說是目前功能最強的純天然有機硒。
info.en:
Selenium was announced by the World Health Organization (WHO) in 1972 as an essential trace element for the human body.In 2003, the US FDA stipulated that foods containing selenium can be labeled as anti-cancer functions. At present, more than 44,000 papers on selenium have been included in the NCBI (National Center for Biotechnology Information). Selenium has been shown to be manifestation in antioxidant, major diseases such as cancer, neovascular disease, diabetes, dementia, Alzheimer's disease, Parkinson's disease and Lupus erythematousa,etc. Selenium has also gained the reputation of longevity element, king of anti-cancer, cardiovascular protector, natural insulin, spark of life and natural detoxifier.
    Most of the selenium on the market is yeast selenium converted by yeast or microorganisms with chemical selenium, the conversion rate is not high, and its toxicity is still high and the human absorption utilization rate is low, so the medical advice not exceed 400 micrograms per day. Our Lucky Flower 777 Plant Selenium complex capsule is a high-unit plant selenium, from natural soid selenium (non-chemical selenium) converted by plants and chelate sulforaphane, natural vitamin C and vitamin E. It has obtained certification of organic selenium content of 98.7%. It can be said that Lucky Flower 777 Plant Selenium is the most powerful pure natural organic selenium at present.

info.tc: 硒鍺先生產品皆含有超級食物營養素。主要產品有：1）硒鍺米 ，2)稻中寳（硒鍺米糠），3）硒鍺茶，4）硒鍺海水螺旋藻。以上都是目前世界獨一的功能性食物。硒元素和鍺元素都是人體的必需營養素，硒元素是冬蟲夏草的主要成分，人體缺乏硒元素會有癌症，心臟病，各種心血管疾病，肝病，糖尿病，白内障等40多種的疾病；鍺元素是人參的主要成分，鍺是吃的氧，攝取鍺元素可以增加身體内的氧氣。缺氧是萬病之源；但是台灣的土壤缺乏硒元素和鍺元素，因此每天吃1）硒鍺米 ，2)稻中寳（硒鍺米糠），3）硒鍺茶，4）硒鍺海水螺旋藻，由日常飲食攝取硒元素和鍺元素，是養生好方法。
info.en:
All of our company's products are classified as nutraceuticals, and our main products include:
1.	SeGe Rice (selenium & germanium rich rice);
2.	Treasure Bran (SeGe-rich bran);
3.	SeGe High Mountain Tea (selenium & germanium rich high mountain tea), and
4.	SeGe Spirulina (selenium & germanium rich spirulina).
All of these are currently the world's only functional foods with such properties.
Both selenium and germanium are essential nutrients for the human body. Selenium is the main component of Cordyceps sinensis, and the human body's lack of selenium can lead to over 40 types of diseases, including cancer, heart disease, various cardiovascular diseases, liver disease, diabetes, and cataracts. Germanium is the main component of ginseng, and it is like "oxygen"for the body. By consuming germanium, the body can increase its oxygen levels, as oxygen deficiency is the source of many diseases.
However, Taiwan's soil is deficient in selenium and germanium, and Cordyceps sinensis and ginseng are expensive and not affordable for everyone. Therefore, eating 1) SeGe rice, 2) Treasure Bran (SeGe-rich bran), 3) SeGe High Mountain Tea, and 4) SeGe Spirulina daily is a great way to obtain selenium and germanium from our daily diet and promote health.

info.tc:
家中的隱形敵人-室內空氣污染
可能成為致命威脅！ 
您知道嗎？室內空氣中的污染物濃度，常常遠高於室外 ‼️
根據世界衛生組織（WHO）的說法，室內空氣污染是一件非常真實和危險的事情。不但衍生出潛在的危險，還會嚴重影響您的生活品質 
Ritello，室內的守護者
室內，不該是隱藏的污染場所。Ritello 堅守與大自然相似的原則，用最堅固的元素——水，捕捉每一絲灰塵、過敏源和污染物。清新的水洗循環，讓您的家重新呼吸 健康新風將至，從室內開始
Ritello 水濾式空氣清淨系統，為您的家增添一抹純凈。保護每個呼吸，讓您的家充滿健康，走向更美好的明天
info.en:
The invisible enemy of the home - indoor air pollution
Can become a mortal threat! 
Did you know? The concentration of pollutants in indoor air is often much higher than that in outdoor air !️
According to the World Health Organization (WHO), indoor air pollution is a very real and dangerous thing. Not only are there potential dangers, but they can also seriously affect your quality of life 
Ritello, the guardian of the interior
Indoors should not be hidden polluted places. Ritello adheres to principles similar to nature, using the strongest element – water – to capture every trace of dust, allergens and pollutants. Fresh wash cycles to re-breathe your home 
Healthy fresh air is coming, starting indoors
Ritello Water Filter Air Purifier adds a touch of purity to your home. Protect every breath and fill your home with health towards a better tomorrow

info.tc: 寬譜醫學科技創立於1990年，是首家通過GMP認證、取得遠紅外線醫療器材許可證的公司，其研發、製造的寬譜遠紅外線治療儀，已是遠紅外線醫療保健領域之領導品牌，全球超過20國、共超過2000家醫療院所採用。 寬譜遠紅外線治療儀廣泛用於各項居家理療保健，深獲民眾信賴；並受到醫療專業人士的肯定，是各大醫院、診所必備的醫療設備，在心血管外科、整型外科、血液透析、復健、中醫及各類病房均有運用。寬譜更與國內、外多家醫學研究單位合作，完成多項遠紅外線療法研究，發表於國際權威醫學期刊的研究論文迄今超過70篇。
info.en: Founded in 1990, WS Far IR Medical Technology Co., Ltd. has been the pioneer in FIR industry. We proudly present Firapy (Far-Infrared Therapy Unit), our innovative and multinational patented product worldwide. Firapy is commonly used in Taiwan for treatment in various clinical divisions as well as homecare. We received 510(k) and CE certification early in the yeas. We will strive to improve our products and conduct both domestic and foreign clinical research.

info.en: To enhance people's physical and mental health, the Council of Agriculture (COA) establish "Agricultural Healthcare Technology Pavilion,"including four themes to highlight current research and development of agri-biotechnology, and to strengthen people's understanding of medical-related agricultural technology.

info.en: The technology transferred from the Academy of Agricultural Sciences - Salvia miltiorrhiza extraction technology has been experimentally tested to have anti-inflammatory, stimulating melanin growth... and other functions. It is suitable for the development of scalp care products. The combination of Salvia miltiorrhiza extract has dual certifications from the US FDA GRAS and the United States Department of Agriculture USDA, and has been detected by the Academy of Agricultural Sciences as Ganoderma lucidum polysaccharides that can stimulate the proliferation of hair follicle cells. This is how Zero2One Luminous Scalp Nourishing Serum developed by Dasheng Biotechnology was born. Senior artist-Xu Nailin is endorsed by personal experience and testimony Director-level TCM physician-Cai Fuguang, physician endorsement of Hanwei TCM Clinic

info.tc:
1.	展示水耕蔬菜
將農場蔬菜直接帶來展會中，透過人員解說、展會佈置，讓消費者直接能了解智慧農業的原理及技術。
2.	設立健康的『食』踐場

3.體內環保體驗區
藥食同源，傾聽身體的聲音。源鮮相信好農業是最好的營養輔助。多年來源鮮精心設計的營養品:羽衣纖子(羽衣甘藍益生菌)、沙棘果油、微燃等，皆含有最純粹的植物因子於其中，可讓忙碌的人們輕鬆彌補三餐的不足。
4.品牌形象招牌、農場體驗卷發放。
info.en:
YesHealth Group is a builder and operator of indoor vertical farms. Our mission is to produce healthy food through sustainable agriculture. More than just a vertical farming technology provider, we pass on know-how to our partners, helping them to achieve commercial success.

Health and sustainability is the essence of everything we do. We research and develop all of our technologies in-house to ensure that each part improves health, sustainability, and efficiency across the whole vertical farm. Our team has proven its capability in designing, building, and operating some of the world's largest and most efficient vertical farms.

Our R&D center was established in 2010, and our commercial operations began in 2013. In Taiwan, our vertical farm has grown into a profitable business, supplying supermarkets and restaurants, while also selling direct to consumers via our own ecommerce and logistics channel. More than just a farm, we welcome thousands of guests every month, including school groups and tourists, diners at our restaurant, and shoppers at our store.

org.tc: 睿嘉生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
您是否注意到身邊越來越多人有食物過敏的困擾？

食物過敏是指人體免疫系統對食物中某些物質產生反應。患者一旦誤食過敏原，輕微的會產生嘴唇或面部腫脹、蕁麻疹、氣管收縮、嘔吐或腹瀉等症狀，嚴重者甚至可能造成生命危險。而食物過敏至今仍缺少有效藥物治療，預防的方法主要是靠日常避免誤食特定的過敏原。

「Agitest食品過敏原快速檢測試劑」能夠協助患者迅速判斷食物中是否含有過敏原，降低患者誤食風險。本系列產品具有操作簡單、檢測迅速、結果準確與攜帶方便等特點，且已針對麩質、牛乳、大豆、雞蛋、花生、杏仁、芝麻、蕎麥、魚、蝦蟹、芒果等11個常見過敏原開發出檢測試劑，提供飽受食物過敏之苦的患者一個有效的解決方案。

本系列產品除一般消費者包裝外，也提供大包裝予食品工業品管人員，做為產線清潔確效的工具。知名大廠如統一、卜蜂、興霖、中立等，即利用本產品協助進行生產線上的品質控管。
info.en: Food allergy is an immune system reaction that occurs soon after eating a certain food. Symptoms of food allergy in mild cases include lip or face swelling, hives, swelling of the throat, vomiting, or diarrhea, but it can also be life-threatening like difficulty breathing and loss of consciousness. There is still a lack of effective drug treatment for food allergy, and to prevent food allergy mainly relies on daily avoidance of intaking certain allergens.

org.tc: 澄交生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 澄交生技於2019年成立，2020年獲得國發基金天使投資，2022年登錄創櫃板，股票代碼7627，實收資本額為新台幣3,500萬元，公司位於南科育成中心，利用農業可利用資源開發保健食品機能性原料與口服新藥包埋材料，已成功開發香蕉抗性澱粉、香蕉皮精華粉、扁實檸檬濃縮精華粉、魚鱗鈣、草莓葉萃取物等原料並用於5款保健食品和一款保養品的產品開發，產品以腸道保健益生菌、改善代謝機能、提高睡眠品質與骨骼強健的功效性為主，以全球市場的銷售布局，將原料與產品推向國際，成就台灣農業的驕傲；公司以香蕉抗性澱粉的原料已成功開發專屬的包埋技術並應用於微菌治療與疫苗的新藥研發，包括: 1. 口服肝癌疫苗2. 微菌叢移植口服劑型3. 抑制癌細胞轉移的植物新藥。本次參展希望取得天使投資者、創投、策略合作夥伴與保健食品通路商的合作機會。
info.en: Fecula Biotech Co., Ltd. was established in February 2019. Issued capital is NTD 35 million, one of shareholder is National Development Fund. Fecula Biotech is an early-stage drug development company located in southern Taiwan. Our mission is to develop microbiome-based therapeutics and vaccine. The pipeline includes (1) Oral delivery of HCC vaccine; (2) oral FMT capsule for cancer adjuvant therapy; (3) Botanical drug for the inhibition of cancer invasion and metastasis. In addition, we also implemented an evidence-based approach in our development of microbiome-based dietary supplements. Our promising results from microbiome and probiotics research boosted our dietary supplement development. By combining the strength of probiotics and new agricultural resources, the microbiota-related (probiotic) dietary supplements were launched and market products all over the world. The function of these supplements varies from improving glucose metabolism, which increases day-to-day energy, to boosting calcium that strengthens bones, and to help improve sleep quality. We thank you for your interest in our company and welcome any kind of cooperative opportunities.

org.tc: 松輝有機茶園

info.tc:
佳葉龍茶是一種含高量γ-胺基丁酸（GABA）的天然茶品，所以佳葉龍茶又稱GABA茶，由於在厭氧狀態下製成，風味有點果酸香及特殊茶香，茶色也較濃，佳葉龍茶具有良好的降壓和解酒保健功效，這種GABA胺基酸可抑制哺乳動物中樞神經系統過度興奮，對腦部具有安定作用，有助於放鬆和消除神經緊張，當體內缺乏GABA時，會發生焦慮、不安、疲倦、憂慮等情況。
喝了佳葉龍茶後，普遍感覺較舒適及不易疲勞和頭疼等症狀。
info.en:
Jiā yè lóng chá shì yīzhǒng hán gāo liàng g-àn jī dīng suān (GABA) de tiānrán chá pǐn, suǒyǐ jiā yè lóng chá qǐyuán yú GABA chá, yīn zài yàn yǎng zhuàngtài xià zhì chéng, fēngwèi yǒudiǎn guǒ suān xiāng jí tèzhǒng chá xiāng, chásè yě jiào nóng, jiā yè lóng chá jùyǒu liánghǎo de jiàng yā héjiě jiǔ bǎojiàn gōngxiào, zhè zhǒng GABA àn jī suān kě tiáojié zhōngshū shénjīng xìtǒng guòdù xīngfèn, duì nǎo bù'āndìng zuòyòng, yǒu zhù yú fàngsōng hé xiāochú shénjīng jǐnzhāng, dāng nèidì quēfá GABA shí, huì fāshēng jiāolǜ, bù ān, píjuàn, yōulǜ děng qíngkuàng.
Hēle jiā yè lóng chá hòu, pǔbiàn gǎndào jiào shūshì jí pífá hé tóuténg děng zhèngzhuàng.

org.tc: 森康食品有限公司

info.tc:
植物滴雞精-國內第一支大豆植物雞精
農試所大豆發酵製作植物雞精技術，是透過發酵、後熟及萃取等程序，
獲得富含支鏈胺基酸的植物雞精；此技術採用商業菌種進行發酵，
大豆經發酵釋放出部分游離胺基酸，再透過後熟技術促使更多蛋白質水解，
獲得更多游離支鏈胺基酸，並大幅提升鮮味物質。

農試所表示，傳統雞精各廠牌產品的支鏈胺基酸含量不同，
但以農試所試驗取得樣品比較，大豆植物雞精的支鏈胺基酸含量甚至可達傳統雞精10倍以上。
info.en:
The soybean fermentation technology of the Agricultural Research Institute for the production of plant chicken essence is to obtain plant chicken essence rich in branched-chain amino acids through processes such as fermentation, post-cooking and extraction; this technology uses commercial strains for fer- mentation, and soybeans release part of free amines after fermentation Base acid, and then through post-ripening technology to promote more protein hydrolysis, obtain more free branched-chain amino acids, and greatly enhance the umami substances.

According to the Agricultural Research Institute, the content of branched-chain amino acids in traditional chicken essence products is different, but com- pared with the samples obtained by the Agricultural Research Institute, the branched-chain amino acid content of soybean plant chicken essence can even reach more than 10 times that of traditional chicken essence.

org.tc: 臺萃生技股份有限公司

info.tc:
臺萃生技股份有限公司是專業植物萃取製造商，2008年，在多位資深研發專家、業務經理人以及研究機構之參與協助下成立，為具有多年醫藥背景，結合專業食品、飲料、生藥經驗的生物萃取技術公司，是業界高成效、高品質生物萃取物的首選供應者。

臺萃生技之高頻低溫萃取技術Super Dash® 乃領先全球之生物萃取技術，擁有生物萃取技術設備之美國、台灣、大陸及德國專利。連續式萃取讓我們提高產量，提昇效率。 藉由不同萃取溫度與萃取時間的設定技術，我們可以達到萃取條件最佳化，增加有效成分含量提取。

臺萃產品最大特色為利用超音波震盪原理，瞬間將植物細胞壁震破，用水萃技術，萃取出高風味原液，完全不用溶劑，所以沒有溶劑殘留問題，對人體更安全、更有益。

如果你對我們的產品有興趣，歡迎隨時聯繫我們，我們將提供最好的服務給您。
info.en:
Exland Biotechnology Inc. from Taiwan is the manufacturer, suppliers, and exporter of functional plant extracts. Our R&D department is staffed with the professional and experienced experts in plants and traditional herbs. We are committed to produce plant extracts and traditional herbs extracts in more than 10 years.

With patented Super Dash® high efficiency extraction technologies Exland Biotechnology Inc. is able to purify active ingredients in a short period of time. By utilizing pure water extraction, our products have ZERO organic solvent residues. It’s better and healthier for the body.

We cooperate with the leading food companies worldwide, manufactured more than 100 high quality plant extracts and serve as a professional OEM/ODM extraction company in Taiwan.

org.tc: 薑黃王生機實業股份有限公司

info.tc:
參展產品 
1.薑黃明亮膠囊

5.薑黃活力 D+ 膠囊

嚴選台灣原生種綠檸檬，專利工藝製程及獨家的菌種，在零添加的條件下，保留了整顆檸檬連皮帶籽的營養成分，使營養分子更小更有利人體吸收，小小一瓶就有完整檸檬的營養成分。

*萃綠維生素C複合粉：協同維生素C免受氧化破壞  *萃綠消化酵素：5大分解酵素，幫助消化無負擔
*萃綠醇白美妍粉：萃綠檸檬烯，煥白從基底做起，穩定黑色素母細胞，抗激進不反黑

org.tc: 蓁愛養生食品有限公司

info.tc:
蓁愛食品為一家專業專業陶甕滴精食品廠，為全台第一間通過產銷履歷的陶甕滴雞精加工廠，以陶甕煉製各式滴精產品，並以自有品牌「蓁愛」進行銷售；除此之外，還可以接受客製化代工生產。蓁愛所生產的滴精，傳承阿嬤心疼兒孫、愛家人而用心滴雞精，以沉甸甸的古早陶甕細火慢燉萃取精華，愛的精神在蓁愛養生代代傳承，每一口滴精都能喝出天然香濃的古早好味道。現任負責人楊麗燕表示，上一代經營人曾強調，從事食品業務必做到「冰箱一開，任何一包（產品）都敢給自己小孩吃」的堅持，絕不跟自己的良心拔河，現階段不急著擴廠，而是先嚴格把關品質，並在台灣、香港、新加坡等既有客戶基礎之上，拓展日本等新市場業務。
【發展沿革】
2011年成立全台第一間用陶甕滴雞精的食品工廠
2013年通過ISO22000食品安全管理系統國際驗證
2013年通過HACCP危害分析重要管制點國際驗證
2014年通過產銷履歷農產品滴雞精加工驗證(全台首家)

info.tc: 潤之泉為生產天然無添加瓶裝飲料逾30年之廠商，從飲品開發至製造及品質控管皆有相當深厚之經驗。潤之泉植物滴雞精的問世，有鑑於公司發現市售滴雞精對素食者或對於肉類雞精之肉腥味較敏感的族群來說選擇相對有限，因此公司致力於研發以植物為基底、亦同時可達與肉類雞精相同之抗疲勞、補充體力為訴求的產品。潤之泉植物滴雞精特別選用台灣在地黑豆，經講究的發酵及後熟技術、鮮萃出整顆黑豆的營養及甘醇好味道，此繁複的工法的及獨特的技術，讓潤之泉純天然植物滴雞精得富含支鏈胺基酸，同於一般肉類滴雞精主訴的營養價值，支鏈胺基酸小分子特性，對人體吸收佳，讓消費者於追求養身及補充體力時，得有純天然且對環境更加友善的選擇。
info.en:
Ruhn Chan has been a manufacturer of natural, additive-free bottled beverages for over 30 years, with extensive experience in everything from beverage and food development to manufacturing and quality control. The introduction of Plant-Based Chicken Essence stems from the company's realization that the options for vegetarian or those sensitive to the meaty taste of traditional chicken essence were relatively limited in the market. Therefore, Ruhn Chan is dedicated to developing a product based on plant ingredients that can offer the same benefits in terms of fatigue resistance and energy replenishment as traditional meat-based chicken essence.
Ruhn Chan’s Plant-Based Chicken Essence specially selects locally sourced black soybeans from Taiwan. Through meticulous fermentation and post-ripening techniques, it extracts the nutrition and rich, mellow flavor from whole black soybeans. This intricate and unique process enables Ruhn Chan’s Plant-Based Chicken Essence to be rich in branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs), offering the same nutritional value as traditional meat-based chicken essence. The small molecule properties of branched-chain amino acids (BCAAs) make them highly absorbable by the human body, allowing consumers to make a natural and environmentally friendly choice when pursuing wellness and energy replenishment.

info.tc:
隨著超高齡化社會的來臨，慢性病人口逐年快速增長，根據健保署資料統計台灣兩
大慢性病-腎臟病及糖尿病人口分別為 200 萬人及 250 萬人，且兩者皆為不可逆的疾病，
僅能透過飲食及藥物治療，其中飲食控制最為重要，醫院營養師皆會要求患者遵循特定
飲食原則，以延緩病情的惡化，然而市面上缺乏飲食控制的天然食物，導致飲食控制難
以遵循，影響疾病的治療成效。為此我們看到了飲食控制的市場缺口，結合醫學及生物
科技，以精準營養專利技術應用於天然食材栽培，開發慢性病族群飲食專用真食物，現
已開發出低鉀蔬果、低蛋白米、富鉻蔬果，透過專業醫護人員推廣，幫助腎臟病族群及
糖尿病族群更有效的落實飲食控制。
info.en:
With the advent of an ultra-aging society, the population of chronic disease patients is 
rapidly expanding year by year. According to the data statistics from the National Health 
Insurance Administration, there are approximately 2 million individuals suffering from chronic 
kidney disease and 2.5 million individuals with diabetes in Taiwan. Both conditions are 
irreversible and can only be managed through dietary adjustments and medication. Among 
these treatment methods, dietary control plays a pivotal role, with hospital nutritionists 
emphasizing specific dietary principles to slow down the progression of the diseases. However, 
the market lacks natural foods tailored for dietary control, making it challenging for patients to 
adhere to these guidelines, consequently affecting the efficacy of disease treatment. Identifying 
this gap in the market for dietary control, we have combined medical and biotechnology to 
apply precise nutritional patent technology in the cultivation of natural ingredients. Through 
this approach, we have successfully developed specialized real foods catered to the needs of 
the chronic disease population, including low-potassium fruits and vegetables, low-protein rice, 
and chromium-rich produce. By collaborating with healthcare professionals, we aim to assist 
kidney disease and diabetes patients in implementing more effective dietary control.

info.tc:
浦田竹鹽，嚴選台灣2000海拔，高山特有種桂竹，結合大海純淨的自然的精華，為了燒出的溫泉味，以接近熔岩的高溫，黑夜與白晝不停地燒烤三天三夜。每一個步驟都是關鍵。
 
● 竹鹽水 取代運動飲料:
1. 運動、工作流汗
2. 感冒發燒
3.日常調理
 
竹鹽水調製比例:
竹鹽水含豐富電解質與礦物質，可取代運動飲料。水600cc+竹鹽4克的比例，接近生理食鹽水比例，最符合人體滲透壓，快速吸收水分與電解質。可依自身狀況增減，調整適合自已的口感。如運動或流汗後，竹鹽用量可稍微增加一些。

● 竹鹽料理建議:
浦田竹鹽為鹼性鹽，是許多日式燒肉、居酒屋與高級燒肉店指定用鹽，融於口中有淡淡溫泉味，是森林與大海結合的美味! 且竹鹽使用海鹽燒製，鈉含量低於一般精鹽，食用無負擔!
適用: 燒烤、炸物、醃肉，料理百搭。

info.tc:
桂冠營養研究室2023年展出的項目有:
一、	膳食臨床實驗，與國立陽明交通大學產學合作，針對台灣50-75歲肌少症風險族群進行實驗。探討應用桂冠健力湯於日常膳食，藉以增加蛋白質攝取量，之於體組成、體能改變的關聯性。與花蓮慈濟醫院合作，也針對蔬食族群進行相似的實驗。不同飲食習慣受試者之實驗結果，將於展會中完整呈現。
二、	蔬食新品，蔬食為全球飲食趨勢。桂冠秉持科學營養的精神，將蔬食者易缺乏的維生素D、維生素B12與蛋白質等營養素，設計於食品配方之中。在展會上將亮相最新蔬食產品-素小麥胜肽(BCAA)精萃、奶素均質濃湯系列、植物蛋白多穀飲系列等7項新品。提供消費者更多元的飲食搭配、滿足不同的飲食習慣所需的營養補給。
三、	運動營養應用成果， 2023年桂冠舉辦數百人參加之健力運動挑戰賽活動。透過運動結合正確營養觀念宣導，搭配健力餐做為運動餐食，獲取優質蛋白質，幫助消費者建立健康生活習慣。參加者之體組成與生活習慣改變成果，也將於展會中展出。
info.en:
There are 3 highlights will be represented in Medical exhibition 2023. 

1.	Dietary clinical trials which are collaborated with National Yang Ming Chiao Tung University and Hualien Tzu Chi Hospital showed the effect of adequate protein intake on body composition in both non-vegetarian and vegetarian consumers. The results of both studies will be presented at the exhibition. 
2.	Laurel Nutrilab will show seven new plant-based products. These products were designed to provide essential nutrients such as Vit D, Vit B12 and protein that are often deficient in a vegetarian diet. Therefore, each of our product enables customers to achieve their diet goal no matter their diet habit. 
3.	The achievement of the sports event hold in 2023. We cooperated with chain gym to provide participants aerobic exercise lessons, sports nutrition concept and our product, Nutri-kit, which provides adequate protein and dietary fiber. In the results, 95% of the participants had built the habit of healthy eating and exercising. This result will also be displayed in the exhibition.
