info.tc:
有勁基因股份有限公司(Yourgene Health (Taiwan) Co., Ltd.)在次世代定序技術領域已有超過13年以上的經驗，在亞太地區提供包含非侵入產前染色體檢測、科學研究、空間轉錄體研究、臨床研究與客製化生物資訊分析委託等服務，有勁基因體核心實驗室在非侵入產前染色體檢測上，已獲得LDTS列冊及ISO/IEC 17025:2017認證，服務品質具專業級水準，深受國內外許多客戶信賴。

有勁基因主要的產品及服務如下:
• 非侵入性產前染色體檢測(包含委託檢測與技術轉移服務): Sage™ prenatal screen and the IONA® Nx test
• 科學研究: whole genome sequencing, whole exome sequencing, RNA sequencing與metagenomic sequencing 
• 空間轉錄體研究: Xenium, Visium CytAssist
• 臨床研究: 固態或液態腫瘤學研究
• 生殖醫學檢測
• 腫瘤生物資訊三級分析: Molecular Health
• 檢測方法專案合作開發

INEX Innovate 是一家位於新加坡的婦產健康分子診斷公司，專注於生殖健康和婦科癌症。自2006年創立以來，其使命是提供創新的解決方案和服務，以應對未滿足的臨床需求。

INEX Innovate主要產品如下:
• OvaCis® 快速測試套件: 手術中卵巢癌快速檢測試劑，通過使用側向流體分析法，區分良性與惡性卵巢囊腫。
• epiHERA® 早期子宮內膜癌檢測測試: 早期子宮內膜癌檢測試劑，從ThinPrep拭子收集的樣本中檢測高甲基化的生物標誌。
info.en:
With more than 13 years of Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) experiences, Yourgene Health (Taiwan) Co., Ltd offers reliable services including NIPT (Non-Invasive Prenatal Testing), tumor profiling, clinical research services and bioinformatic solutions to customers in APAC region. Yourgene Taipei service laboratory has acquired ISO/IEC 17025:2017 accreditation and Taiwan LDTS listing for NIPT (Non-Invasive Prenatal Testing) services.

Yourgene Health (Taiwan) Co., Ltd works in partnership with global leaders in DNA technology on: 
• Leading NIPT solutions for labs and clinicians: Sage™ prenatal screen and the IONA® Nx test
• NGS research services: Spatial transcriptomics, whole genome sequencing, whole exome sequencing and metagenomic sequencing 
• Clinical oncology research 
• Oncology tertiary analysis: Molecular Health
• Reproductive health

INEX Innovate is a women and fetal health molecular diagnostics company based in Singapore, specializing in reproductive health and gynaecological cancer. Founded since 2006, it’s mission is to provide innovative solutions and services to address unmet clinical needs.

INEX Innovate Products:
 
• OvaCis® Rapid Test Kit- Intraoperative ovarian cancer detection test that differentiates benign from malignant ovarian cyst by utilizing lateral flow device.
• epiHERA® Early Endometrial Cancer Detection Test- Early endometrial cancer detection test which detects hypermethylated biomarkers from samples collected from ThinPrep swab.

org.tc: LabWare Singapore Pte. Ltd

info.tc:
LabWare is recognized as the global leader in providing enterprise-scale laboratory automation solutions with over 40 offices across 6 continents.
LabWare’s Enterprise Laboratory Platform (ELP) is a unique and proven suite of product capabilities that encompass LIMS, ELN, LES and method execution in an integrated and enterprise-ready solution.
LabWare ELP combines the award-winning LabWare LIMS™ and LabWare ELN™, a comprehensive and fully integrated Electronic Laboratory Notebook application, which enables companies to optimize compliance, improve quality, increase productivity and reduce costs.
LabWare is a full-service provider offering software, professional implementation services, validation assistance, training, and world-class technical support to ensure our customers get the maximum value from their LabWare products.
By paying close attention to customer needs, making effective use of key technologies, and serving as a reliable and trusted partner, LabWare has emerged as the clear industry leader in laboratory automation.
info.en:
LabWare 是全球公認的企業級實驗室自動化解決方案領導廠商，在全球六大洲擁有超過40 個辦事處。
LabWare Enterprise Laboratory Platform（ELP）是一套獨特且經過驗證的產品，完全整合了LIMS、ELN、LES 和 Method Execution 等企業級需求。
LabWare ELP 結合了屢獲殊榮的 LabWare LIMS™ 和 LabWare ELN™ (一個無縫接軌的電子實驗室記事本)，使企業最佳化法規需求、提高品質、增加生產力並降低成本。
LabWare 是一家全方位的系統服務供應商，提供軟體、專業顧問服務、驗證顧問服務、教育訓練和世界級技術支援，以確保我們的客戶從他們的 LabWare 產品中獲得最大的價值。
經由高度關注客戶需求，有效利用關鍵技術及可靠和值得信賴的服務，LabWare 已成為實驗室自動化領域的領導者。

info.tc:
詠泉生技/瑞寶生醫實驗室 是專注於免疫細胞癌症治療與幹細胞/外泌體再生醫學技術研發，應用於全人大健康的領域的高新技術企業。
同時也是國內最早參與幹細胞外泌體相關技術研究的實驗室,無論是外泌體分離、保存與應用，皆經過實驗室博碩士級研究團隊在皮膚組織再生修復領域取得跨越性的進展，為醫療美容進入再生醫學時代提供了高科技技術支撐。
2016年取得GTP幹細胞實驗室資格，於2017年推出首款幹細胞外泌體產品，於2021年推出Dr.Real 詠泉生技從微觀生命科學細胞發現契機、人類的護膚產品變革，從物理防護到水和油乳化技術，到單純的動植物萃取乃至仿生物保養品發展，至今已開始進入再生醫學細胞和基因調控時代！
歷經七年技術研發與應用經驗，創新專利R.exosome 培育出關鍵成分全能賦活凝萃MSC-EVs小分子寡肽，通過修護、滋養、賦活三個層次，構建了細胞”再生信號”，喚醒機能，賦活再生！
info.en:

 The service tenet of UYOUNG BIOTECH, with advanced preventive medicine technology as the core, exclusively plans personal precision medicine, provides solutions and service platforms for malignant tumors, chronic diseases, anti-aging, exosome application, and preventive medicine, and has become a leader in regenerative medicine. bellwether.

Bring innovative technologies in biotechnology research to more life applications, and provide high-end and high-quality services.

info.tc:
精密微量定量泵：精密微量定量泵採用精密陶瓷柱塞，並以步進馬達驅動精密的滾珠絲桿系統，以確保穩定、精準地液體容量，重複精度優於±0.5%。可用於隱形眼鏡微量注膠、玻尿酸、生物試劑、精華液、驗血卡等定量注液用。

Nordson EFD ： Nordson EFD 產品廣泛運用於生命科學與醫療生技上，特別適用於生物材料的注液與分配，如血糖試劑、醫療級矽油的噴霧等。
info.en:
Precise Micro Volume Metering Pump：Precise micro volume pumps use a stepping motor or servo motor to drive the ceramic plungers for metering: ensure a stable and precise output volume. The output tolerance is maintained within ±0.5%. Suitable for dispensing various liquids with different viscosity, and can be widely used in dispensing contact lenses glue,  medical reagents, and various medical and biochemical.

Nordson EFD:  Nordson EFD products are widely used in medical life science and pharmaceutical. Suitable for biomaterial dispensing.

(ACC), a global biopharmaceutical company specializing in endotoxin and glucan detection was the first company licensed by the FDA to manufacture LAL for use as a quality control BET test. ACC introduced another first when we launched the first BET Recombinant Cascade Reagent, PyroSmart NextGen®.

org.tc: 國立成功大學，精準健康晶片系統與應用技術聯盟
org.en: National Cheng Kung University, Precision Health Chip on System and Application Technology Alliance

info.tc:
貼身守護神-心血管疾病檢測、分析與評估之晶片系統與平台之目的為開發應用於心律偵測且具長時效智慧穿戴之生醫檢測晶片系統，相較於市面上其他相似系統，能提供更小整合體積與更低耗電量的運作使用，因此能成為一個更為輕便且長久的健康檢測與監控裝置。此晶片系統可透過藍芽與智慧型裝置(如手機)傳輸，完成(1)心電訊號處理、(2)人工智慧分析、(3)人機介面顯示、(4)醫學資訊紀錄。透過手機APP可與醫療雲端聯繫，進行大數據的分析，並可即時顯示健康狀況。本團隊所開發的智慧穿戴式裝置，同時具有輕薄短小(手錶大小模組)、軟體顯示通知(APP)、人工智慧分析(CNN)、雲端疾病辨識(PVC/AF)，於心律發生狀況時提醒使用者、家人、醫院，提供使用者「貼身守護」。
展出品牌:貼身守護神-心血管疾病檢測、分析與評估之晶片系統與平台之目的為開發應用於心律偵測且具長時效智慧穿戴之生醫檢測晶片系統，相較於市面上其他相似系統，能提供更小整合體積與更低耗電量的運作使用，因此能成為一個更為輕便且長久的健康檢測與監控裝置。此晶片系統可透過藍芽與智慧型裝置(如手機)傳輸，完成(1)心電訊號處理、(2)人工智慧分析、(3)人機介面顯示、(4)醫學資訊紀錄。透過手機APP可與醫療雲端聯繫，進行大數據的分析，並可即時顯示健康狀況。本團隊所開發的智慧穿戴式裝置，同時具有輕薄短小(手錶大小模組)、軟體顯示通知(APP)、人工智慧分析(CNN)、雲端疾病辨識(PVC/AF)，於心律發生狀況時提醒使用者、家人、醫院，提供使用者「貼身守護」。
貼身守護神的核心技術包含(1)低功耗與高解析度晶片設計可提供長時穿戴、(2)穿戴模組製作已通過IEC 60601電性安規認證可獲得安全便利、(3)手機軟體服務與測試已獲軟體確效IEC62304認證可提供健康保障，目前24小時心律偵測器與智慧聽診器已通過IRB申請，在成大醫院進行臨床試驗中。此外，此核心技術已衍生多項產品與獲得商標申請，且透過以學生團隊為核心的新創公司「裕晶醫學科技股份有限公司」，進行產品的醫療安規認證、量產與服務。產品包含醫療事業處: YuGuard:貼心片(24小時心律偵測器)(工廠QMS認證中，已完成120人臨床測試)、YuSound:貼心音(智慧聽診器)(產品外觀ID設計中，已完成20人臨床測試)、YuRine:尿檢譯(無線尿液檢測系統與平台)(完成產品雛形展示，已完成50人臨床測試);穿戴事業處: YuCloth:貼心衣(智慧心律衣)(樣品完成，可量產)、YuPet:寵心衣 (寵物心律衣) (模組可量產)、YuBelt:貼心帶(運動心律帶) (可量產);教育事業部: TriAnswer:試穿戴(智慧穿戴式物聯網之無線生醫晶片系統開發模組) (已量產)。詳細介紹可參考影片https://youtu.be/jdgV-7rmt5g
info.en: The goal of the Guard Patch is to develop a Cardiovascular Disease Detection, Analysis, and Evaluation System-On-Chip and Platform. With such a wearable platform for wireless bio-signal acquisition, the user can access and monitor his physiological condition anytime and anywhere. Therefore, this wireless bio-signal acquisition system will become the guard patch of the user. The new company “Your Health Technology Co., Ltd (Yutech)” is founded by CBIC members in 2019 to provide market production and service for users. Besides, there are many products to be developed including YuGuard (24-hour ECG monitoring patch)、YuSound (Intelligent medical stethoscope)、YuRine (Portable and wireless urine detection system and platform for prevention of cardiovascular disease)、YuCloth (Smart ECG clothing)、YuPet (I-Pet ECG clothing)、YuBelt (ECG monitoring belt on sports)、TriAnswer (Bio-signal acquisition system and platform). The details have been presented in the video (https://youtu.be/jdgV-7rmt5g ).

org.tc: 味丹生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
展出項目：
1. 醫療級γ-聚麩胺酸鈉(γ-PGA)
2. 含γ-聚麩胺酸鈉的眼部護理產品

1. 醫療級γ-聚麩胺酸鈉(γ-PGA)是一種高度生物相容性生物材料，已經成功通過醫療器材的各種生物相容性測試。2022年10月，味丹生物科技成爲全球首家獲得γ-PGA FDA Master File for Device (Master File)編號的公司，允許γ-PGA安全可靠地用於醫療器材和相關產品的開發。γ-PGA是一種可生物降解的全天然生物聚合物，具有極高的親水保水特性和高的陽離子親和力，非常適合開發醫療器材，如傷口敷料、皮下填充劑、骨醫材、關節潤滑劑和眼科產品。

2. 味丹生物科技進行了各種實驗測試，證明了含γ-PGA的眼部護理產品的替代應用。經過這些測試，已經證實γ-PGA滴眼液可以增強淚液分泌，緩解乾眼症的症狀和減少角膜損傷。這種產品的獨特之處在於它提供長效的保護作用，無需頻繁使用。
info.en:
Exhibition items:
1. Medical grade sodium γ-polyglutamate (γ-PGA)
2. γ-polyglutamate-based eye care product

1. Medical grade sodium γ-polyglutamate (γ-PGA) is a highly biocompatible biomaterial that has successfully passed various biocompatibility tests for medical devices. In October 2022, Vedan Biotech became the world's first company to obtain the US FDA Master File for Device (MAF) number for γ-PGA, allowing safe and reliable use of γ-PGA for the development of medical devices and related products. γ-PGA is a fully biodegradable natural biopolymer with exceptional hydrophilic water retention properties and high affinity for cations, making it highly suitable for developing medical devices such as wound dressings, dermal fillers, bone and joint lubricants, bone medical materials, and ophthalmic devices.

2. Vedan Biotech has conducted various experimental tests to demonstrate the alternative application of γ-PGA-based eye care product. Through these tests, it has been confirmed that γ-PGA-based eye drops can enhance tear secretion, alleviate dry eye symptoms, and reduce corneal damage. This product's uniqueness lies in its long-lasting protective effect without requiring frequent application.

info.tc: 仙芝芳-草本五行膠囊是包括牛樟芝等五種珍貴蕈類組合而成之專利配方。經研究證實，配方可抑制前列腺癌細胞的PD-L1表達，並抑制前列腺癌細胞中的PD-L1與免疫細胞的PD-1之結合，進而利用免疫細胞抑制前列腺癌細胞增生。臨床使用證明，它提供了更高的保護力和安全性，是一種安全有效，接受度高的對抗腫瘤之創新草本免疫調節劑。

info.tc: 國璽幹細胞應用技術股份有限公司於2011年進駐新竹生醫園區，投入幹細胞應用技術開發及幹細胞製劑，克服目前尚未獲得滿足的醫療需求。透過整合醫藥級幹細胞製劑生產技術平台與諸多核心技術，我們已開發多項專有製程技術，並且已將四支幹細胞新藥推動進入臨床試驗。為擴大幹細胞製劑量產規模及提升品質穩定度，國璽除了從製造開始就採用模組製程的思維外，於園區內打造【PIC/S GMP幹細胞製劑藥廠】，穩健地走向規模化量產，同時持續拓展細胞治療領域的開發，與強化細胞治療產業鏈上、中、下游的佈局。
info.en: Gwo Xi Stem Cell Company has established the R&D center for cell therapy development since 2011. We are committed to developing stem cell medicines that have the potential to help patients with unmet medical needs. Our production platform fully comply with medical regulations (Good Tissue Practice, GTP) in Taiwan. We have three clinical trials are ongoing in Taiwan, and one clinical trial is ongoing in Vietnam by now. In the future, we will have established the PIC/S GMP grade stem cell preparation factory (15,225 m2 built-out space) in Hsinchu Biomedical Science Park in Taiwan to put stem cell-based medicinal products into practice.

info.tc:
【長照新境界-科技與研究】
本展位以長照新境界-科技與研究為展出主題，展示衛生福利部附屬醫療及社會福利機構管理會主辦之「建構衛政社政整合計畫、預防與延緩衰弱與失能、雲端智慧長者長照服務計畫」以及未來即將執行之「後疫時代醫療照護數位領航再造計畫-建構長照世代研究平台，提供長者全人整合照護」，展示既往成果與應用和即將展開的數位科技領航時代性照護計畫。
展示成果包括提供營養、保養、修養及安養之全責式日照中心、分析台灣中老年世代長期研究計畫之成果與應用，以及導入數位科技之長照服務，象徵著我國長照2.0不但在照護對象和服務內容之擴大，也展示我國著意之資訊科技和創新研發相結合之優良典範。
info.en:
This booth presents the theme of New Horizons in Long-term Care - Information Technology and Research, showcasing initiatives organized by the Hospital and Social Welfare Organizations Administration Commission of the Ministry of Health and Welfare. These initiatives include the "Constructing Integrated Health and Social Policy Plan, Prevention and Delay of Frailty and Disability, Cloud-based Smart Elderly Long-term Care Services Plan, as well as the upcoming Post-pandemic Era Digital Healthcare  Remodeling Medical Care Project - Establishing a Long-term Care Cohort Research Platform to Provide Comprehensive Integrated Care for the Elderly."The booth displays past achievements and applications as well as forthcoming digital technology-led era care projects.
The showcased achievements encompass an all-inclusive day care center providing nutrition, maintenance, self-cultivation, and living care responsibilities, analysis of the data and applications of Taiwan's longitudinal research project for the middle-aged and elderly generations, and the integration of digital technology into long-term care services. These symbolize that Taiwan's Long-term Care 2.0 not only expands in terms of care recipients and service offerings but also demonstrates the exemplary fusion of information technology and innovative research and development emphasized in Taiwan.

org.tc: HiMEDt台灣數位健康大聯盟

info.tc:
2022年12月，鴻海與工研院攜手成立「台灣數位健康大聯盟（HiMEDt）」，藉由新模式、新生態、新數據、新場域等四大創新服務，融合台灣兩大優勢領域-科技與醫療，匯集產、官、學、研、醫、法人、慈善、宗教民俗等各方策略合作夥伴打造開放式的數位健康新生態系統，促進不同產業的跨域合作與共創。
HiMEDt 從醫療環境實際需求出發，融合先進資通訊等各個產業關鍵技術，提供完整解決方案，藉助工研院跨域場域驗證輔導協助，縮短開發週期，加速創新落地，推進台灣數位健康產業成長，打造台灣成為全球智慧醫療之標竿國家。

生態合作產品演示：
- 智合醫專業版多功能檢測儀 CoDoctor Pro Multifunctional Parameter Detector
- 智合醫家用版多功能檢測儀 CoDoctor Home Multifunctional Parameter Detector
- 智合醫輕巧版多功能檢測儀 CoDoctor Lite Multifunctional Parameter Detector
- 智合醫手持式智慧眼底影像擷取儀 CoDoctor Eye
- Alpha Digi-Optical 3D Printer
info.en:
“HIMEDt” with four innovative services include new Model, new Ecosystem, new Data, and new Territory, which integrate Taiwan’s two major advantages—Technology and Medical Care. 
This ultimately brings together various strategic partners across all communities, which creates a new open digital health ecosystem, in order to promote cross-domain cooperation and co-creation among different industries.

info.en:

org.tc: 恮新國際有限公司

info.tc: “安搏生體外反搏裝置” A/ECP_A1簡稱EECP， 全機台灣自行研發製造，一體成形，以心電訊號R波為觸發信號，同步控制氣囊在心臟舒張早期，氣囊由遠至近依序加壓，讓下肢血液回流。在心臟收縮期前，氣囊迅速排氣受壓的肢體血管開放，從而減少週邊循環阻力，減輕心臟負荷及減少心肌耗氧量。EECP在臨床試驗證實有效治癒心血管疾病。
info.en:
“AMBERSAN External counter-pulsation device” A/ECP_A1 abbreviation EECP，A whole new version that developed and manufactured in Taiwan. Where ECG R-wave as the trigger signal synchronously controls the cuffs at early diastolic period. The cuff pressurizes orderly from the peripheral vessels to the more central vessels, enabling the blood flow of the lower limb to return. Before the systolic stage, the cuff (include the bladder) deflates rapidly to open up the pressured vessels of the limbs, thus decreasing the peripheral circulation resistance and the load to the heart. thereby reduce heart load and reduce myocardial oxygen consumption.
EECP has been proven effective in curing cardiovascular diseases in clinical trials.

org.tc: 犀動智能科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
Vocol AI 語音協作平台組合了 Voice 和 Collaboration，結合多種大型語言模型 (LLMs)，透過自然語言處理 (NLP) 技術，提供個人與企業用戶更為精準的語音轉文字內容，並以 AI 生成對話逐字稿、摘要與主題，進而提高團隊協作效率，並為每一場對話創造更有價值的洞察分析。
Vocol 提供中、英、日三種語言辨識，自動偵測不同的講者，並支援超過25種其他語系的逐字稿轉譯，以AI自動生成對話重點摘要、主題分析與代辦事項。整合第三方線上會議工具，如：Microsoft Teams & Google Meet，解決跨工具整合需求。
此外，透過分享、評論、標註成員等團隊協作功能，讓團隊間溝通、交流與討論更便捷，提升整體的工作效率，成為各個產業數位轉型的理想解決方案。
針對醫療體系需求，如：行政會議、心理諮商、巡房問診與遠端看診等情境，Vocol 迅速產出對話逐字稿與重點摘要，除了讓醫事人員省下大量作業、彙整資訊的時間外，也提供留存記錄，供醫療院所未來分析、索引用。
info.en:
The Vocol AI Voice Collaboration Platform combines Voice and Collaboration, incorporating various large language models (LLMs) and utilizing Natural Language Processing (NLP) technology to provide more accurate speech-to-text content for both individual and enterprise users. It generates AI-generated transcripts, summaries, and topic analysis, ultimately enhancing team collaboration efficiency and creating actionable insights for each conversation.
Vocol offers speech recognition in three languages: Chinese, English, and Japanese, automatically detects different speakers, and supports transcription in over 25 other languages seamlessly. It integrates with third-party online meeting tools such as Microsoft Teams and Google Meet, addressing cross-tool integration needs.
Additionally, it facilitates team communication through features like sharing, commenting, and member annotations, thus improving overall work efficiency and serving as an ideal solution for digital transformation across various industries.
For healthcare needs, such as administrative meetings, psychological counseling, rounds, and remote consultations, Vocol rapidly produces conversation transcripts and AI summaries. This not only saves healthcare professionals a significant amount of time in information gathering and consolidation but also provides record-keeping for future analysis and reference in medical facilities.

org.tc: 虹映科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
虹映科技本著『定存您的健康存摺、告知您的健康餘額、增加您的健康存款』的核心使命，致力於健康促進與預防醫學服務平台生態圈的建構。透過有效的運動導引與深度學習AI技術，創立結合社群與健康促進的雲端服務平台，讓家人、朋友、同事、運動同好對彼此的健康多一分關心，讓人們有更強的持續運動的動力。Realize Health-on-Demand是我們的價值主張，期待每一位JoiiUp的用戶都能擁有更健康快樂的生活。
JoiiSports app以心率為核心，致力於運動五化：數位化、生活化、生態化、個人化、精準化；運動過後運用大數據分析、深度學習AI演算法，app能給予更精準且個人化的運動、飲食營養與生活型態等健康議題建議。累積在JoiiSports app的運動數據，結合虹映科技職場員工健康促進平台服務(JoiiCare)，將使用者的運動與健康數據系統化呈現，管理者無論是教練、廠護、人資可以看得到持續訓練的運動成果，也很容易衡量健康促進計畫的實質成效。
info.en:
Based on the mission of "deposit your health passbook, inform your health balance, and increase your health deposit", JoiiUp is committed to the construction of an ecosystem of health promotion and preventive medicine service platforms. Through effective exercise guidance and deep learning AI technology, to create a cloud service platform that combines community and health promotion, so that family members, friends, colleagues, and exercise partners can pay more attention to each other's health, so that people have stronger continuous exercise motivation. Realize Health-on-Demand is our value proposition, and we expect every JoiiUp user to have a healthier and happier life.

JoiiSports app focuses on heart rate and is committed to the five dimension of exercises: digitalization, life, ecology, personalization, and precision.   After exercise, the app can give more accurate and personalized results by using big data analysis and deep learning algorithms to provide advice on health issues such as exercise, diet, nutrition, and lifestyle. The exercise data accumulated in JoiiSports app, combined with JoiiCare, a workplace employee health promotion platform service of JoiiUp, systematically presents the user's exercise and health data, and administrators , whether they are coaches, factory nurses, or human resources, can check the data of continuous training as well as the actual effectiveness of health promotion programs.

info.tc:
瑞愛生醫 (Taiwan RedEye Biomedical Inc.)於2017年成立於新竹，2019年進駐新竹科學園區，專注於光學檢測技術，耕耘智慧健康、食品安全、與環境保護產業領域。

瑞愛創業的切入點屬於微量血液感測技術，同時研發更多尿液檢測參數相關的光學技術，例如尿糖、尿蛋白、尿酸、酮體等，不須使用任何化學品。以跨領域整合研發為營運主軸，實驗室走入民生，創造適合居家使用的大健康檢測產品。
info.en:
RedEye Biomedical (Taiwan RedEye Biomedical Inc.) was founded in Hsinchu in 2017 and entered Hsinchu science park in 2019. We focus on optical detection techniques and delve into some fields including Smart health, Food safety, and Environment protection.

The entry point of RedEye’s technology belongs to trace blood sensitivity, and more urine detection parameters related optical techniques, such as urine sugar, urine protein, uric acid, ketone bodies, and so on will be introduced in the future, and develop products that do not require any chemical use. With the members of research and development as the main operating point, cross-domain integration of optics, institutions, electronics, software, and biological, to create home use detection products.

info.tc: 捷格科技精通醫療、照護、健康管理、健康促進的實務需求，研發電子病歷、醫學影像傳管系統...等產品，降低醫院成本並提高作業效率，同時以智慧病房、智慧手術室管理、智慧護理站，提升品質與顧客體驗 ，而透過捷格虛擬病房與虛擬醫院方案，也可帶動遠距醫療照護模式提高營收。數位化、自動化、智慧化是醫院現代化的新里程碑，不僅顯著提高服務量能並降低成本。這也是我們未來醫療照護在有限資源與激烈競爭的環境的唯一選項。作為醫療健康領域創新資訊技術和應用方案的領導者，JAG 在超過 25 年的歷程中，不僅創造了許多業界領先的產品，而且在服務台灣 80% 的大型醫院方面積累了寶貴的經驗。
info.en: JAG Technology brings refined medical and healthcare application solutions into the 21st century. With a global vision for industry development, JAG has led and co-ordinated a range of joint venture initiatives across greater China, Japan, and the United States by combining cloud-based internet technology with modern medical and health care systems.Headquartered in Taiwan, JAG Technology focuses on total solution integration planning, supplemented by individual customized services to create added value. JAG leads the industry by applying AI (Artificial Intelligence) for deep learning as a key development tool; similarly, JAG builds on the evolution of the IoT (Internet of Things) to connect various data collection points and devices for advancing real-time healthcare analyses.

org.tc: 遠成醫保科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
MedLing，以NLP (Natural Language Processing)語意分析引擎為技術核心。旨在針對醫療系統中所出現的文字內容，包含：病摘、病理報告、檢驗報告等龐大的資料，以 SNOMED CT 為基礎，定義出資料中的重要術語，提供醫療專業人員作為精確一致的快速判斷依據。
我們提供的解決方案包含醫療院所病摘的轉譯，將海量的資料解析成知識圖譜。藉由機器學習的判斷，提供專業醫療或相關人員無痛的使用環境。無須語言程式背景，也不必曠日廢時的與工程師來回溝通，即可自行設定簡單的條件，產生CDS (臨床決策支持)，達到更有效率的醫療診斷程序。
MedLing的服務應用範圍多元，可提供：醫師診斷，疾病分類師快速查核健保項目等。其商業價值在於多元的應用及跨領域的串接，如保險業的健康評估、亞健康保戶的照護平台、與合作夥伴建構健康照護平台。我們可用SNOMED CT與醫療決策系統的整合結果，跨域應用到大健康照護領域及保險、教育的相關服務，在應用上是非常關鍵和廣泛的。使用者更可以用自然互動的方式，取得相關醫療訊息。
info.en:
MedLing, a Natural Language Processing (NLP) semantic analysis engine as the core technology. The aim is to define important terms in the text content that appears in medical systems, including medical notes, pathology reports, laboratory reports, and other massive data based on SNOMED CT. This will provide medical professionals with precise and consistent rapid judgment criteria.
Our solution includes the translation of medical notes and parsing of massive data into knowledge graphs. Through machine learning, we offer medical professionals or related personnel a painless environment to use. Without the need for computer  programming background or time-consuming communication with engineers, users can set simple conditions and generate Clinical Decision Support (CDS) for more efficient medical diagnostic procedures.
The application range of MedLing's services is diverse, including physician diagnosis and disease classification for quick checking of NHI items. Its commercial value lies in its diverse applications and cross-disciplinary integration, such as health assessments in the insurance industry, care platforms for sub-healthy policyholders, and the construction of health care platforms with partners. We can integrate the results of SNOMED CT and medical decision-making systems to apply them to the broader field of health care and related services in insurance and education, which is critical and extensive in its application. Users can also obtain relevant medical information through natural interaction.

org.tc: 博鑫醫電股份有限公司

info.tc: 博鑫醫電是全球第一家提供行動5G生理參數供外部App存取之開放式平台 (5G-Vital-Sign Platform) 領導廠商。5G-VSP平台符合醫規性能之心電、血氧、血壓等生理參數，分別提供PDK和MDK兩條產品線，並開放原始波形數據資料供醫護人員或研發團隊從雲端及其它設備做數據分析或開發軟硬體，目前已獲得台灣多間模擬病房和大專院校所採用，不僅節省人力成本，減少誤判性，更提高研究效率，使遠距醫療、居家照護等行動應用帶動AI先進醫學技術的發展。
info.en: BROADSIMS is the first providing an APP-Installable 5G vital-sign solution as an open-innovation platform (5G-VSP), including ECG, SpO2, and NIBP functions for clinical research and care providers, provided with 2 product series (PDK & MDK). Vital-sign signals in 5G-VSP are medical-grade compliant and allowed opening raw-data to 3rd-parties installing their own APP. All measurement history is available any time, creating a smart medical ecosystem.

org.tc: 旭威認證股份有限公司

info.tc:
旭威認證股份有限公司隸屬正崴集團旗下的森崴能源（6806），森崴能源以保護地球、永續發展、綠能減碳、潔淨能源為核心價值與願景，擬定【光、風、水、氣、大平台】發展戰略，致力於再生能源與潔淨能源服務與技術發展。

並由旭威認證為企業盤點節能及碳排放狀況，找出浪費能源及減碳潛能，以 ESG 的生態池發展解決方案，提供包括溫室氣體盤查ISO 14064-1、溫室氣體第三方查驗、產品碳足跡ISO 14067、能源管理ISO 50001、減碳專案ISO 14064-2、科學基礎減量目標倡議SBTi、氣候相關財務揭露TCFD及低碳設備等硬體產品及軟體服務，有助提升客戶節能減碳、社會責任與公司治理等能力，多元化解決地球環境的問題。
info.en:
Foxwell Certification Int. is a third-party certificate company in Taiwan, located in the north of Taipei city. Our business field includes ISO 14064-1, ISO14064-2, ISO 14067, ISO50001, environmental social corporate governance (ESG) reports, task force on climate-related financial disclosures (TCFD), and science-based targets initiative (SBTi). We aim to build a systematic and documentary management methodology. We are not only to reduce small-middle enterprises' costs and operating processes but also to create a decarbonization structure. 
Foxwell Certification Int. is a subsidiary of the Foxlink group. The core value and mission present "One Better the Earth", "SDGs in Action", "Professional Green Energy Solution", and "Leading LNG supplier". We own abundant expertise in engineering fields and innovative technology to service customers. We focus on an ESG industrial ecosystem such as forest carbon credits, set energy storage technology, and operate a green energy trading platform.

和航貿易/和特科技成立於1979年，40年來秉承不斷的引進新觀念及培養優秀的技術人才的信念，除了優異儀器的品質與性能外，對於售後維護/維修能力及客服品質也是考量的重要項目

展出產品：VEOLIA總有機碳分析儀(TOC)；Labconco冷凍乾燥機、離心濃縮機、超純水製造機、實驗室型洗瓶機；LC有機溶劑純化系統；VAPOURTEC流動化學合成系統；TELEDYNE ISCO自全自動快速層析純化系統(MPLC/Perp HPLC)；TELEDYNE TEKMAR吹氣捕捉濃縮裝置；PAI線上型氨氮分析儀、Löser冰點滲透壓分析儀；SAIREM客製化微波量產型批次或連續式合成系統；Mageleka粒子特性快速分析儀(Low Field NMR)等

代理產品深受學校及業界喜愛，應用於半導體業、石化業、生物醫學業、環保業、製藥業、學術研究單位，提供專業的售後維修服務及技術支持能力

info.tc:
旭諾生物科技  產品認證 x 代工生產  一條龍服務 ！

旭諾生物科技為合格的(QMS/ISO)醫療器材製造廠，產品以高階植入式醫材為主，產品類別包含醫美、骨科、牙科、消化道內科、耳鼻喉科、眼科、傷口敷料等，目前已取得超過20項產品QMS製造許可，豐富且多元的生產經驗，提供您值得信賴的醫材代工服務。
旭諾同時提供專業的醫療器材認證輔導，創立至今輔導過臺大、成大、陽明、北醫、北榮、長庚等多位醫師與教授取得醫材認證，並成功量產超過40項醫材產品，協助客戶從QMS、ISO文件撰寫、產品測試規劃、臨床試驗、到產品取得認證上市。
info.en:
Shineo Technology is a qualified (QMS/ISO) medical device manufacturer. Our products are mainly high-end implant medical materials. The product categories include medical aesthetics, orthopedics, dentistry, gastrointestinal internal medicine, ENT, ophthalmology, and wound dressings. We have obtained more than 20 product QMS(GMP) manufacture licenses. With rich and diverse production experience, Shineo Technology provide reliable medical materials OEM services.
Shineo Technology also provides professional medical equipment certification counseling. Since establishment,  we have 
been counseling many physicians and professors from National Taiwan University, National Cheng Kung University, Yang Ming, Peking University, Beirong, Chang Gung, etc. to obtain medical material certification, and successfully mass-produced more than 40 medical material products. We assist customers on QMS, ISO document writing, product testing planning, clinical trials, and product certification and listing.

org.tc: 基龍米克斯生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 基龍米克斯成立於 2001 年，為台灣第一家獲得 TAF 認證，並符合 ISO 17025 標準之定序服務生物科技公司，致力於對整個基因體做全面性的研究及服務。隨著科技演進及市場需求而擴充，集結各式基因體分析平台，從一代定序、高通量定序及生物資訊分析到臨床基因檢測市場，從基因層面的序列分析到基因表現後所造成的個體化差異，提供研究人員及醫療機構全方位的技術服務，規模已遠遠超越同業，成為全台最大的商業基因體定序公司。
info.en: Genomics was founded in 2001 by Dr. T.Y. Chow, a student of Dr. Frederick Sanger who was twice the recipient of the Nobel Prize for Chemistry. The company uses “Genomics” as the name to establish a genomic research platform, mainly providing professional technological services. Genomics is Taiwan's biggest commercial genome sequencing company, with a solid foundation of existing technical services, to develop precision medical genetic testing to realize personalized medical information.

org.tc: 天明製藥股份有限公司

info.tc:
「天明製藥集團」為國內唯一同時擁有GMP製藥、TAF檢驗、通路銷售、ISO醫療軟體、再生醫療GTP、觀光工廠，臨床醫療等一貫化的醫藥集團。
經過多年努力，秉持著「傳統中藥良方、結合現代科學、發揮治病養生療效」之誠信製藥理念，發展再生醫療第二曲線，使得中醫藥、再生醫療及醫療軟體，成為天明製藥產業核心服務發展目標，現已服務超過1962家基層中醫診所和702家合作藥局，合約院級機構有全台13家；再生醫療合作醫學中心醫療機構全台10家，市場覆蓋率近60%，形成一個整合型服務鏈。
集團共取得70餘張專利，藥證逾2,000張，通過藥品GMP、HACCP、ISO9001、ISO22000 品質認證、GTP細胞製備、TAF/ISO/IEC 17025實驗室認證、回教清真品保協會 HALAL 認證以及日本厚生勞働省-醫藥品外國製造業者認定證。
■產品類型
科學中藥、OTC產品、草本保健食品、外用品、OEM/ ODM服務
■醫療軟體 
中醫診所資訊軟體開發維護與管理
■再生醫療
＃GTP細胞製備：免疫細胞、幹細胞、特管辦法、恩慈療法、委託製造
＃TAF細胞檢驗：細胞產品安全性、功能性委託檢驗
＃中山天明細胞：特管辦法細胞諮詢、精準檢測、預防醫學與癌症第二意見諮詢
■天明製藥農科觀光工廠
全國最大的科學中藥博覽館及牛樟芝博覽館免費參觀

多年來陸續投入增設實驗室儀器，協助客戶更便利地蒐集測試數據。亦有多條產線進行機構組裝。

info.en:
Using Europe-made precise dosing systems and injection molding machines, along with LSR (liquid silicone rubber) cold runner systems, we can efficiently save material from loss, and the reduction is especially significant in pricey medical materials.
Manufacturing in class 100,000 (ISO-8) clean rooms, our injection molding technique is suitable for plastic and LSR (liquid silicone rubber) parts for medical purposes.
We've been investing in various testing equipment to assist our customers in gathering data more easily; and assembly lines to conduct mechanical assembling.
Certificated in the medical device quality management system (ISO 13485) and food safety management system (ISO 22000).
With over 30 years of experience in injection mold development, we are here to provide you with our professionalism and services locally in Taiwan.

org.tc: 新駿實業股份有限公司

info.tc:
Prime 系列高壓蒸汽滅菌器是一款嶄新的、高效的滅菌解決方案，專為滿足現代醫療和生物實驗室的需求而設計。這一系列的滅菌器結合了觸控螢幕，以及高規格的滅菌技術，確保效能達到最嚴格的滅菌標準。

產品特色：

高效的性能：Prime 系列能夠滅菌實心和多孔材料，無論是醫療器械、實驗室玻璃器皿還是生物實驗樣本，Prime 系列高壓蒸汽滅菌器都能可靠地確保您的物品得到最高的滅菌品質。

觸控螢幕操作：擁有直觀的觸控螢幕界面，簡化了操作流程，同時查看並存取滅菌記錄，這一切都只需幾個觸控。

滅菌履歷和物聯網：Prime Lab系列擁有滅菌資料的自動記錄與數位化的功能，並能將資料自動加密上傳到專用雲端空間，使用者可以看見詳細的滅菌履歷包含人員與滅菌物品的資料，準確地追蹤每個滅菌過程不受時間與地點的影響。

Prime 系列高壓蒸汽滅菌器適用於各種行業，包括醫療診所、生物科學研究、制藥和實驗室應用。無論您是醫院、實驗室或制藥公司，這系列的滅菌器都將是您理想選擇。
info.en:
The Prime Series of autoclaves is a new, highly effective sterilization solution designed to meet the needs of modern medical and biological laboratories. This series of autoclaves combines a touch screen with high specification technology to ensure performance to the most stringent sterilization standards.

Features:

Efficient Sterilization: The Prime Series autoclaves sterilize solids and porous materials to ensure the highest level of sterility, whether it's medical instruments, laboratory glassware or biological samples, it will reliably ensure that your items are sterilized.

Touch Screen Operation: Featuring an intuitive interface that simplifies operation while viewing and accessing sterilization programs and records, all with just a few touches.

Sterilization History and IoT: The Prime Lab series features automatic recording and digitization of sterilization data, with automatic encryption and uploading of the data to a dedicated cloud. Users can see a detailed sterilization history that includes information about the personnel and the items being sterilized, and accurately track each sterilization process regardless of time and location.

The prime series of autoclaves can be used in a variety of industries including medical clinics, bioscience research, pharmaceutical and laboratory applications. Whether you are a hospital, laboratory or pharmaceutical company, these sterilizers are the ideal choice.

org.tc: 宏智生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 宏智生醫科技利用與國內三家醫學中心合作收集的憂鬱症腦波資料所開發出來的SEA腦波壓力評估系統，包含了負責訊號收集與處理的腦波儀、流程控制的使用者圖形介面、雲端分析的AI演算法，透過紀錄90秒腦波訊號(EEG)並加以分析，提供客觀、可量化的壓力評估指標以及直觀的壓力數據分布圖，輔助醫師提供更有效率、更精準的診斷，是專業醫療人員在心理健康篩檢及臨床上的得力AI幫手。
info.en: HippoScreen's Stress EEG Assessment (SEA) System developed using depression EEG data collected through collaboration with three major medical centers in Taiwan, includes an EEG amplifier for data collection and signal processing, a GUI for test process control, and an AI algorithm for data analysis. It records 90-second brainwave signals to analyze with AI algorithm, and then provides objective and quantifiable stress evaluation index and intuitive data distribution maps in the assessment report. With this report it can assist doctors to provide more efficient and accurate diagnosis. SEA system is designed to be a powerful AI tool for professional medical personnel in mental health screening.

info.tc:

org.tc: 醫百科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
RETINA 整合重覆跨顱磁刺激(rTMS)精準定位
重覆跨顱磁刺激是種針對憂鬱症的非侵入性腦部儀器治療，利用電流經由刺激線圈產生磁場在由磁場來提升或抑制大腦神經元的活動性，例如刺激重度憂鬱症患者的大腦左側前額葉，來增進額葉調控情緒的功能。  其測量該運動神經元動作電位閥值，若是刺激位置偏差1mm，則可能會損失多達30%之能量輸出，利用RETINA導航系統結合重覆跨顱磁刺激(rTMS)預期將可精準定位達到協助醫師即時檢視磁場作治療頭部的所在位置，保持最佳治療成效。
info.en:
RETINA Integration for Precise Positioning of Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (rTMS)

Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (rTMS) is a non-invasive brain instrument therapy used to treat depression. It involves the use of electrical currents to generate a magnetic field through a stimulation coil, which either enhances or inhibits the activity of brain neurons by using the magnetic field. For example, it stimulates the left frontal lobe of the brain in patients with severe depression to enhance the regulation of emotions.

It measures the threshold of action potentials in motor neurons, and a deviation of 1mm in the stimulation location can result in a loss of up to 30% of energy output. By combining the RETINA navigation system with repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation (rTMS), it is expected to achieve precise positioning, allowing doctors to instantly view the location of the magnetic field for treating the head, thus maintaining optimal treatment effectiveness.

info.en: Genomics was founded in 2001 by Dr. T.Y. Chow, a student of Dr. Frederick Sanger who was twice the recipient of the Nobel Prize for Chemistry. The company uses “Genomics” as the name to establish a genomic research platform, mainly providing professional technological services. Genomics is Taiwan's biggest commercial genome sequencing company, with a solid foundation of existing technical services, to develop precision medical genetic testing to realize personalized medical information.

org.tc: 威健股份有限公司

info.tc:
威健股份有限公司是一家專注於生命科學領域的儀器試劑及服務供應商。公司推出了多項創新的臨床產品，包括
全方位染色體基因晶片（cytoscan）是一種利用染色體基因晶片技術來分析染色體異常的技術。該技術可以檢測出傳統染色體檢測無法發現的微小染色體異常，包括染色體數目異常、染色體結構異常等。
全外顯子組分析（ACMG-59）是一種利用高通量測序技術來分析人類全外顯子組的技術。全外顯子組包含了人類所有編碼基因的編碼區域，為遺傳性疾病、生育健康的臨床醫師提供準確的參考依據。
非侵入性染色體檢測（Welbaby）是一種利用母體血液中胎兒游離DNA來進行染色體異常篩檢的技術。與傳統的羊水穿刺或絨毛膜採樣相比，NIPT具有無創、準確、安全等優點。
威健的產品及服務均符合標準，並獲得了多項認證，包括TAF TFDA/LDTS等。公司致力於為客戶提供高品質的臨床產品服務。
info.en:
Welgene Biotech Co., Ltd. is a leading provider of instruments, reagents, and services in the life sciences field. The company has launched a number of innovative clinical products, including:
Array comparative genomic hybridization(Cytoscan) is a more sensitive and specific way to detect chromosomal abnormalities than traditional chromosome analysis. It can detect microdeletions and microduplications that are not visible under a microscope. 
Exome sequencing(ACMG-59) is a high-throughput sequencing technique that can identify genetic variants in all protein-coding regions of the genome. Exome sequencing is used to diagnose a variety of genetic conditions, including rare diseases, inherited cancers, and developmental disorders.
Non-invasive prenatal testing(Welbaby) is a noninvasive way to screen for chromosomal abnormalities such as Down syndrome, Edwards syndrome, and Patau syndrome. It is performed by analyzing free fetal DNA in maternal blood.
Welgene's products and services are in line with standards and have obtained a number of certifications, including TAF, TFDA/LDTS etc.. The company is committed to providing customers with high-quality clinical product services.

org.tc: 永磐科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
Miko IoT醫護管理平台係利用安全及有效的資通訊機制，結合院內HIS、NIS等醫療資訊系統所提供之資料，並整合通訊系統、定位系統及IoT醫療物聯裝置之資訊，統一建構而成的私有雲端智慧醫療核心數據中心。

Miko IoT醫護管理平台採用模組化架構，分別可與MikoDrip點滴監測系統、MikoNIS護理站電子白板、MikoRTLS定位系統、及MikoCALL緊急呼叫系統協作，作為不同系統間資料統合與資訊分享的媒介。Miko IoT透過跨系統的整合與智能運算提供資訊加值服務，例如發生緊急事件時，Miko IoT可將緊急呼叫通話、呼救位置、病患基本資料與醫療註記等訊息，自動傳遞到專責護理師的手機上。透過智慧化流程縮短緊急事件的反應時間，協助醫院提升緊急應變能力與醫療服務品質。
info.en: The Miko Drip System intelligently monitors the real-time status of the IV drip speed and supports a "plug and play"mode. Miko Drip can change detailed information such as drip settings through the buttons of the device or mobile APP and also accurately monitors the remaining time of the infusion. When the drip is about to end or the infusion process is abnormal, Miko Drip alert by LED lights and sound, and send out information to the mobile APP at the same time. The Miko Drip System combined with the Miko IoT medical care management platform can provide notifications to a specific caregiver according to related schedule, and integrate the drip information and display on Miko NIS at nursing station.

info.tc:
金萬林企業股份有限公司在2017年成立精準實驗室，於2020年獲得衛福部精準醫療分子檢測實驗室認證(LDTS列冊登錄)。
金萬林企業股份有限公司提供全方位的基因檢測服務，除了523個全項基因特組外，還新推出血癌基因檢測服務，採用血液或骨髓檢體進行次世代定序服務，分析與血癌相關的基因變異，為醫師及患者提供最佳的治療建議。
我們提供血癌基因檢測服務：血癌相關基因的熱點突變、短片段插入或刪除以及基因融合的變異，都能有效地分析結果，並透過基因藥物資料庫分析系統，提供最佳的藥物建議參考報告。
info.en:
KimForest Enterprise Co., Ltd. started the Precision Medicine Laboratory in 2017. In 2020, we have certified as a Laboratory Developed Test (LDTS) provider by Taiwan Food and Drug Administration (TFDA).
KimForest Enterprise Co., Ltd. provides comprehensive genetic testing services, including 523 gene panels. Our latest service is the hematologic malignancy genetic testing, targeted next-generation sequencing (NGS) assay designed to detect somatic variants in myeloid cancer using blood or bone marrow samples. This enables us to provide physicians and patients with the best possible treatment recommendations.
We offer highly accurate genetic testing services for myeloid cancer, analyzing gene hotspot mutations, short fragment insertions or deletions (Indels), and fusion variations. By leveraging the drug-gene analysis system, we can provide the best suggestion reference report for each case.

org.tc: 生之寶國際再生醫學科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 臍帶組織內含有多種且豐富的細胞種類及再生醫學所需的相關原料,堪稱是再生醫學原料庫。嬰兒出生時先將臍帶全組織進行凍存,未來有需求時再將臍帶組織解凍,分離增生所需的細胞,可以讓更多人有機會以較經濟實惠的價格先將生命的珍寶(臍帶組織)保存作為未來使用之需要。UCT III Plus Technology是凍存臍帶全組織,主要核心技術裡面是保留臍帶組織內更多種類的細胞及生物材料,做為未來更多的可能性與治療潛力,發展更多醫療應用。坊間大部分宣稱凍存臍帶者多是直接從新鮮臍帶分離出間質幹細胞後凍存,而非臍帶全組織凍存,只保留到自部分臍帶組織分離的間質幹細胞。臍帶組織是再生醫學寶藏,含有豐富多樣的細胞種類,保留臍帶全組織是一個至關重要的選擇,生之寶專利臍帶全組織凍存技術不斷精進與優化改良更是保存再生醫學原料庫的獨創技術核心。
info.en: Healthbanks Biomedical is the pioneer for Umbilical Cord Tissue Cryopreservation ( patented UCT Technology) which was introduced via AABB journal in 2016. We have successfully developed UCT III Plus Technology which preserved therapeutic properties of MSCs for regenerative medicine. info.tc: 國家衛生研究院 (NHRI)作為行政院衛生署監督下的自治研究機構，國家人權機構致力於加強醫學研究和改善我國的醫療保健。NHRI 的科學家開展以使命為導向的醫學研究，並調查基礎生物醫學科學的許多方面以及特定疾病。 這些範圍從老齡化、癌症、傳染病、精神障礙、職業病等常見問題到衛生政策。 我們希望國家人權機構的知識、經驗和設施能夠成為全國人民認識、預防和治療疾病的重要資源。
info.en: The National Health Research Institutes (NHRI) is a non-profit foundation  established by government of the ROC with its organization charter created by an Act of Congress (Legislative Yuan) and signed in 1995 by President Teng-hui Lee. Being an autonomous research organization under the supervision of the Department of Health, Executive Yuan, the NHRI is dedicated to the enhancement of medical research and the improvement of health care in this country.

org.tc: 閎康科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
今年閎康科技展出的主要項目為”生物樣品電子顯微鏡分析”與”原位液態電子顯微鏡分析”等分析服務。
在生物樣品舉凡組織、細胞、病毒、微脂體與囊泡等等各種樣品都有分析經驗，可以觀察到奈米尺度的微結構或顆粒。電子顯微鏡在生物方面可以觀察細胞中胞器的變化，也有使用在病毒的檢驗與辨認，或是脂質奈米微粒的粒徑分析，用途十分廣泛。
液態電顯的部分，使用閎康獨有的K-kit液態樣品槽，讓樣品在液態環境中的觀察化為可能。可以觀察到更接近樣品原本的狀態，尤其是生物樣品脫水之後結構會塌陷，造成樣貌大幅改變。也可以看到一些只有在液體中才能進行的形貌變化，粒如微脂體的融合、分裂現象，或是菌體被分解的過程。
info.en:
This year, Ma-tek provide “Biological sample TEM analysis” and “In-situ liquid TEM analysis” in Expo. Taiwan-Healthcare.

Ma-tek can observe all kinds of biological sample in nanoscale structure with TEM. We can recognize virus, observe variety of organelles or particles size distribution for lipid nanoparticles.

In situ TEM analysis is very popular these years. Because most biological sample collapse while dehydration. With K-kit, a liquid TEM cell we can observe sample with TEM in liquid phase to keep its structure.

org.tc: 長聖國際生技股份有限公司
org.en: Ever Supreme Bio Technology Co., LTD.

info.tc: 臍帶間質幹細胞研發培養特定分子表現族群之間質幹細胞進行相對應治療，發揮並維持間質幹細胞本身抗發炎緩解組織惡化及促進組織再生修復特色，依據其細胞具備功能特色，目前的細胞治療幾乎都是自體治療。然而自體細胞治療價格昂貴，無法大量生產，長聖開發中的新藥UMSC01（異體臍帶間質幹細胞），其臍帶間質幹細胞是很好的異體細胞治療來源，可事先製造保存並於需要時取用(Off-the-Shelf)，因此可實現「大規模生產並放在貨架上銷售的細胞產品」，大幅度降低細胞培養成本，除此之外並不會影響原本間質幹細胞本身抗發炎緩解組織惡化及促進組織再生修復特色，具備市場潛力與產品開發價值。
info.en: The development of umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells, cultured to express specific molecular profiles, provides a promising avenue for targeted therapy. These cells harness and maintain their inherent anti-inflammatory properties, mitigating tissue deterioration and promoting tissue regeneration and repair. Due to the high cost and logistical challenges associated with autologous cell therapy production, our company is developing a novel drug, UMSC01 (allogeneic umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells), which serves as an excellent source for allogeneic cell therapy. These umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells can be pre-manufactured and stored for off-the-shelf use, allowing us to realize the concept of 'mass production and shelf-ready sale of cell products.' This significantly reduces cell culture costs while preserving the inherent anti-inflammatory properties and tissue regeneration capabilities of mesenchymal stem cells. This approach holds great market potential and product development value.

org.tc: 瀧儀生醫科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 瀧儀生醫科技股份有限公司為國內第一家，亦是世界上少數將電漿技術應用於生物醫學的公司。公司產品可產生7平方公分以上之大面積低溫射頻餘暉電漿，有別於習知使用高壓電產生之常壓管型電漿，以滿足全臉美白或慢性傷口修復處理。電漿處理時完全不具有高壓電直接對皮膚放電的不適感，並已經完成超過200例的皮膚美白處理，且完成動物傷口修復實驗，證實本產品所產生之餘暉電漿可有效誘發自體生成膠原蛋白。該系統並已經完成與機器手臂整合，利機器視覺辨識傷口位置並自動進行電漿修復，降低醫護人員長時間手持治療之困擾。現正收集臨床資料進行醫材認證，未來將應用於糖尿病足、褥瘡等慢性傷口修復，以降低燒燙傷患者更換敷藥經的痛苦，並盡可能降低抗生素之使用，提升患者生活品質與治療效果。
info.en: Longyi Biomedical Technology Co., Ltd. is the first in Taiwan and one of the few companies in the world to apply plasma technology to biomedicine. Our products can produce large-area low-temperature afterglow plasma of more than 7 square centimeters, which is different from the conventional normal-pressure tube-type plasma generated by high-voltage electricity to meet the needs of full-face whitening or chronic wound repair. There is absolutely no discomfort caused by high-voltage electricity directly discharging on the skin during plasma treatment. The system has been integrated with the robotic arm, using machine vision to identify the wound location and automatically perform plasma repair, reducing the hassle of long-term hand-held treatment by medical staff. Clinical data are currently being collected for medical material certification. In the future, it will be used in the repair of chronic wounds such as diabetic foot and bedsores to reduce the pain of changing dressings for patients with burns and scalds, reduce the use of antibiotics as much as possible, and improve patients' quality of life and treatment effects.

org.tc: 惠合再生醫學生技股份有限公司

info.tc:
惠合再生醫學生技位於台南科學園區，致力於非變性膠原蛋白的萃取與應用開發。以「高純度生醫級膠原蛋白萃取」及「去宿主細胞保留完整真皮組織」為主要核心技術。
高純度生醫級膠原蛋白萃取技術應用於「醫療器材」、「高階美容保養」與「機能保健」領域。 醫療器材的部分產品為 “耐敷吉”膠原蛋白傷口敷料(衛部醫器製字第004686號) 與 ”詩耐敷”疤痕凝膠(衛部醫器製壹字第007194號)，提供傷口全方位的照護。並以非變性I型膠原蛋白開發全新高階的膠原修護美容系列產品。機能保健部分，有鑑於熟齡市場靈活保健需求大增，成功開發非變性二型膠原蛋白CT II，不論是純度與濃度表現皆領先國際。
去宿主細胞技術應用於「醫療器材」與「組織再生醫學」領域。以獨特先進的去細胞技術去除宿主細胞，保留組織特有的物理結構與適當的機械強度，去細胞真皮將可扮演細胞外基質（Extracellular matrix) 的功能，應用於再生醫學領域。目前上市的產品為”鐵愛膜薄靈”可吸收膠原蛋白膜，衛部醫器製字第006931號
info.en:
High purity medical-grade collagen extraction technology
Life Fusion Inc. is located at the Southern Taiwan Science Park and is dedicated to the extraction and application development of non-denatured collagen protein. Our core technologies are “high-purity biomedical grade collagen extraction and “decellularized dermal tissue.” The high-purity biomedical grade collagen extraction technology is applied to the fields of “medical devices,” “premium cosmetic care” and “health supplements.” The decellularized dermis tissue technology is applied to the fields of “medical devices” and “tissue regenerative medicine.”

org.tc: 瀚源生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 瀚源生醫致力於結合半導體產業及生技醫療產業，利用半導體晶片取代傳統檢測方式，傳統生物分子檢定方法多半使用螢光標定法，或是配合分子鍵結呈色方式，再以光學的方式進行檢測，這些方法一般需要標定技術、如果要作多種生物標誌檢測，需要反覆的步驟，較為複雜。瀚源生醫利用台灣優異的半導體技術能量，製作以電性量測為主的陣列式場效電晶體感測晶片，開發出操作簡單、無須標定的分析平台，具有高靈敏度、高通量、快速且低成本的特性，藉由提高檢測範圍內的精準度，可大幅縮短檢測時間，為精準醫療產業 提供有效、有力的檢驗工具，能協助醫師在發病初期做出更正確的判讀，進而降低誤診率。除此之外，瀚源生醫所開發的檢測平台可即時針對生物體內數以千計的核酸與蛋白質進行分析，透過對這些標的的表現量與動態的觀察，不僅大幅增加對複雜致病機轉的掌握度，亦提高藥物開發的效率及成功率，在市場上相當具有競爭力。
info.en: Helios bioelectronics is committed to combining the semiconductor industry and the biotech medical industry, using semiconductor chips to replace traditional detection methods. Traditional biomolecule detection methods mostly use fluorescence calibration methods, or use molecular bonding color rendering methods, which is more complicated. Helios bioelectronics utilizes Taiwan's excellent semiconductor technology to produce array-type field-effect transistor sensing chips that focus on electrical measurement, and develops an analysis platform that is simple to operate and label-free, provide effective and powerful testing tools for the precision medicine industry. It can help doctors make more accurate interpretations in the early stages of the disease, thereby reducing the misdiagnosis rate.

info.tc:
耳寶 助聽器數位藍牙RIC耳掛型-6EF

耳寶 6EF 助聽器融合仁寶電子晶片智能處理技術，提供即時背景噪音過濾，確保清晰聽覺。支援藍牙連接，讓您直接接聽電話、享受音樂，還有語音導航功能，增強多功能性和便捷性。
具備IP54防塵防水功能，確保耐用穩定，適用各種環境。獨家毫秒移頻技術還原聲音，8頻道多頻處理與三種模式，適應不同聽覺需求。

6EF 助聽器滿足市場需求，解決聽覺問題，提供方便體驗。相較於其他高端助聽器，價格更具競爭力，提供高性價比選擇，引領市場趨勢。

以人為本的外觀與設計
6EF 助聽器設計輕巧簡約，舒適耳塞適用各耳朵尺寸。外觀採優雅中性色彩，融入使用者生活，提供卓越佩戴感受。

簡單操作與佩戴舒適
透過直觀易用的APP界面，無論年齡和技術背景如何，皆能輕鬆操作，提升自主性。柔軟材料耳塞，解壓和通風設計降低長時間佩戴不適。

符合政府補助資格的卓越產品
6EF 助聽器是全台唯一符合政府補助資格的產品，使用者可零元帶回家使用。卓越特點將改善身心障礙者和高齡者生活。
info.en:
Bluetooth RIC goodHearing R1 Hearing Aid

Hearing center/audiologist dispensing required

Delicate Receiver-In-Canal design

Patented millisecond frequency adjustment

16 Channels adjustable in hearing center or by hearing specialist

Enhances front voice while reducing noise from other directions

App easy tuning (iOS & Android)

3 Listening modes to fit the needs in different conversation environment

Provide 10 hours of continuous use time with a full charge

IP54 rated dustproof and waterproof

info.tc: InsightEyes EGD System為上消化道 (食道、胃、十二指腸) 診察用之內視鏡醫療器材，以磁力控制來進行觀察，即時性的影像傳輸提供即時性的診斷，提供患者更舒適的上消化道檢查方法。檢查過程中，患者全程清醒且可與醫師溝通檢查狀況，透過即時影像給患者及醫師不同以往的檢查經驗。台灣每年約100萬人次照胃鏡，經市調有超過2成的民眾非常恐懼或拒絕胃鏡檢查，磁控上消化道膠囊內視鏡可即時性診斷、自然吞嚥、免麻醉、一次性使用，是胃鏡檢查新選擇。

org.tc: 翔聿安科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 主要致力於開發可偵測及淨化室內空氣品質的感測器與設備，整合各式物理與化學感測器，可根據不同客戶需求量身設計，針對不同污染源，智慧啟動淨化設備即時改善空氣品質，避免有害物質長期累積對人體健康造成危害，淨化室內空氣品質。
info.en: Mainly committed to developing sensors and equipment that can detect and purify indoor air quality. It integrates various physical and chemical sensors and can be designed according to different customer needs. Targeting different pollution sources, the purification equipment can be intelligently activated to instantly improve air quality. , to avoid long-term accumulation of harmful substances causing harm to human health, and to purify indoor air quality.

org.tc: 台灣基康股份有限公司宜蘭分公司
org.en: GENE HEALTH Co., Ltd. Yilan Branch

info.tc: 發展建置一套基因體定序分析軟體生產線，專注在胎兒基因體序列分析的應用(例如胎兒染色體篩檢、晶片式全基因體分析、胚胎著床前單基因疾病篩檢等)，能夠基於業界OpenWDL標準化生物資訊分析流程設計，加速數據分析流程，透過雲端運算、平行化大量資料處理與快速運算技術簡化運算分析流程，處理效能可以提昇10倍以上；並做到基於業界開放標準GA4GH APIs的基因大數據自動管理與存儲，藉由雲端分布式數據湖系統，能夠儲存TB、 PB等級的巨量資料，並將分析運算所需的資料庫及相關流程軟體工具自動佈署在軟體容器中，建置一套基因檢測實驗室所需完整的生物資訊生產線解決方案，達到流程標準化、分析運算自動化、和檢測服務規模化與系統化等特性。
info.en: Develop and build a genome sequencing analysis software production line, focusing on the application of fetal genome sequence analysis (such as fetal chromosome screening, chip-based whole genome analysis, preimplantation single gene disease screening, etc.), which can be based on The industry's OpenWDL standardized biological information analysis process design accelerates the data analysis process. Through cloud computing, parallel large-scale data processing and fast computing technology to simplify the calculation and analysis process, the processing performance can be increased by more than 10 times; and it is based on the industry's open standard GA4GH APIs Automatic management and storage of genetic big data. Through the cloud distributed data lake system, it can store huge amounts of data in TB and PB levels, and automatically deploy the database and related process software tools required for analysis and calculation in software containers. , build a complete biological information production line solution required by genetic testing laboratories to achieve process standardization, automation of analysis operations, and large-scale and systematic testing services.

info.tc: 獨家取得授權代理—台灣技術的Ⅰ類醫材-博鴻親水性藻膠敷料(未滅菌)，應用於皮膚修護。

org.tc: 美落佳生技股份有限公司

info.tc: 本公司獨家專利「落葵萃取物」，萃取自純淨水源、土地友善種植的台灣原生落葵，國際化妝品成分命名（INCI）：Basella Alba Extract。其高含量落葵多醣（PBA）經實驗證實，可促進皮膚細胞再生能力、幫助傷口癒合，有效緩解異位性皮膚炎之症狀，並可促進皮膚膠原蛋白生成、減少疤痕產生。且經50人人體試驗，能有效減少黑色素沈澱暗沉，並通過50人人體貼布試驗結果無致過敏性，並經歐盟試驗方法OECD432、OECD439結果得知其無光敏性及無刺激性。落葵多醣（PBA）系列無添加天然個人皮膚護理保養產品，有效緩解過敏、敏感性和異位性皮膚的困擾，能防止皮膚粗糙乾燥、減少脫屑脫皮、舒緩敏癢不適、改善壓力暗沈、淨化細緻毛孔、增強皮膚抵抗能力等，適合敏感、過敏、異位性膚質、孕婦嬰幼兒、更年期肌膚、乾燥粗糙、黝黑暗沉、熟齡皺紋、油性痘痘及一般性肌膚使用。
info.en: PBA is extracted from Taiwan's native Basella alba, from pure water sources and land-friendly cultivation. International Cosmetic Ingredient Nomenclature (INCI): Basella Alba Extract. The PBA series of natural personal skin care products can effectively relieve the problems of allergies, sensitivity and atopic skin. It can prevent rough and dry skin, reduce scaling and peeling, relieve itching and discomfort, and improve stress dullness. , purify fine pores, enhance skin resistance, etc.

org.tc: 聯華生技股份有限公司

info.tc:
聯華生技擁有專屬的檢測試劑QMS工廠，並通過ISO13485品質系統認證，成為全國範疇最齊全的檢測試劑供應商。快篩試劑具有使用方便、結果快速、價格經濟等特點，在臨床診斷及預防醫學中扮演著不可或缺的角色。我們秉持「預防勝於治療」的理念，將便利的居家試劑引入家庭，融合保健、保養與機能性家用器材，提供全方位的保健服務，使民眾能在家中輕鬆做好防護，提升身心健康與生活品質。

此次參展我們主打一系列快篩試劑，包括心肌旋轉蛋白/肌酸激酶-MB異構酶試劑，能即時偵測急性心肌梗塞；幽門螺旋桿菌/糞便潛血二合一試劑與輪狀/腺病毒二合一檢測試劑，可有效篩查腸胃道病原感染；協助診斷呼吸道病原感染的呼吸道融合細胞病毒與腺病毒檢測試劑也在展示範圍之中。此外，我們更有多項即將上市的快篩試劑項目，例如：婦科多合一檢測試劑，為女性提供全方位的健康檢測服務。

聯華生技是生命健康的守護者，我們致力於提供高品質的健康產品與服務，讓您享受健康、美好的生活！
info.en:
Firstep Bioresearch, Inc. possesses a QMS factory for the production of rapid tests, and has obtained ISO13485 certification, establishing itself as the most complete supplier of testing reagents. Rapid tests are characterized by their ease of use, rapid result display, and cost-effectiveness, playing an indispensable role in clinical diagnostics and preventive medicine. With the principle of "prevention is better than cure,"we introduce testing reagents for home use, providing comprehensive healthcare service by integrating health, maintenance and functional household equipment. 
In this exhibition, we introduced a series of rapid screening reagents, including: Cardiac Troponin I / Creatine Kinase-MB Isozyme 2 in 1 Rapid Test for the detection of acute myocardial infarction; Helicobacter pylori / Fecal Occult Blood 2 in 1 Rapid Test, and Rotavirus/Adenovirus Duo Rapid Test,screening for gastrointestinal pathogen infections. Additionally, Respiratory Syncytial Virus Rapid Test and Adenovirus Rapid Test aid in the diagnosis of respiratory pathogen infections. Furthermore, we have several upcoming projects, such as the multi-panel gynecological repid test, providing women with a comprehensive health screening service. 
Firstep Bioresearch, Inc. is a guardian of life and health. We are devoted to providing high-quality health products and services, allowing you to enjoy a healthy and wonderful life！

org.tc: 和曜生技股份有限公司

info.tc: 台灣特色保健植萃原料與生醫應用技術及原料，和曜生技透過生產健康種苗之優勢，於台灣在地優質農場契作栽培作物，利用生物科技萃取技術，研發高品質保健植萃原料，與國立大學或教學醫院合作驗證，致力開發符合國際原料標準的台灣特色植物保健原料，目前擁有二項植萃醫藥應用台灣專利I641378、I578991。
info.en: HOYAO BIOTECH contracts with quality local farms to ensure that healthy seedlings grow into high-quality plants for further laboratory extraction. We also actively cooperate with universities and medical centers to develop and validate the efficacy of plant ingredients that meet international standards. HOYAO BIOTECH currently holds two proprietary patents on plant extract ingredients, including patents (I641378/TW and I578991/TW).

org.tc: 財團法人國家實驗研究院國家實驗動物中心
org.en: National Applied Research Laboratories National Laboratory Animal Center

info.tc: 國研院動物中心秉持著「品質第一，福祉優先」的核心精神，提供生物醫學研究與生技藥品測試需要的臨床前動物試驗資源與標準化環境，在科學應用與動物福祉雙軌並進的基礎上，提供多元化的技術服務及教育訓練課程，滿足生醫研究需求，提高臨床前試驗效率。配合國家生技發展政策，國研院動物中心進駐重要生技發展群落，依在地生技研究與產業發展特色，支援產業界與學研界之生醫研發、新藥開發及醫療器材發展。
info.en: The National Laboratory Animal Center (NLAC) supports the development of biotechnology industry and biomedical research. We serve as an animal breeding and testing environment, pre-clinical evaluation of new drugs and biotechnology products, microbiota-related research and medical devices validation. In the same time, we also support innovation in relation to the 3R principles (Replacement, Reduction, and Refinement), and promote alternative methods and alternative technologies to animal testing. NLAC also provides specialized courses for caretakers, technicians, researchers, facility managers and laboratory animal veterinarian to improve the development of biomedical researches.

org.tc: 財團法人國家實驗研究院科技政策研究與資訊中心
org.en: Science & Technology Policy Research and Information Center

info.tc: 國研院科政中心作為國家級科技政策智庫，持續扮演科技政策研究與科技計畫管理的關鍵角色。配合政府智慧醫療、精準醫療及全齡健康的發展策略，多年來持續培育國內跨領域新藥與醫材商品開發人才，推動「STB醫療器材產品設計人才培育計畫」及「SPARK Taiwan生醫轉譯加值人才培育計畫」，與美國史丹福大學維持密切合作關係，透過選派人員赴海外受訓及建立在地化培育機制，致力於培育國內生醫商品化人才，孵育具有前瞻性及國際競爭力的創新，以帶動我國生醫產業的創新動能，推動精準健康，擁抱生醫新時代，為提升台灣生醫產業創新及全人類福祉奠定堅實基石。
info.en: The Science and Technology Policy Research and Information Center (STPI) of the National Applied Research Laboratories (NARLabs) plays a crucial role as a national-level think tank for science and technology policy research and technology program management. In alignment with the government's strategies for smart healthcare, precision medicine, and health for all ages. STPI has been nurturing interdisciplinary talent for the development of new pharmaceuticals and medical devices in Taiwan for many years. This effort includes the promotion of the "Stanford-Taiwan Biomedical Fellowship Program"(STB) and the "SPARK Taiwan Program"in collaboration with Stanford University. Through overseas training and the establishment of localized training mechanisms, STPI aims to cultivate talent capable of commercializing biomedical innovations in Taiwan, thereby driving innovation in the domestic biotechnology industry, promoting precision health, embracing the new era of biomedicine, and laying a solid foundation for enhancing Taiwan's biotechnology industry innovation and the well-being of all humanity.

org.tc: 財團法人國家實驗研究院台灣半導體研究中心

info.tc: 台灣半導體中心所實現的智慧刺激訊號產生系統，是利用數位類比轉換晶片及低雜訊高頻放大晶片，整合無線高速傳輸處理器；並結合中心自行研發之智慧訊號產生軟/韌體及應用軟體(APP)所開發出之成果。此系統具備可攜式、可程式化、多通道、無線、即時量測等特色，可應用於多樣化之器官晶片感測之電訊號量測及分析需求。
info.en: Cardiac Tissue Culture Stimulator (CTCS V1.0) is a multi-channel, bi-polar, pulse stimulator that can provide positive, negative or alternating voltage pulses of up to 10 volts, and with a maximum current of 30mA. CTCS is designed to meet a broad range of neurophysiological stimulation requirements. It owns the advantages of portable, programmable, multi-channel, wireless, real-time measurement.

org.tc: 財團法人國家實驗研究院台灣儀器科技研究中心
org.en: Taiwan Instrument Research Institute, National Applied Research Laboratories

info.tc: 台灣儀器科技研究中心是國內唯一可協助學術界理工醫農各領域，開發前瞻研究所需客製化特殊儀器設備的單位，秉持創新精進技術、技術精進服務之動力，提供產學界儀器技術支援與創新應用服務，亦為台灣首創提供一站式醫材開發驗證輔導的單位，為學界研發創意商品化的夢工廠，本次呈現生醫量能與協助新創公司技術升級之成果展示。
info.en: TIRI is the only organization that can provide advanced　instrumentation research and related instrument system innovations for the fields, including science, engineering, biomedical and agricultural science, etc. By holding the belief of“Drive Technology Innovation to Promote Academic Research,” TIRI assists the industry, academia and research organizations with instrument technology solutions and innovative application services. It is also the first organization to offer one-stop services for medical devices development, consultation, test and verification. Serving as a national dream team, TIRI is dedicated to assisting the academia in commercializing their creative ideas. Introductions of accelerators and start-up teams, with their products and achievements.

org.tc: 國家科學及技術委員會南部科學園區管理局
org.en: Southern Taiwan Science Park Bureau, National Science and Technology Council

info.tc: 南科生醫產業聚落目前共有87家廠商，為台灣尖端生醫研發技術之產業聚落，每年創造近百億產值，年成長率達15%以上。
info.en: There are over 87 tenant companies in the iBioMed Cluster of the Southern Taiwan Science Park (STSP), one of the largest research and development sites of advanced biomedical technologies in Taiwan, creating billions (NT$) of production values each year, with an annual growth rate over 15%.

org.tc: 訊聯生物科技股份有限公司

info.tc: 訊聯生技集團創立於1999年，以「再生醫學/細胞治療」、「精準健康/基因醫學」、「分子數位科技/智慧研發」三大核心能力，成為亞洲最具國際代表性的生技品牌。旗下「訊聯生技」(2007年-台灣第一家專攻細胞治療上市櫃公司)，通過衛福部核准特管法細胞治療，包括脂肪間質幹細胞與免疫細胞，並持續拓展再生醫學及細胞治療應用範圍、精進醫美/毛髮生長、Exosome等細胞衍生物及細胞製程的品質與技術。2022年成立「訊聯細胞智藥股份有限公司」，加速開發細胞製劑、Exosome的診斷與治療，並結合智慧研發、基因和細胞療法開發技術、數位模擬創新能力，提供更廣大服務。
info.en: BIONET is the first publicly listed company in Taiwan specializing in cell therapy that possesses the core technology and preparation capabilities of medical-grade cell therapy products. The company not only applies cells to more than 60 types of diseases but also provides exosome services. In addition, The Mesenchymal Stem Cell bank was established in 2005. Under the special regulations for cell therapy by the Ministry of Health and Welfare, approved treatments include the use of adipose-derived stem cells for osteoarthritis and chronic wounds, and immune cells (CIK) for the treatment of various cancers such as colorectal cancer, lung cancer, breast cancer, and liver cancer.

org.tc: 微體生物醫學股份有限公司

info.tc: 肺癌發現時點越晚治療費用越高，治癒機率也越渺茫，然肺癌早期症狀輕微，半數發現時已達晚期，啟動規模性且安全的定期檢測才是解決之道；尤其大眾對肺癌認知侷限於老菸槍，殊不知台灣女性就醫人數已超越男性！空氣汙染與遺傳因素引發不吸菸者罹癌的比例不容小覷。肺癌更是全球癌症死因與新確診人數雙冠王，預計至2040年每年奪去三百萬人生命。微體生醫開發出尿液中與肺癌相關之生物標記檢測技術，協助改善肺癌之全球公衛危機。
info.en: Late lung cancer detection leads to higher treatment costs and lower chances of a cure. Lung cancer often starts with mild symptoms, and around half of cases are diagnosed in advanced stages. To combat this issue, implementing large-scale and safe regular screenings is imperative. Interestingly, while lung cancer awareness is often linked to smokers, in Taiwan, more women seek medical care than men. The impact of both air pollution and genetic associations should not be underestimated. Globally, lung cancer ranks as the leading cause of cancer-related deaths and new cases, with an estimated three million annual fatalities projected by 2040. In response to this pressing global public health crisis, Vitae Biomedical has developed a urine-based biomarker test for lung cancer. Visit our booth at Southern Taiwan Science Park to learn about our solutions.

org.tc: 俊質生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 目前癌症篩檢相關技術與服務在市面上已行之有年，但其準確度卻最為人詬病。SAA蛋白質檢測只要抽一管血，不用空腹，不用清腸，透過獨家奈米粒子的純化，使我們能針對血液中微量的SAA蛋白質進行質譜分析，並利用自行研發的AI生物判讀軟體分析癌症風險，相較於傳統只看總量的方式更能有效的辨認癌症，目前SAA蛋白質檢測針對大腸癌篩檢的整體準確率是91%，針對胃癌篩檢的整體準確率是85%，已經相當接近腸胃鏡檢查的結果，又不需要忍受侵入性檢查的不便利及不舒服，是腸胃癌早期篩檢相當優良的替代性選擇。
info.en: Cancer screening-related technologies and services have been available on the market for many years, but their accuracy is the most criticized. SAA Protein Test requires only a tube of blood draw, and does not require fasting and bowel cleansing in advance. Through the purification of exclusive nanoparticles, we can target and analyze trace amount of SAA in the blood. The protein is analyzed by high-end mass spectrometry, and the self-developed AI biological interpretation software is used to analyze the cancer risk. SAA Protein Test has an overall detection accuracy of 91% for Colorectal Cancer and 85% for Gastric Cancer, which is pretty much close to the result of Colonoscopy and Endoscopy. No need to endure the inconvenience and discomfort of invasive examination, SAA Protein Test is an excellent alternative for early screening of Colorectal Cancer and Gastric Cancer.

製造原廠: 鐳鼎科技股份有限公司

info.en:
LightMed Dental is a leading company who designs and produces 2940nm Er:YAG dental laser device with our brand,【LIGHTMED】. 【LIGHTMED】Er:YAG dental laser has 20 preset parameters, 10 for soft tissue and 10 for hard tissue. With built-in air compressor,【LIGHTMED】Er:YAG dental laser can provide stable laser performance and also the flexibility for doctors to move the device between different clinic rooms.

What are more advantages of【LIGHTMED】Er:YAG dental laser:

4.	No high-pitched sound and vibrations.
5.	Tissue regeneration led from biostimulation.
6.	Less anesthesia uses.

Comparing with traditional dental scalpels and handpieces, using【LIGHTMED】Er:YAG dental laser will provide patients with more comfortable and easy treatment experiences.

Distribute By (Exclusive in Taiwan)：POYE X-RAY MANUFACTURING CORPORATION

org.tc: 醫百科技股份有限公司

info.tc:
RETINA 整合重覆跨顱磁刺激(rTMS)精準定位
重覆跨顱磁刺激是種針對憂鬱症的非侵入性腦部儀器治療，利用電流經由刺激線圈產生磁場在由磁場來提升或抑制大腦神經元的活動性，例如刺激重度憂鬱症患者的大腦左側前額葉，來增進額葉調控情緒的功能。  其測量該運動神經元動作電位閥值，若是刺激位置偏差1mm，則可能會損失多達30%之能量輸出，利用RETINA導航系統結合重覆跨顱磁刺激(rTMS)預期將可精準定位達到協助醫師即時檢視磁場作治療頭部的所在位置，保持最佳治療成效。
info.en:
RETINA Integration for Precise Positioning of Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (rTMS)

Repetitive Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation (rTMS) is a non-invasive brain instrument therapy used to treat depression. It involves the use of electrical currents to generate a magnetic field through a stimulation coil, which either enhances or inhibits the activity of brain neurons by using the magnetic field. For example, it stimulates the left frontal lobe of the brain in patients with severe depression to enhance the regulation of emotions.

It measures the threshold of action potentials in motor neurons, and a deviation of 1mm in the stimulation location can result in a loss of up to 30% of energy output. By combining the RETINA navigation system with repetitive transcranial magnetic stimulation (rTMS), it is expected to achieve precise positioning, allowing doctors to instantly view the location of the magnetic field for treating the head, thus maintaining optimal treatment effectiveness.

org.tc: 儕陞生化技術股份有限公司

info.tc: 「儕陞生化技術股份有限公司」自創立以來即致力於植物性外用製劑的研究與開發。將近20年的外用製劑開發經驗同時納入了美國FDA植物藥品管精神，並整體規劃將製程從原料、半成品到成品做最適化的安排及規劃。同時，仕都莎善尼仕創傷敷料主要成分來源為日常食用之大宗作物「大豆」，大豆此一原料不僅來源穩定、取得容易且價格合理，使得仕都莎善尼仕創傷敷料之生產成本極具競爭力。
info.en:
Since establishment, Charsire Biotech. has been committed to the research and development of topically applied botanical preparation. With 20 years of experience in development of topical preparations and the US FDA quality guideline for botanical drugs , Charsire optimally arranges and manages the production process from raw materials, semi-finished products to finished products. Also, the main ingrediants sources of Sanovazo comes from soybean. Soybean is not only a stable source, but also easy to obtain and have a reasonable price, which makes the cost of Sanovazo quite competitive.

Sanovazo trauma dressing is one of the few products for caring for the side effects of radiotherapy. In terms of clinical efficacy, it can effectively minimize the side effects of radiation therapy on the skin. The safety of Sanovazo trauma dressing has completed the pre-clinical toxicology study for topical new drugs. Sanovazo has highly completed its functionality and safety.

org.tc: 惠合再生醫學生技股份有限公司

info.tc:
惠合再生醫學生技位於台南科學園區，致力於非變性膠原蛋白的萃取與應用開發。以「高純度生醫級膠原蛋白萃取」及「去宿主細胞保留完整真皮組織」為主要核心技術。
高純度生醫級膠原蛋白萃取技術應用於「醫療器材」、「高階美容保養」與「機能保健」領域。 醫療器材的部分產品為 “耐敷吉”膠原蛋白傷口敷料(衛部醫器製字第004686號) 與 ”詩耐敷”疤痕凝膠(衛部醫器製壹字第007194號)，提供傷口全方位的照護。並以非變性I型膠原蛋白開發全新高階的膠原修護美容系列產品。機能保健部分，有鑑於熟齡市場靈活保健需求大增，成功開發非變性二型膠原蛋白CT II，不論是純度與濃度表現皆領先國際。
去宿主細胞技術應用於「醫療器材」與「組織再生醫學」領域。以獨特先進的去細胞技術去除宿主細胞，保留組織特有的物理結構與適當的機械強度，去細胞真皮將可扮演細胞外基質（Extracellular matrix) 的功能，應用於再生醫學領域。目前上市的產品為”鐵愛膜薄靈”可吸收膠原蛋白膜，衛部醫器製字第006931號
info.en:
High purity medical-grade collagen extraction technology
Life Fusion Inc. is located at the Southern Taiwan Science Park and is dedicated to the extraction and application development of non-denatured collagen protein. Our core technologies are “high-purity biomedical grade collagen extraction and “decellularized dermal tissue.” The high-purity biomedical grade collagen extraction technology is applied to the fields of “medical devices,” “premium cosmetic care” and “health supplements.” The decellularized dermis tissue technology is applied to the fields of “medical devices” and “tissue regenerative medicine.”

org.tc: 柏瑞醫股份有限公司

info.tc:
柏瑞醫 - 骨質疏鬆AI輔助篩檢系統
此骨質疏鬆影像輔助分析，搭配X1 Imaging使用，可在6秒內完成X光影像的骨鬆風險分析並產出客製化的報告，可解決一般X光檢測法的困難痛點。高達90%的骨質疏鬆辨識度，協助醫師進行X光照片的判讀並給予疾病診斷建議，因此，此技術將成為檢驗價格低、判讀快速、普及性高且精準度高的早期疾病預防與篩檢利器。
info.en: Biomedica - Smart Osteoporosis Screening Solution developed can perform osteoporosis risk analysis on X-ray images and generate customized reports within 6 seconds, addressing the challenges of conventional X-ray testing methods. With up to 90% accuracy in osteoporosis detection, this solution can assist physicians in interpreting X-ray images and provide diagnostic recommendations. Therefore, this AI technology has the potential to become a powerful tool for early disease prevention and screening.

info.tc:
聯華生技擁有專屬的檢測試劑QMS工廠，並通過ISO13485品質系統認證，成為全國範疇最齊全的檢測試劑供應商。快篩試劑具有使用方便、結果快速、價格經濟等特點，在臨床診斷及預防醫學中扮演著不可或缺的角色。我們秉持「預防勝於治療」的理念，將便利的居家試劑引入家庭，融合保健、保養與機能性家用器材，提供全方位的保健服務，使民眾能在家中輕鬆做好防護，提升身心健康與生活品質。

此次參展我們主打一系列快篩試劑，包括心肌旋轉蛋白/肌酸激酶-MB異構酶試劑，能即時偵測急性心肌梗塞；幽門螺旋桿菌/糞便潛血二合一試劑與輪狀/腺病毒二合一檢測試劑，可有效篩查腸胃道病原感染；協助診斷呼吸道病原感染的呼吸道融合細胞病毒與腺病毒檢測試劑也在展示範圍之中。此外，我們更有多項即將上市的快篩試劑項目，例如：婦科多合一檢測試劑，為女性提供全方位的健康檢測服務。

聯華生技是生命健康的守護者，我們致力於提供高品質的健康產品與服務，讓您享受健康、美好的生活！
info.en:
Firstep Bioresearch, Inc. possesses a QMS factory for the production of rapid tests, and has obtained ISO13485 certification, establishing itself as the most complete supplier of testing reagents. Rapid tests are characterized by their ease of use, rapid result display, and cost-effectiveness, playing an indispensable role in clinical diagnostics and preventive medicine. With the principle of "prevention is better than cure,"we introduce testing reagents for home use, providing comprehensive healthcare service by integrating health, maintenance and functional household equipment. 
In this exhibition, we introduced a series of rapid screening reagents, including: Cardiac Troponin I / Creatine Kinase-MB Isozyme 2 in 1 Rapid Test for the detection of acute myocardial infarction; Helicobacter pylori / Fecal Occult Blood 2 in 1 Rapid Test, and Rotavirus/Adenovirus Duo Rapid Test,screening for gastrointestinal pathogen infections. Additionally, Respiratory Syncytial Virus Rapid Test and Adenovirus Rapid Test aid in the diagnosis of respiratory pathogen infections. Furthermore, we have several upcoming projects, such as the multi-panel gynecological repid test, providing women with a comprehensive health screening service. 
Firstep Bioresearch, Inc. is a guardian of life and health. We are devoted to providing high-quality health products and services, allowing you to enjoy a healthy and wonderful life！

org.tc: 亞果生醫股份有限公司

info.tc: 亞果生醫致力於高階醫材的研發與生產，以提供天然膠原蛋白支架於人體，幫助身體不同組織受傷的修復為概念，發展一系列可運用於醫療體系不同領域與科別的產品。亞果生醫運用超臨界二氧化碳流體去細胞技術，對動物組織進行清洗與去細胞，留下天然膠原蛋白支架，非重組膠原蛋白，且無需使用化學交聯劑，即可成為臨床高階醫療器材，可開發運用於骨科、牙科、心血管專科、眼科、外科手術、傷口照護等領域，透過仿生結構去細胞材料，修復受損部位，提供患部較佳的修復環境，且不會引起任何免疫及過敏反應，應為目前市場上最合適的人體組織結構修復產品。
info.en: ACRO Biomedical develops and produces biomaterial medical devices for human tissue engineering and regenerative medicine (TERM). ACRO Biomedical uses its proprietary supercritical CO₂ extraction technology to remove cells, fat and non-collagenous proteins from animal tissues, while keeping the undiminished collagen scaffold as the biomaterial for high-end medical devices in the medical regenerative field of wound care, orthopedics, dentistry, ophthalmology, aesthetic microsurgery, cardiovascular and neural surgery, etc.

org.tc: 瓦里安台灣股份有限公司
org.en: Varian Medical Systems Taiwan Co., Ltd.

info.tc: 瓦里安醫療系統創立於1948年，是首家誕生於矽谷的高科技醫療公司。以創造一個無懼癌症的世界為願景，瓦里安醫療已成為研發和提供癌症治療解決方案的全球領導者。我們前瞻地應用人工智慧、機器學習和資料分析等先進技術打造智慧癌症治療方式，致力於提供領先的放射治療、放射外科、質子治療、近距離放射治療和介入治療解決方案，支援全球臨床合作夥伴每年為超過四百萬患者提供治療。2021年，瓦里安醫療成為西門子醫療的一員。
info.en: At Varian, a Siemens Healthineers company, we envision a world without fear of cancer. For more than 70 years, we have developed, built and delivered innovative cancer care technologies and solutions for our clinical partners around the globe to help them treat millions of patients each year. With an Intelligent Cancer Care approach, we are harnessing advanced technologies like artificial intelligence, machine learning and data analytics to enhance cancer treatment and expand access to care. Our 11,000 employees across 70 locations keep the patient and our clinical partners at the center of our thinking as we power new victories in cancer care. Because, for cancer patients everywhere, their fight is our fight. For more information, visit http://www.varian.com and follow @VarianMedSys on Twitter.

org.tc: 國家科學及技術委員會中部科學園區

info.tc:
由國家科學及技術委員會中部科學園區領軍下，串聯中部地區生醫廠商以微創醫材、智慧輔具及生醫產品為主軸進行聯展，以情境式展現醫材產品及醫療問題解決方案，用視覺連結體驗，讓參觀者快速了解各類醫材產品特色，展現中部特色醫材產業聚落成果效益。
國家科學及技術委員會中部科學園區今年率領包含巨量移動、台灣骨王、全微精密、長聖國際生技、醫乘智慧、瑞基海洋與開啟基因共7家廠商，共同投入精準用藥、精準照護、癌症精準診斷及AI智慧醫療檢測技術等精準醫療與醫材產品研發與製造。
info.en: Under the leadership of the Central Science Park, biomedical manufacturers in the central region will be exhibited with minimally invasive medical materials, intelligent aids together. In this exhibition, the biomedical products are the main axis. The medical problem solutions will be presented in a situational manner. Also, the medical materials used in the medical device will be exhibited. This experience is enable Visitors quickly understand the characteristics of various types of medical material products by visual connections. The show will be benefit of the central medical material industry settlement.

org.tc: 財團法人塑膠工業技術發展中心

info.tc:
創新「一站式」整合服務  塑膠中心展現高分子醫材研發製作能量
近年來隨著人口老化及創新醫療技術日新月異，醫療器材產業已成為國家重點發展的推動項目。財團法人塑膠工業技術發展中心(PIDC)成立於1993年，從2000年開始，在醫材領域耕耘多年，扮演台灣高分子醫材領域發展的重要推手，已逐步建構完整專業的服務平台。
為輔導協助國內塑膠加工業改善設備，提高生產技術及產品品質，改良製造方法，開發新產品，並推動國際合作技術交流，以增強競爭能力，2018年12月11日高分子醫材大樓正式啟用，同時成立「生醫部」，建置專門的平台服務，提供醫療器材業者從產品設計開發、製程技術、供應鏈整合、檢測驗證、品質系統輔導至產品上市，提供國內生醫業者涵蓋產品全生命週期的「一站式」整合性服務。
服務內容包括，
◆ 醫材產品設計開發
◆ 專利檢索與產業調查分析
◆ 製程技術及供應鏈整合
◆ 檢測驗證服務
◆ 品質系統輔導
◆ 上市許可證輔導
info.en:
One-Step Shop of Medical Devices 
Plastics Industry Development Center Show the development of polymeric medical devices in Taiwan
In order to assist plastics industry and accelerate the advancement of the plastics technology, Plastics Industry Development Center (PIDC) was established in 1993 and funded by the government and plastics industry.
Since 2000, PIDC has been working in the field of medical devices for many years, playing an important role in the development of polymeric medical devices in Taiwan. To accelerate medical devices innovation, we deliver below services:
◆ Medical device design and development
◆ Patent and industry analysis
◆ Process technology and supply chain integration
◆ Test verification service
◆ Quality system counseling
◆ License application counseling

org.tc: 台灣骨王生技股份有限公司
org.en: Taiwan Mian Orthopaedic Biotechnology Co., Ltd.

info.tc: 為減少對正常組織的傷害，醫師需在狹小視野及有限的操作空間進行複雜的脊椎手術，因此更需要利用導航系統的引導直接到達病灶處，導航畫面即時 AR 投影呈現病患體內資訊在醫師眼前，讓醫師專注在患者身上的手術區域，提升微創手術的安全性和精準度。
info.en: In order to reduce damage to normal tissues, doctors need to perform complex spinal surgery in a narrow field of view and limited operating space. Therefore, it is even more necessary to use the guidance of the navigation system to directly reach the lesion. The real-time AR projection of the navigation screen presents the information in the patient's body in front of the doctor's eyes allowing doctors to focus on the surgical area of the patient, improving the safety and accuracy of minimally invasive surgery.

org.tc: 醫乘智慧有限公司

info.tc: 尿液細胞學檢查，是一種非侵入式的尿液檢測。是排除膀胱癌造成血尿的第一線檢查。目前仰賴細胞病理醫檢師以及細胞病理醫師在顯微鏡下進行質化的檢驗。若無法排除正常，臨床醫師依據臨床資訊及尿液細胞學檢測結果，會安排侵入式膀胱鏡檢查。膀胱鏡，對於接受檢查的病患而言，是需要局部麻醉，不僅不舒服且會感到恐懼。如何減少膀胱鏡侵入性檢查所帶來的身心不適，但又不希望遺漏任何可疑的病灶，在平衡檢查帶來的不適，檢查時間，還有檢查的正確性上，是非常的重要且不容易的。因此，醫乘智慧(AIxMed Inc.) 開發AI 軟體協助分析尿液細胞影像，搭配量化數據，提供病理醫師膀胱癌尿液細胞檢查參考，期能在尿液細胞學以及各種細胞學檢測上，帶來平台式的解決方案。
info.en: Detecting cancer through AI Empowered Digital Cytology

org.tc: 開啟基因股份有限公司

info.tc:
開啟基因公司(CatchGene™)開發了專門用於萃取游離核酸的自動化儀器：iCATCHER 12。iCATCHER 12系統有別於市面上現有的自動化核酸純化系統，因這些系統無法產出符合”精準醫療”應用場景的高濃度、高純度核酸。開啟基因突破既有的自動化純化機台磁珠技術，iCATCHER 12 運用了獨家的CAPP技術，基於柱膜管的原理，利用像魚網一樣的方式回收核酸，對於數量極少、片段又小的cfDNA來說，效果極佳! 回收率大增!
優點是：
1.	大體積樣本上機 
2.	產出適合下游分析系統的高純度核酸 
3.	一個樣本以一直線方向進行純化，減少交叉汙染的機會 
4.	上機程序簡單
info.en:
Existing automated nucleic acid purification systems cannot produce high-quality Eluate fit for Precision Medicine market. Since they have strong disadvantages for recovering cfDNA:
•	Low Concentration 
•	Too Much Inhibitors inside
•	Cross-Contamination 
Breaking through the existing beads technology, iCATCHER 12 uses membrane column technology instead. And the advantages of iCATCHER 12 are:
•	Large Sample Input 
•	High Purity for Downstream Analysis 
•	One Sample in One Line
•	Easy Set Up

org.tc: 巨量移動科技有限公司

info.tc:
巨量心電分析平台做到了AI心律不整判讀、AI抗雜訊以及傳統流程簡化、自動化分析等之創新，並透過平台整合所有工具以及服務，使心電圖判讀效率及準確度皆大大提升。

內文（列點特色優點呈現）：

心電智能分析平台提供在線心電分析的網站界面。 用戶可以上傳、查看、操作心電圖數據並獲得包含心電圖功能的報告，並支援 20 種以上輔助判讀結果。心電智能分析平台的主要特點是： 心電圖數據上傳、分析，心電數據顯示、心電圖功能顯示、異常顯示數據標記工具、分析報告及其管理系統
info.en:
B.D. Mobile focuses on digital health. The B.D. Mobile ECG Analysis Platform provides the tools needed by professional medical personnel for ECG interpretation through AI.

Users can perform online ECG feature analysis, disease identification, data management, process management, and provide customized report through our platform. The goal is to simplify the modern ECG measurement process, accelerate the efficiency of ECG diagnosis, and provide more accurate ECG interpretation aids.

The ECG analysis platform has achieved AI arrhythmia interpretation, AI anti-noise, traditional process simplification, automated analysis and other innovations. Through the platform integration of all tools and services, the efficiency and accuracy of ECG interpretation have been greatly improved.

org.tc: 全微精密股份有限公司

info.tc:
產品包含手術清創刮刀與黏質骨注射器，並建立 PRF+黏質骨技術，提供臨床一套完整配套措施。從使用手術清創刮刀進行刮骨，採集患者自體血液後取得 PRF，混合自體骨或人工骨方式，經由黏質骨注射器輸入術後刮骨空腔。目的在於術中可將死骨刮除乾淨，術後骨質加速並良好生長，提高手術成功率並促使患者可盡早負重。
說明如下 :
	手術清創刮刀：透過特殊偏心軸刀頭設計，可擴大刮骨範圍符合臨床需求。刀頭為實心結構，解決市售品斷刀等問題。在刀面設計為螺旋刀紋具更佳之切削能力，於臨床操作上更為便利。
	PRF+補骨技術：本計畫引用先 導研究成果 (包含 PRF離心技術與黏質骨配方參數 )，並提出精準治療 (自體 PRF+補骨 )方式，提供骨質術後加速生長。此方法尚未有研究與臨床提出，為全球首創發想之概念。
	黏質骨注射器：配合黏質骨使用，可從體外輸送黏質骨至股骨頭內部，並符合微創功能需求。
info.en:
Our product includes a surgical debridement scraper and a sticky bone (PRF+bone) injector, introducing the innovative sticky bone graft technique. This provides a comprehensive clinical solution, promoting postoperative bone growth, enhancing surgical success rates, and enabling early weight-bearing for patients.
	Surgical debridement scraper:
Eccentric axis head design for an expanded bone scraping range to meet clinical needs. Solid head structure to address the issue of blade breakage commonly seen in available products. Spiral blade design for improved cutting ability, facilitating clinical operations.
	Sticky bone system:
Numerous studies have shown that PRF promotes bone growth. Our team, building on prior research, has pioneered a precise treatment method. This approach ensures high-quality bone for accelerated postoperative growth and repair, marking a global first in the field.

	Sticky bone injector:
Innovatively designed to accommodate sticky bone application, it offers a straightforward and smooth operation process. It efficiently transports sticky bone to the interior of the femoral head, aligning with clinical minimally invasive requirements.

	Rigorous validation:
Through animal experiments, the precise treatment efficacy will be confirmed. Mechanical experiments will conducted to explore the relationship between bone growth efficiency and strength, providing reference for subsequent clinical treatments.

org.tc: 長聖國際生技股份有限公司
org.en: Ever Supreme Bio Technology Co., LTD.

info.tc: 臍帶間質幹細胞研發培養特定分子表現族群之間質幹細胞進行相對應治療，發揮並維持間質幹細胞本身抗發炎緩解組織惡化及促進組織再生修復特色，依據其細胞具備功能特色，目前的細胞治療幾乎都是自體治療。然而自體細胞治療價格昂貴，無法大量生產，長聖開發中的新藥UMSC01（異體臍帶間質幹細胞），其臍帶間質幹細胞是很好的異體細胞治療來源，可事先製造保存並於需要時取用(Off-the-Shelf)，因此可實現「大規模生產並放在貨架上銷售的細胞產品」，大幅度降低細胞培養成本，除此之外並不會影響原本間質幹細胞本身抗發炎緩解組織惡化及促進組織再生修復特色，具備市場潛力與產品開發價值。
info.en: The development of umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells, cultured to express specific molecular profiles, provides a promising avenue for targeted therapy. These cells harness and maintain their inherent anti-inflammatory properties, mitigating tissue deterioration and promoting tissue regeneration and repair. Due to the high cost and logistical challenges associated with autologous cell therapy production, our company is developing a novel drug, UMSC01 (allogeneic umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells), which serves as an excellent source for allogeneic cell therapy. These umbilical cord mesenchymal stem cells can be pre-manufactured and stored for off-the-shelf use, allowing us to realize the concept of 'mass production and shelf-ready sale of cell products.' This significantly reduces cell culture costs while preserving the inherent anti-inflammatory properties and tissue regeneration capabilities of mesenchymal stem cells. This approach holds great market potential and product development value.

info.tc: 參展的竹科宜蘭園區新創公司包含有針對需要農村場域試驗及地方轉型工作之農民，提供農村場域及客戶媒合及銀柳提煉醫材的蘭陽美人智農生技有限公司、針對有簡化採購流程及高度耐用性聲學產品之客戶提供高階耳機、耳麥等音頻產品/醫療服務的亞立田股份有限公司、提供感測、雲端AI智能控制系統的一站式空氣治理服務的翔聿安科技股份有限公司等九家新創廠家，各家公司均於展會中竹科宜蘭園區專區展出其特色產品與服務。
info.en:
The exhibiting startups at the Zhubei-Yilan Park in the Hsinchu Science Park include nine companies that cater to the needs of farmers requiring rural field testing and local transformation initiatives. These companies showcase their distinctive products and services at the exhibition. The featured startups are:

Lanyang Beauty Intelligent Agriculture Biotechnology Co., Ltd.:
Lanyang Beauty focuses on providing rural field resources and customer matchmaking for farmers, as well as extracting medical materials from silver willow.

Arlatian Co., Ltd.:
Arlatian specializes in delivering high-end audio products/medical services such as advanced headphones and earphones with simplified procurement processes and high durability for customers.

Xiangyu An Technology Co., Ltd.:
Xiangyu An offers a comprehensive air treatment service, integrating sensors, cloud-based AI intelligent control systems, and delivering solutions for air quality management.

These companies, along with six others, showcase their distinctive products and services within the dedicated Zhubei-Yilan Park section of the exhibition.

org.tc: 美落佳生技股份有限公司

info.tc: 本公司獨家專利「落葵萃取物」，萃取自純淨水源、土地友善種植的台灣原生落葵，國際化妝品成分命名（INCI）：Basella Alba Extract。其高含量落葵多醣（PBA）經實驗證實，可促進皮膚細胞再生能力、幫助傷口癒合，有效緩解異位性皮膚炎之症狀，並可促進皮膚膠原蛋白生成、減少疤痕產生。且經50人人體試驗，能有效減少黑色素沈澱暗沉，並通過50人人體貼布試驗結果無致過敏性，並經歐盟試驗方法OECD432、OECD439結果得知其無光敏性及無刺激性。落葵多醣（PBA）系列無添加天然個人皮膚護理保養產品，有效緩解過敏、敏感性和異位性皮膚的困擾，能防止皮膚粗糙乾燥、減少脫屑脫皮、舒緩敏癢不適、改善壓力暗沈、淨化細緻毛孔、增強皮膚抵抗能力等，適合敏感、過敏、異位性膚質、孕婦嬰幼兒、更年期肌膚、乾燥粗糙、黝黑暗沉、熟齡皺紋、油性痘痘及一般性肌膚使用。
info.en: PBA is extracted from Taiwan's native Basella alba, from pure water sources and land-friendly cultivation. International Cosmetic Ingredient Nomenclature (INCI): Basella Alba Extract. The PBA series of natural personal skin care products can effectively relieve the problems of allergies, sensitivity and atopic skin. It can prevent rough and dry skin, reduce scaling and peeling, relieve itching and discomfort, and improve stress dullness. , purify fine pores, enhance skin resistance, etc.

info.tc:
耳寶 助聽器數位藍牙RIC耳掛型-6EF

耳寶 6EF 助聽器融合仁寶電子晶片智能處理技術，提供即時背景噪音過濾，確保清晰聽覺。支援藍牙連接，讓您直接接聽電話、享受音樂，還有語音導航功能，增強多功能性和便捷性。
具備IP54防塵防水功能，確保耐用穩定，適用各種環境。獨家毫秒移頻技術還原聲音，8頻道多頻處理與三種模式，適應不同聽覺需求。

6EF 助聽器滿足市場需求，解決聽覺問題，提供方便體驗。相較於其他高端助聽器，價格更具競爭力，提供高性價比選擇，引領市場趨勢。

以人為本的外觀與設計
6EF 助聽器設計輕巧簡約，舒適耳塞適用各耳朵尺寸。外觀採優雅中性色彩，融入使用者生活，提供卓越佩戴感受。

簡單操作與佩戴舒適
透過直觀易用的APP界面，無論年齡和技術背景如何，皆能輕鬆操作，提升自主性。柔軟材料耳塞，解壓和通風設計降低長時間佩戴不適。

符合政府補助資格的卓越產品
6EF 助聽器是全台唯一符合政府補助資格的產品，使用者可零元帶回家使用。卓越特點將改善身心障礙者和高齡者生活。
info.en:
